1a1(brgyad stong): brgyad stong pa phreng ba can bzhugs s+ho// dge'o//
1b1(brgyad stong): rgya gar skad du/
2a1(brgyad stong): // ar+ya aSh+Ta sa
2a2(brgyad stong): sri ka prad+d+ha pa ra mi ta/
2b1(brgyad stong): bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
2b2(brgyad stong): phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po dang po'o// sangs rgyas
2b3(brgyad stong): dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang
3a1(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
3a2(brgyad stong): 'di nang bdag gis mas pa dus gcigan/
3a3(brgyad stong): 'das rgyal po'i kha na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril bzhugs
3b1(brgyad stong): dge slong song gas brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun can po dag dang thabs tshig /
3b2(brgyad stong): cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag bzad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems
3b3(brgyad stong): shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba cang shes pa/ glang po chen
3b4(brgyad stong): bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid
4a1(brgyad stong): par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag par kun shes pas sem
4a2(brgyad stong): shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa thob pa sha
4a3(brgyad stong): stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o//
4a4(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab
4b1(brgyad stong): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams
4b2(brgyad stong): te/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
4b3(brgyad stong): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod spobs par byos shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i
4b4(brgyad stong): bu 'di snyam du sems te/ ci tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di bdag nyid kyi rang gi shes rab kyi spobs pa
4b5(brgyad stong): stobs bskyed pa dang / rang gi shes rab kyi spobs pa'i stobs byin gyis brlabs pas byang chub
5a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar
5a2(brgyad stong): ston par 'gyur rab/ 'on te sangs rgyas mthus yin snyam mo// de nas sangs rgyas kyi tshe dang ldan
5a3(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i de lta bu'i tshul gyi sems kyi rtog pa de sems kyis shes nas
5a4(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shi ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi
5a5(brgyad stong): nyan thos rnams ni gang ci smra ba dang ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / rjod par byed pa dang /
5b1(brgyad stong): gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par gsal bar byed pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
5b2(brgyad stong): skyes bu'i mthu yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang bstan
5b3(brgyad stong): pa'i chos bstan pa de la slob pa na de dag gis chos nyid de mngon sum du byas nas 'dzin to// de dag gis chos
5b4(brgyad stong): nyid de mngon sum du byas shing bzung nas gang dang gang 'chad pa dang gang dang gang ston pa dang gang dang gang nye bar ston
5b5(brgyad stong): ba dang / gang dang gang rjod par byed pa dang / gang dang gang gsal bar byed pa dang gang dang gang yang dag par gsal
5b6(brgyad stong): bar byed pa de dag thams cad chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu de dag 'di
6a1(brgyad stong): ltar chos nyid de nye bar ston pa rnams chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos
6a2(brgyad stong): bstan pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
6a3(brgyad stong): gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes
6a4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu
6a5(brgyad stong): byin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du khyod spobs par byos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
6a6(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes brjod pa gang lags pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub
6a7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes
6b1(brgyad stong): bgyi ba'i chos de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de yang bdag gis
6b2(brgyad stong): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'am byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang bdag gis ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes
6b3(brgyad stong): su ma mthong // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu
6b4(brgyad stong): phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang yang gal te 'di ltar smras pa dang bstan pa dang nye bar bstan pa la/ byang chub sem
6b5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'gong kun tu mi zhum bag mi tsha bag 'khums par mi 'gyur/ 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid/ bcom zhing phyir phyogs
6b6(brgyad stong): par mi 'gyur/ mi dngang / kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha/
6b7(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa la rjes su bstan par bgyi ba lags so// 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi'o//
6b8(brgyad stong): 'di nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams pa lags so// gal te de ltar gnas na de nyid 'di'i gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa lags so// bcom
7a1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
7a2(brgyad stong): pa bsgoms pas/ ci ltar bslabs na/ 'di byang chub kyi sems des kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid pa de ltar bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di
7a3(brgyad stong): ltar sems de ni sems ma mchis pa ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni 'od gsal ba lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus dang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di
7a4(brgyad stong): skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod dam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
7a5(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang ci sems med pa nyid gang yin pa'i sems med pa nyid de la yod pa nyid dam med pa
7a6(brgyad stong): nyid yod pa 'am dmigs par yang 'gyur ram/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni med do// rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu
7a7(brgyad stong): gal te sems med pa de la yod pa 'am med pa med cing mi dmigs na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di skad du sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod dam zhes smras pa'i
7a8(brgyad stong): khyod kyis brgal ba gang yin pa de ci rigs par 'gyur ram/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//
7b1(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems med pa nyid de yang gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa'i sha ri'i bu sems med pa de ni 'gyur ba med pa rnam par rtog pa/
7b2(brgyad stong): med pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar yang khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi
7b3(brgyad stong): nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa ltar ston pa legs so leg so// de bas na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag
7b4(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par nye bar brtag par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar yang rig
7b5(brgyad stong): par bya'o// nyan thos kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub
7b6(brgyad stong): par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// rnal 'byor du bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas
7b7(brgyad stong): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol
7b8(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// rnal 'byor du bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/
8a1(brgyad stong): gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la thabs mkhas pa dang
8a2(brgyad stong): ldan pas byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir rnal 'byor du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang bslab
8a3(brgyad stong): cing rnal 'byor du bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rgyas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las bstan to// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
8a4(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub la slob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/
8a5(brgyad stong): rab tu gdon par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir rnal 'byor/
8a6(brgyad stong): du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang bslab par bya ba dang rnal 'byor du
8a7(brgyad stong): ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rgyas par bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ang
8a8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa'i ming gang lags pa 'di nyid bdag gis ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma
8b1(brgyad stong): 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'di nyid ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su
8b2(brgyad stong): ma mthong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
8b3(brgyad stong): gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gang bdag gis dngos po ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ ming tsam gyis
8b4(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes 'du ba dang 'god par bgyid pa ni bdag gi blo ba la gcags lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang ming de yang gnas
8b5(brgyad stong): pa ma lags shing mi gnas pa yang ma lags la gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags shing gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa yang ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
8b6(brgyad stong): ming de ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ltar ming de gnas pa ma lags shing mi gnas pa yang ma lags la gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags shing gnas pa dang bral ba/
8b7(brgyad stong): ma lags pa yang ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa dang bstan pa dang nye bar bstan pa la byang chub
8b8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'gong kun tu mi zhum bag mi tsha/ bag 'khums par mi 'gyur 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid/ bcom zhing
9a1(brgyad stong): @phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur zhing lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa'i byang chub sems
9a2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bgyi'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa ste mi gnas
9a3(brgyad stong): pa'i tshul gyis legs par gnas pa lag so/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes
9a4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgoms pas gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba la ma lags 'du shes la ma lags 'du byed rnams lcags rnam par shes
9a5(brgyad stong): pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te gzugs la gnas na gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma lag so// /
9a6(brgyad stong): de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang gal te rnam par shes pa la gnas na rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod kyi shes rab kyi
9a7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lag so/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha
9a8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa yang ma lags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa yang lhag so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
9b1(brgyad stong): rdzogs par ma gyur na yongs su mi gzung ba yongs su pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
9b2(brgyad stong): gzugs yongasu gzung ba ma mchis so// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pas yongasu gzung ba ma
9b3(brgyad stong): mchis so// gzugs yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ de bzhin du tshor ba gang lags pa dang 'du shes gang lags pa dang 'du byed
9b4(brgyad stong): rnams gang lags pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang yod
9b5(brgyad stong): su gzung ba ma mchis so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bgyi'o// 'di yang byang chub sems
9b6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad yongasu gzung ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ yangs pa mdun du bgyis pa tshad med par nges pa nyan thos dang
9b7(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang yongasu gzung ba ma mchis te/ mtshan mar gzung ba ma lag so// gal te mtshan
9b8(brgyad stong): mar gzung bar gyur na kun tu rgyu phreng ba can 'di la dad par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ kun tu rgyu phreng ba can thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos nas dad pas rjes su 'brang
10a1(brgyad stong): zhing phyogs gcig pa'i ye shes kyis zhugs so// de zhugs nas kyang gzugs yongasu mi 'dzin to// de bzhin du tshor ba ma lags/ 'du shes ma
10a2(brgyad stong): lags/ 'du byed rnams ma lags/ rnam par shes pa yongasu mi 'dzin to// de la shes pa de dga' ba dang bde bar yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes pa
10a3(brgyad stong): de nang gi gzugs kyis yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes pa de phyi rol gyi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes pa de phyi nang gi
10a4(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de gzugs las gzhan du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du shes pa de nang gi tshor ba
10a5(brgyad stong): dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams kyi ma yin/ shes pa de nang gi rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de phyi rol gyi rnam par shes pa'i yin
10a6(brgyad stong): par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de phyi nang gi rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang
10a7(brgyad stong): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshig gi rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu phreng ba can mos so// de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la thams cad du dad pas rjes su
10a8(brgyad stong): 'brang zhing chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te 'di ltar mos pa zhes bgyi'o// des chos gang yang yongs su ma bzung ngo // gang gzung ba 'am gtang bar bgyi ba'i chos de
10b1(brgyad stong): gang yang ma dmigs so// de mya ngan las 'das par yang rlom sems su mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
10b2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi ste/ gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin/ de bzhin du gang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang gang rnam par shes pa
10b3(brgyad stong): yongs su mi 'dzin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams
10b4(brgyad stong): yongs su ma rdzogs par bar ma dor yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da' ba ste/ de bas na bcom ldan 'das 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi
10b5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi
10b6(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pas 'di ltar nye bar brtag cing 'di ltar nges par bsam par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang yin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
10b7(brgyad stong): pa 'di gang gi yin/ ci chos gang med pa dang mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam zhes/ gal te nye bar brtags de ltar nges par bsams na/ mi 'god
10b8(brgyad stong): kun tu mi zhum/ bag mi tsha/ bag 'khums par mi 'gyur/ 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid/ bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi dngang kun tu mi skrag
11a1(brgyad stong): kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bgyi'o// de nas
11a2(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu'i tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ltar gang gi tshe gzugs nyid gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang bral
11a3(brgyad stong): ba de bzhin du gang gi tshe tshor ba nyid dang 'du shes nyid dang 'du byed rnams nyid dang de bzhin du 'di ltar gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang
11a4(brgyad stong): thal ba gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba/ gang gi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thams cad mkhyen
11a5(brgyad stong): ba'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya/ de skad ces smras pa/
11a6(brgyad stong): dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ sha ri'i bu gzugs
11a7(brgyad stong): nyid gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba nyid dang 'du shes nyid dang 'du byed rnams nyid dang de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid kyang tshe dang ldan pa sha/
11a8(brgyad stong): ri'i bu rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o//
11b1(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan
11b2(brgyad stong): nyid dang yang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dang yang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyi gzhi yang mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i ngo bo nyid dang yang bral ba'o// nga ba
11b3(brgyad stong): ningo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang yang bral ba'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang
11b4(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'di la slob par 'gyur ba de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ tshe dang
11b5(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'di slob pa 'gyur ba de thams cad
11b6(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos thams cad ni nges par 'byung ba med cing ma skyes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa
11b7(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar 'gyuraro// ci lta ci ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar 'gyur
11b8(brgyad stong): ba de lta de ltar sems can yongs su smin pa'i phyir/ lus dang sems yongs su dag pa dang mtshan yongasu dag pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas dang
12a1(brgyad stong): nye bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
12a2(brgyad stong): nye ba yin no// gzhan yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las brtsams te 'di skad ces smras so/ gal te gzugs la spyod na
12a3(brgyad stong): mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs kyi mtshan ma la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs mtshan ma'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs
12a4(brgyad stong): kyi skye ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs kyi 'gag pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs kyi 'jig pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do//
12a5(brgyad stong): gal te gzugs stong pa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag spyod do snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag byang chub sems dpe'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma
12a6(brgyad stong): la spyod do// bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam na de dmigs pa nyid la spyod do/ de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang gal te rnam par shes pa
12a7(brgyad stong): la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la
12a8(brgyad stong): spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam pa shes pa'i
12b1(brgyad stong): 'jig pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam du spyod mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag spyod do snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag
12b2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam na de dmigs pa nyid la spyod do// gal te yang de'i 'di snyam du gang de ltar
12b3(brgyad stong): spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed pa yin no snyam du sems na de mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa ste/ byang
12b4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' 'di ni thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa rab
12b5(brgyad stong): 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
12b6(brgyad stong): gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi
12b7(brgyad stong): mtshan ma la mi spyod/ gzugs mtshan ma'o snyam du mi spyod/ gzugs kyi skye ba la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi 'gag pa la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi 'jig pa la mi spyod/
12b8(brgyad stong): gzugs stong pa'o snyam du mi spyod/ bdag spyod do snyam du mi spyod/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du mi spyod/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du dmigs pa
13a1(brgyad stong): mi spyod pa dang / de bzhin du gal te tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ gal te rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/
13a2(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma'o snyam du mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa la mi spyod/
13a3(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam du mi spyod/ bdag spyod do snyam du mi spyod/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du mi spyod/ bdag
13a4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du dmigs pa la mi spyod cing / gal te yang de 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste de ni shes rab kyi
13a5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed pa yin no snyam du mi sems pa ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin
13a6(brgyad stong): no// de spyod kyang spyod do snyam du nye bar mi rtog/ mi spyod do snyam du nye bar mi rtog/ spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod do snyam du nye bar mi rtog/ spyod pa yang ma yin/
13a7(brgyad stong): mi spyod pa yang ma yin pa'o snyam du nye bar mi rtog/ spyad par bya'o snyam du yang nye bar mi rtog spyad par mi bya'o snyam du yang nye bar mi rtog/ spyad par bya ba yang yin la spyad/
13a8(brgyad stong): par mi bya ba yang yin no snyam du nye bar mi rtog/ sprad par bya ba yang ma yin la spyad par mi bya ba yang ma yin pa nyid do snyam du nye bar mi rtog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos tham
13b1(brgyad stong): cad ni nye bar mi rtog cing ma zin paso// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad len pa med pa zhes bya ba ste/ yang ba mdun du
13b2(brgyad stong): byas pa tshad med par nges pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong mi yin pa'o// ting nge 'dzin gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur/
13b3(brgyad stong): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
13b4(brgyad stong): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
13b5(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa lagaso/ de ni ting nge 'dzin de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong //
13b6(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin des kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid/ bdag ni mnyam par bzhag pa ste/ bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug go/ bdag ting nge 'dzin la mnyam pa/
13b7(brgyad stong): bzhag pa'o// bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'o snyam pa de lta bu de la thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad ma mchis so// de skad
13b8(brgyad stong): ces gsol pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gang gis gnas na byang chub
14a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
14a2(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs
14a3(brgyad stong): kyi bu des ni ting nge 'dzin de yang mi shes yang dag par mi shes so/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor mi shes yang dag par mi shes zhes zer
14a4(brgyad stong): ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu yang dag par mi shes zhes zer ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de med pas na mi shes yang dag par
14a5(brgyad stong): mi shes so// ting nge 'dzin de yang mi shes yang dag par mi shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ ji ltar yang khyod de
14a6(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus spobs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis ston pa ni rab 'byor leg so legs so// rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/
14a7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni de bzhin du 'di la bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes rab
14a8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob po/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
14b1(brgyad stong): chen po de ltar slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags sam/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad
14b2(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal
14b3(brgyad stong): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu'i 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na chos
14b4(brgyad stong): gang la slob pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
14b5(brgyad stong): chen po de ltar slob pa ni chos gang la yang mi slob po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu chos de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pas ci ltar mngon par chags
14b6(brgyad stong): pa de bzhin du yod pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na de dag ci ltar mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
14b7(brgyad stong): ri'i bu ci ltar med pa de bzhin du yang dag par yod de de ltar med pa de'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya'o// de dag la byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa rnams mngon
14b8(brgyad stong): bar chags te/ de dag gis chos thams cad med pa la brtag so// de dag gis de la brtags nas mtha' gnyis la zhen pas chos de dag mi shes mi mthong ste/ de'i
15a1(brgyad stong): phyir de dag med bzhin du chos thams cad la rtog go// brtags nas mtha' gnyis la mngon par chags so// mngon par chags pa de'i gzhis/
15a2(brgyad stong): dmigs pa la gnas nas 'das pa'i chos la rtog go/ ma 'ongs pa'i chos la rtog go// da ltar byung ba'i chos la rtog go/ de dag gis brtags nas ming dang gzug
15a3(brgyad stong): la mngon par zhen to// de dag gis med pa'i chos thams cad la brtags so// de dag gis med pa'i chos de dag thams cad la brtags pas lam yang dag pa ji ltar
15a4(brgyad stong): ba bzhin du mi shes mi mthong ngo // lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma shes ma mthong bas khams gsum las nges par mi 'byung / yang dag pa'i mtha' khong du
15a5(brgyad stong): mi chud de de'i phyir de dag byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// de dag chos bden pa la yid mi ches so// shA ri'i bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
15a6(brgyad stong): po ni chos gang la yang mngon par zhen par mi byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
15a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
15a8(brgyad stong): pad+ma shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob ste/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
15b1(brgyad stong): de ltar slob na chos thams cad la slob bo// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob par 'gyur thams
15b2(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar 'gyur thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
15b3(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang zhig 'di skad du 'dri ste ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob par 'gyur ram thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar
15b4(brgyad stong): 'gyur ram thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram zhes de skad du yongs su 'dri na bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar bstan par bgyi/ de skad ces
15b5(brgyad stong): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de bas na 'dir khyod nyid la dri bar bya yis khyod kyis ci
15b6(brgyad stong): nus pa de bzhin du ston cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa
15b7(brgyad stong): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dri skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems sgyu ma de gzhan la gzugs de gzhan nam de bzhin du sgyu ma de gzhan la
15b8(brgyad stong): tshor ba de gzhan nam 'du shes de gzhan nam 'du byed rnams de gzhan nam/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems sgyu ma de gzhan la rnam par shes pa de gzhin nam/ rab 'byor
16a1(brgyad stong): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar ma lags te sgyu ma de gzhan la gzugs de gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid sgyu
16a2(brgyad stong): ma lags so sgyu ma nyid gzugs lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sgyu ma de gzhan la tshor ba de gzhan dang / 'du shes de gzhan dang 'du byed rnams de gzhan
16a3(brgyad stong): yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams nyid sgyu ma lags so sgyu ma nyid tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams lag so/
16a4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das sgyu ma de gzhan la rnam par shes pa de gzhan yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa nyid sgyu ma lags so sgyu ma nyid rnam par shes pa lag
16a5(brgyad stong): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di rnams la 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes
16a6(brgyad stong): bya ba'i 'du shes dang kun shes pa dang rnam par rig pa dang tha snyad 'di yin nam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi
16a7(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
16a8(brgyad stong): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa des ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad
16b1(brgyad stong): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur gzung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
16b2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bur gsungs te/ gzugs gang lags pa de yang dbang po drug dang phung po lnga po de dag
16b3(brgyad stong): lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams sgyu ma lta bur gsungs shing bcom ldan 'das
16b4(brgyad stong): kyis rnam par shes pa yang sgyu ma lta bur gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de yang dbang po drug dang phung po lnga po de dag
16b5(brgyad stong): lags so// bcom ldan 'das theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bstan pa 'di thos na dngang zhing
16b6(brgyad stong): kun tu skrag la kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs
16b7(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song bar gyur na ni/ dngang zhing kun tu skrag la kun tu skrag pa
16b8(brgyad stong): dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
17a1(brgyad stong): lag tu song bar gyur na ni mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom
17a2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
17a3(brgyad stong): gnyen gang rnams lags par rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang de dag la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams 'doms shing rjes su ston
17a4(brgyad stong): pa rnams dang / gang de dag la bdud kyi las rnams nye bar ston pa ste/ bdud kyi nyes pa ni 'di lta bur rig par bya/ bdud kyi nyes pa ni 'di dag yin//
17a5(brgyad stong): bdud kyi las ni 'di dag yin par rig par bya/ bdud kyi las 'di dag khyed kyis rtogs nas spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sem
17a6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
17a7(brgyad stong): rnams su rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
17a8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa
17b1(brgyad stong): theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams su rig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems
17b2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bka' stsal pa de la byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i gzhi'i don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
17b3(brgyad stong): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi'i don med pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
17b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad kyi chags pa med pa la slob po// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
17b5(brgyad stong): bo ni chos thams cad rjes su rtogs pa'i don du chags pa med pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ rab 'byor
17b6(brgyad stong): byang chub tu gnyer bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang yang 'di
17b7(brgyad stong): skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
17b8(brgyad stong): zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang sems can gyi ris chen po'i mchog nyid du bya'o snyam pa ste/ don des
18a1(brgyad stong): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das l-i shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
18a2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das bdag kyang don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bar spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
18a3(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu da de'i dus la bab par shes na spobs par gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bdag tu lta ba dang sems can du lta ba dang srog tu
18a4(brgyad stong): lta ba dang gang zag tu lta ba dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang 'jig par lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang rtag par lta ba dang / rang gi lus la lta ba chen
18a5(brgyad stong): po 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i lta ba de dag spang ba'i slad du chos bstan to snyam ste don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas
18a6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa'
18a7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bar spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor des dus la bab par shes na spobs par gyis
18a8(brgyad stong): shig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das de byang chub
18b1(brgyad stong): kyi sems thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems zag pa med pa'i sems/ mnyam pa med pa'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
18b2(brgyad stong): thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems gang lags pa'i sems de la yang ma chags yongs su ma zin to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams
18b3(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa'i sems de ni zag pa ma mchis pa yongs su ma zin pa'o// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems zag pa ma mchis shing yongs su ma zin pa gang
18b4(brgyad stong): lags pa'i sems de la yang ma chags shing yongs su ma zin te/ don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o// de
18b5(brgyad stong): nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i rgyus sems de la yang ma chags shing yongs
18b6(brgyad stong): su ma zin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems med pa'i phyir sems de la yang ma chags shing yongs su ma zin to// sha ri'i bus smras pa/
18b7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang ci sems med pa de
18b8(brgyad stong): la yod pa 'am med pa yod pa 'am dmigs par 'gyur ram/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis
19a1(brgyad stong): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gal te sems med pa de la gang yod pa 'am/ med pa med cing mi dmigs na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de
19a2(brgyad stong): ltar 'di skad du sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod dam zhes zer/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ltar yang khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon
19a3(brgyad stong): mongs pa med pa la gnas pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa ltar ston pa legs so legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bus 'di skad ces
19a4(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' chen po sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa 'di ni sems dpa' de go cha chen po bgos pa sems dpa' de theg
19a5(brgyad stong): pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa lags te/ de'i srad du sems dpa' chen po sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs
19a6(brgyad stong): su mchi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos pa go cha chen po bgos pa
19a7(brgyad stong): zhes bgyi ba 'di gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
19a8(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can gzhal du med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya
19b1(brgyad stong): bdag gis sems can grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam la/ gang gis gang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa'i sems can de dag kyang yod pa ma yin/
19b2(brgyad stong): no snyam ste/ des sems can de snyed pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las zla bar byed la gang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa dang gang gis yongs su mya ngan las bzlas
19b3(brgyad stong): pa'i sems can yang 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir
19b4(brgyad stong): ro/ rab 'byor dper na sgyu ma byed pa mkhas pa 'am sgyu ma byed pa'i nye gnas kyis lam po che ni bzhi mdor skye bo'i tshogs chen po mngon par sprul te mngon par
19b5(brgyad stong): sprul nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de mi snang bar byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de la yang gang gis gang yang bsad pa 'am shi ba 'am bshig pa 'am
19b6(brgyad stong): mi snang bar byas pa yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de
19b7(brgyad stong): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar byed de gang yongs su mya ngan
19b8(brgyad stong): las bzlas par nga gang gis yongs su mya ngan las bzlas par 'gyur ba'i sems can yang 'ga' zhig yod pa ma yin no// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem
20a1(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di thos nas mi dang kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na 'di tsam gyis rab 'byor byang
20a2(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
20a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba de ltar na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
20a4(brgyad stong): 'di ni go cha ma mchis pa bgos pa lags par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te byang chub sems dpa' sems
20a5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po 'di ni go cha med pa bgos pa rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byas pa rnam par ma bsgyur ba mngon par 'dus
20a6(brgyad stong): ma byas pa'o// sems can gang dag gi don du go cha 'di bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas pa rnam par ma bsgyur ba mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// de skad
20a7(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// bde bar
20a8(brgyad stong): gshegs pa de de bzhin no// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'ang
20b1(brgyad stong): khyed rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol
20b2(brgyad stong): ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'di shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
20b3(brgyad stong): nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bus che dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
20b4(brgyad stong): gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ram/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma
20b5(brgyad stong): grol ba zhes zer ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ram/ de bzhin du tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang
20b6(brgyad stong): 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ram/
20b7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'on te gzugs gang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i gzugs de gang yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba de gang yin/ 'du shes de gang yin/
20b8(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa gang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i rnam par shes pa de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa
21a1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba'i de
21a2(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma bcing
21a3(brgyad stong): ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i
21a4(brgyad stong): bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi tshe sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du sgyu ma'i skyes
21a5(brgyad stong): bu'i tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i 'du shes gang yin pa dang / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi
21a6(brgyad stong): tshe sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
21a7(brgyad stong): ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin drung 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
21a8(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa gang po sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir du zhe na/ yang dag pa ma yin pas
21b1(brgyad stong): nam bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pas na ma bcings ma grol po'o// ma skyes pas nam bcings ma grol ba ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
21b2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po'i go cha chen po bgos pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i go cha chen po go cha med pa'o// de skad ces
21b3(brgyad stong): smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
21b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos par gyur pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing theg pa chen po la
21b5(brgyad stong): yang dag par gnas par 'gyur ba'i theg pa chen po de ni gang lags/ theg pa chen po de la ji ltar yang dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi ba 'am/ theg pa chen po
21b6(brgyad stong): des gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am/ theg pa chen po de la gang gis yang dag par zhugs pa'am/ theg pa chen po des gang du gnas par 'gyur ba
21b7(brgyad stong): 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
21b8(brgyad stong): bka' stsal to// rab 'byor theg pa chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhal du med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tshad med pa'i
22a1(brgyad stong): phyir ro// rab 'byor gang yang 'di skad du theg pa chen po de la ji ltar yang dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi ba 'am/ theg pa chen po des
22a2(brgyad stong): gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ theg pa chen po de la gang gis yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg po chen po des gang du gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/
22a3(brgyad stong): theg pa chen po des gang zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi sgo nas yang dag par zhugs nas/ khams gsum nas
22a4(brgyad stong): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mi dmigs pa gang yin pas yang dag par zhugs te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur la byang chub sems dpa'
22a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'on kyang gang nas kyang nges par 'byung ba med gang gis kyang yang dag par ma zhugs gang du yang gnas par
22a6(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur mod kyi gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur la/ theg pa chen po des gang yang nges par 'byung bar yang mi 'gyu
22a7(brgyad stong): nges par phyung ba yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang nges par 'byung ba dang / gang gis nges par 'byung ba'i chos de gnyis ka yang med cing mi dmigs te/
22a8(brgyad stong): de ltar na chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa la chos gang zhig chos gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan
22b1(brgyad stong): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du
22b2(brgyad stong): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba la rjod do// nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir de ni theg pa chen po'o// ji ltar nam
22b3(brgyad stong): mkha' la sems can gzhal du ma mchis grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis pa'i go skabs mchis pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po la yang sems
22b4(brgyad stong): can gzhal du ma mchis grangs ma mchis tshad mchis pa'i go skabs mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
22b5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o// 'di la 'ong ba yang ma mthong 'di la 'gro ba yang ma mthong zhing 'di la gnas pa yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
22b6(brgyad stong): 'di ltar theg pa chen po 'di la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs dbus kyang mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa de ni dus gsum
22b7(brgyad stong): du mnyam pa'o// de bas na theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/
22b8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor legs so legs so// rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ de ltar na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po
23a1(brgyad stong): yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'di la bsrabs pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par
23a2(brgyad stong): gyur to// rjes su thob po rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bco
23a3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni theg pa chen po bshad par bya bar sems lags so// de
23a4(brgyad stong): nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar
23a5(brgyad stong): theg pa chen po ston par ma gyur lags grangs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
23a6(brgyad stong): phyin pa la theg pa chen po rjes su mthun par ston to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
23a7(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthus lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar yang nye bar mi rtog bya
23a8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar yang nye bar mi rtog byang chub sems dpa' dbus su yang nye bar mi rtog go/ nye bar mi rtog pa de ci'i srad du zhe na/ gzugs mu/
23b1(brgyad stong): ma mchis pas na byang chub sems dpa' yang mu mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa mu ma
23b2(brgyad stong): mchis pas na byang chub sems dpa' yang mu mchis par rig par bgyi'o// gzugs byang chub sems dpa'o zhes nye bar mi rtog ste 'di yang ma mchis mi dmigs/
23b3(brgyad stong): so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa'o zhes nye bar mi rtog ste/ 'di yang ma mchis mi
23b4(brgyad stong): dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi dmigs pas
23b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i ming 'di gang la yod pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha
23b6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi dmigs thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan
23b7(brgyad stong): bdag gis chos de thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong zhing ma dmigs na chos gang zhig chos gang gis
23b8(brgyad stong): chos gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas shes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam mo// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
24a1(brgyad stong): dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di yang ming tsam mo// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang ming tsam mo// ming de yang
24a2(brgyad stong): mngon par ma grub ste/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag bdag ces brjod kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag shin tu mngon par ma grub pa bzhin no// de ltar chos thams
24a3(brgyad stong): cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa la gang zhig gzung du ma mchis shing mngon par ma grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams de gang
24a4(brgyad stong): lags/ gang zhig gzung du ma mchis shing mngon par ma grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags/ de ltar chos de dag thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis
24a5(brgyad stong): pa gang lags pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa lags la/ gang chos thams cad kyi mngon par ma grub pa gang lags pa de yang chos ma lags te/ des na shes
24a6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon pa ma grub pas mngon par ma grub pa la ci zhig gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub
24a7(brgyad stong): pa las gzhan na chos thams cad dam sangs rgyas kyi chos sam byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam gang byang chub tu spyod pa yang mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das
24a8(brgyad stong): gal te de ltar bshad cing de ltar bstan te de ltar nye bar bstan pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'gong kun tu mi zhum bag mi cha/
24b1(brgyad stong): bag 'khums par mi 'gyur/ 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pa dang ldan
24b2(brgyad stong): par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
24b3(brgyad stong): po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nye bar rtog pa'o// /
24b4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par sems pa'o zhes de ltar rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
24b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos 'di dag nye bar rtog pa de'i tshe/ gzugs
24b6(brgyad stong): nye bar mi rtog/ gzugs nye bar mi 'dzin/ gzugs skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gzugs 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
24b7(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin rnam par shes pa nye bar mi rtog/ rnam par shes pa nye bar mi 'dzin/ rnam par shes
24b8(brgyad stong): pa skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rnam par shes pa 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs
25a1(brgyad stong): kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ gzugs kyi 'jig pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma
25a2(brgyad stong): lags te/ des na skye ba ma mchis pa dang / gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// des na 'jig pa ma
25a3(brgyad stong): mchis pa dang gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis
25a4(brgyad stong): su ma mchis pa'i grangs su gtogs so// de bzhin du 'di ltar tshor ba'i gang lags pa dang / 'du shes kyi gang lags pa dang / 'du byed rnams kyi gang
25a5(brgyad stong): lags pa dang / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa ma mchis
25a6(brgyad stong): pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ des na skye ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis
25a7(brgyad stong): su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// des na 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su
25a8(brgyad stong): bgyir mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su gtogs so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab
25b1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du nye bar rtog na/ de'i tshe gzugs nye bar mi rtog gzugs nye bar mi 'dzin gzugs skye bar yang dag par
25b2(brgyad stong): rjes su mi mthong / gzugs 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin 'du shes ma yin 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa nye bar
25b3(brgyad stong): mi rtog/ rnam par shes pa nye bar mi 'dzin/ rnam par shes pa skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rnam par shes pa 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
25b4(brgyad stong): ngo/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ gzugs kyi 'jig pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa
25b5(brgyad stong): de ni gzugs ma legs te/ des na skye ba ma mchis pa dang gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// des na
25b6(brgyad stong): 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang / gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du gzugs shes bgyi
25b7(brgyad stong): ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su gtogs so// de bzhin du 'di ltar tshor ba'i gang lags pa dang / 'du shes kyi gang lags pa dang / 'du byed
25b8(brgyad stong): rnams kyi gang lags pa dang / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa ma
26a1(brgyad stong): mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ des na skye ba ma mchis pa dang rnam pa shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis
26a2(brgyad stong): su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// des na 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis
26a3(brgyad stong): su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su gtogs so// /
26a4(brgyad stong): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po gnyis pa// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan
26a5(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad smras pa'i don bdag gis shes pa de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang
26a6(brgyad stong): skye ba med pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med pa yin na byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa 'am
26a7(brgyad stong): sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag nyams su myong ba'i don du spro ba yang ci zhig yod/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa
26a8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba spyad pa
26b1(brgyad stong): spyod par mi 'dod do// gang zhig dka' ba'i 'du shes kyis spyod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' yang mi 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dka'
26b2(brgyad stong): ba'i 'du shes bskyed nas ni sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa'i don bya bar mi nus so// 'on kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nyid du byas nas de sems can thams
26b3(brgyad stong): cad la mar 'du shes pa dang / bar 'du shes pa dang / bur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'du shes bskyed par byas shing / de bzhin du skyes pa dang / bud med
26b4(brgyad stong): dag la 'du shes de dag byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// de bas na byang chub sems dpa'
26b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la mar 'du shes pa dang / par 'du shes pa dang / bur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'du shes pa dang /
26b6(brgyad stong): bdag nyid kyi bar du yang 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ ji ltar bdag ni thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad sdug bsngal thams cad
26b7(brgyad stong): las thar bar bya ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bya//
26b8(brgyad stong): zhes de ltar sems can thams cad la yang 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs su mi gtang ngo // bdag gis/
27a1(brgyad stong): sems can 'di dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po dpag tu med pa las thar bar bya'o// bdag gi lus brgyar gtubs kyang chung
27a2(brgyad stong): du na 'di dag la bdag gis gnod sems kyang mi bskyed do snyam du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed par bya'o// gal te
27a3(brgyad stong): sems de ltar gnas na dka' ba byed pa'i 'du shes su spyod pa ma yin no// dka' ba byed pa'i 'du shes su gnas pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu
27a4(brgyad stong): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci nas kyang bdag ni thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med cing mi dmig
27a5(brgyad stong): pa de bzhin du chos thams cad thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa de ltar sems bskyed par bya zhing de ltar
27a6(brgyad stong): na nang dang phyi'i chos thams cad la 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// gal te sems de ltar spyod na dka' ba'i 'du shes can du spyod pa ma yin dka' ba'i 'du shes
27a7(brgyad stong): can du gnas pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med pa yin no zhes smras pa de ni de de bzhin no//
27a8(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni skye ba med pa'o// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci byang chub sems
27b1(brgyad stong): dpa' nyid skye ba med dam 'on te byang chub sems dpe'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems
27b2(brgyad stong): dpa'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kho na skye ba med dam
27b3(brgyad stong): 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med do// sha
27b4(brgyad stong): ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kho na skye ba med dam/ 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams
27b5(brgyad stong): kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ che
27b6(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kho na skye ba med dam 'on te so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
27b7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci so so'i skye bo nyid skye ba med dam/ 'on
27b8(brgyad stong): te so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med do// de skad
28a1(brgyad stong): ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal
28a2(brgyad stong): te byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med/ thams
28a3(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med/ so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin na/ tshe dang ldan pa
28a4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob pa yin ni/ de skad ces smras pa dang / che dang
28a5(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu kho bo ni ma skyes pa'i chos la thob par mi 'dod la
28a6(brgyad stong): mngon par rtogs pa yang ma yin te/ ma skyes chos kyis thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
28a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor yang ci ma skyes pa'i chos kyis thob pa skyes pa 'thob par 'gyur ram/ 'on te skyes pa'i chos kyis thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob par 'gyur/
28a8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu yang ci ma skyes pa'i chos skyes pa yin nam/ 'on te ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa nyid yin/ sha
28b1(brgyad stong): ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci skye ba'i chos nyid mi skye ba yin nas 'on te mi skye ba'i chos mi skye ba yid/ rab 'byor gyis smras
28b2(brgyad stong): pa/ tshe dang ldan sha ri'i bu skye ba'i chos sam mi skye ba'i chos shes smra bar mi spobs so// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis skye
28b3(brgyad stong): ba med pa yang smra bar mi spobs sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu skye ba med pa nyid rjod pa yin la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu skye ba
28b4(brgyad stong): med pa nyid so sor snang ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu skye ba med pa nyid spobs pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de kho na bzhin du so sor snang
28b5(brgyad stong): ba nyid do// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos ston/
28b6(brgyad stong): pa'i nang na mchog tu gzhag par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni gang dang gang nyid la yongs su dri ba byas
28b7(brgyad stong): pa de dang de nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo la chos nyid dang 'gal bar yang mi byed do// de skad ces smras pa dang /
28b8(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos mi gnas pa'i
29a1(brgyad stong): chos can rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'di yin te de dag ni gang dang gang nyid la yongs su dri ba byas pa de dang de nyid la nges par
29a2(brgyad stong): 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / chos nyid dang 'gal bar yang mi byed la chos nyid las kyang mi 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar yang chos thams cad
29a3(brgyad stong): mi gnas pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa
29a4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor legs so legs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang
29a5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni theg pa thams cad pa chos thams cad la mi gnas phyir/ chos thams
29a6(brgyad stong): cad la mi gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zam mo 'di ltar bshad/
29a7(brgyad stong): cing 'di ltar bstan pa dang 'di ltar nye bar bstan pa la sems zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang nem nur du mi 'gyur ba dang rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems
29a8(brgyad stong): gzhan du mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas shing yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral
29b1(brgyad stong): ba yin na zhes rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems
29b2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pas gnas pa gnas pa gang yin pa de ci ltar yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur/ tshe dang
29b3(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba yin na de lta na ni de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas
29b4(brgyad stong): pa dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang bral na/
29b5(brgyad stong): de lta na ni de yid la byed pa de dang bral bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la byed pa dang ma
29b6(brgyad stong): bral yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa mya bral ba nyid du 'gyur na de lta yin du zin na sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas
29b7(brgyad stong): pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyang yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar gnas so// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa
29b8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu legs so legs so// 'on kyang khyod la yang klan kar 'gyur te/
30a1(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus ni don 'di nyid yang dag pa'i tshig tu brjod par yang yongs su bzung ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
30a2(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bu sems can ngo bo nyid med pas na yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems can dngos po med pas na yid la
30a3(brgyad stong): byed pa dngos po med par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems can dben pas na yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems
30a4(brgyad stong): can bsam gyis mi khyab pas na yid la byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems can mngon par rdzogs par byang me chub pas
30a5(brgyad stong): na yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par byang ma chub par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems can yang dag pa ji lta ba ma yin pa'i don du mngon par rdzog
30a6(brgyad stong): par byang chub pas na yid la byed pa yang dag pa ji lta ba ma yin pa'i don du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub
30a7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i ngo bo'i yid la byed pa 'di dang gnas pa 'dis gnas par 'dod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
30a8(brgyad stong): pa brgyad stong pa las/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi spyod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// // de'i tshe yang lha rnams
30b1(brgyad stong): kyi dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu bzhi khri dang lhan cig tu 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod par gyur to// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang rgyal che
30b2(brgyad stong): bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu nyi khrir bcas pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu khrir bcas pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i
30b3(brgyad stong): bu lnga stong yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod par gyur te/ lha rnams kyi rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i 'od gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
30b4(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zil gyis mnan to// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis che
30b5(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor lha'i bu stong phrag mang po 'khor 'dir 'dus te 'khod pa 'di rnams
30b6(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar bstan pa dang gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa
30b7(brgyad stong): nyan par 'dod na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya/ ji ltar bslab par bya/ ji ltar rnal
30b8(brgyad stong): 'byor du bya/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
31a1(brgyad stong): kyis nye bar bstan par bya ste/ lha'i bu gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag gis
31a2(brgyad stong): sems bskyed par bya'o// gang dag yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la zhugs pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i
31a3(brgyad stong): skal ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gis 'khor ba'i rgyun las mtshams bcad pas de dag yang dang yang du 'khor zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
31a4(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i skal ba med do// 'on kyang gal te de dag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na de dag
31a5(brgyad stong): la yang rjes su yi rang bar bya'o// kho bo ni de dag gi dge ba la bar chad mi byed de khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams las ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos
31a6(brgyad stong): rnams la lhag par dmigs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor legs so legs so//
31a7(brgyad stong): khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la spro ba skyed pa gang yin pa de ni rab 'byor yang khyod legs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa
31a8(brgyad stong): dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'
31b1(brgyad stong): drin gzo bar bgyi ste bka' drin mi gzo bar mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
31b2(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa nyid kyis bdag cag rnams kyi don du byang chub
31b3(brgyad stong): kyi phyir tshangs par sprad pa spyod pa na nyan thos gang dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan te de la bcom ldan 'das kyis spyad
31b4(brgyad stong): pas bla na med pa'i ye shes bskyed pa de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rjes su
31b5(brgyad stong): yongs su gzung bar bgyi zhing rjes su yongs su bskor bar bkyi'o// yang dag par yongs su gzung bar bgyi zhing yang dag par yongs su
31b6(brgyad stong): bskor bar yang bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rjes su
31b7(brgyad stong): yongs su bzung zhing rjes su yongs su bskor ba dang yang dag par yongs su bzung zhing yang dag par yongs su blas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
31b8(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/ kau shi ka de'i
32a1(brgyad stong): phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
32a2(brgyad stong): pa la gnas par bya ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid la gnas pas shes rab kyi pha rol
32a3(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ste/ kau shi ka de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos par 'gyur bar bya'o// gzugs la
32a4(brgyad stong): gnas par mi bya'o// tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bya'o// mig la gnas par mi
32a5(brgyad stong): bya'o// gzugs la gnas par mi bya'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bya'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bya'o// mig gi
32a6(brgyad stong): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang lus dang yid la gnas par mi bya'o// sgra dang dri
32a7(brgyad stong): dang ro dang reg dang chos rnams dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la
32a8(brgyad stong): byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar la gnas par mi bya'o sa'i khams la gnas par mi bya'o// chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams
32b1(brgyad stong): dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas par mi bya'o// yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi
32b2(brgyad stong): rkang pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang lam la gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par mi bya'o// la
32b3(brgyad stong): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o//
32b4(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na gzugs so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na tshor ba'o zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes so zhes bya ba
32b5(brgyad stong): dang 'du byed rnams so zhes bya ba dang / de ltar na rnam par shes pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na mig go zhes bya ba nas yid kyi 'dus te reg
32b6(brgyad stong): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na sa'i khams so zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa'i khams so zhes bya ba'i bar du
32b7(brgyad stong): gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang dbang
32b8(brgyad stong): po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so zhes bya ba dang de ltar na lam gyi yan lag go zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
33a1(brgyad stong): 'bras bu'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba dang de ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/
33a2(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba dang / de ltar na dgra bcom pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar rang sangs rgyas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na sangs rgyas so zhes
33a3(brgyad stong): gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes
33a4(brgyad stong): pa rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes
