33a5(brgyad stong): dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs stong pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin
33a6(brgyad stong): du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa stong pa dang mi stong pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs bdag dang bdag med po'o zhes
33a7(brgyad stong): gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa bdag dang bdag med pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzug
33a8(brgyad stong): sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs stong pa'o zhes nye bar dmigs pas gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang
33a9(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya
33b1(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa stong pa'o zhes nye bar dmigs pas gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu
33b2(brgyad stong): pa phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid 'das ma byas
33b3(brgyad stong): kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid 'dus ma
33b4(brgyad stong): byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa de ltar thogs
33b5(brgyad stong): na srid pa lan bdun pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba yongs su
33b6(brgyad stong): mthar ma phyin pa'i phyir 'jig rten 'dir lan cig phyir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro zhes gnas par mi bya'o// phyir mi 'ong ba sbyin pa'i
33b7(brgyad stong): gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong bar de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// dgra
33b8(brgyad stong): bcom pa nyid sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid du phung po'i lhag ma ma lus par mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yong
34a1(brgyad stong): su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sang
34a2(brgyad stong): rgyas ni nyan thos kyi sa las 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi sa ma thob par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes gnas par mi bya'o// sangs
34a3(brgyad stong): rgyas ni sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas ni so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'das pa dang nyan thos kyi sa las 'das pa dang rang sangs
34a4(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams kyi don mdzad do// gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig
34a5(brgyad stong): brgya stong yongs su mya ngan las bzlas/ gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
34a6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas su nges par mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi sa la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das
34a7(brgyad stong): pa'i dbyings su sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes des 'di ltar yang gnas par mi bya'o// de nas
34a8(brgyad stong): yang tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te sangs rgyas ni so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'das pa dang / nyan thos kyi sa las 'das pa dang /
34b1(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de/ gzhal du grangs med pa'i sems can bye ba khrag
34b2(brgyad stong): khrig brgya stong yongs su mya ngan las bzlas/ gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
34b3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas su nges par mdzad cing sangs rgyas kyi sa la bzhugs te sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
34b4(brgyad stong): dbyings su sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes des 'di ltar yang gnas par mi bya na des yang ji ltar
34b5(brgyad stong): 'di la gnas par bya ci ltar bsrab par bya snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus che dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu'i sems
34b6(brgyad stong): kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems de bzhin gshegs pa
34b7(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci zhig la gnas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa
34b8(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni ci la yang gnas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
35a1(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni shin tu mi gnas pa ste de ni 'dus byas kyi khams la yang mi gnas la 'dus
35a2(brgyad stong): ma byas kyi khams la yang mi gnas te de las bzhengs pa yang ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad
35a3(brgyad stong): ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di lta bu nyid du gnas par bya zhing 'di ltar bslab
35a4(brgyad stong): par bya ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'ga' zhig la gnas pa ma yin zhing mi gnas pa yang
35a5(brgyad stong): ma yin la mi mthun par gnas pa ma yin zhing mi mthun par mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du gnas par bya'o snyam pa dang / de bzhin gsheg
35a6(brgyad stong): pa'i gnas pa ci lta ba de bzhin du gnas par bya'o snyam zhing de bzhin du bslab par bya'o snyam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa ci lta ba de
35a7(brgyad stong): bzhin du gnas na mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis legs par gnas pa yin no snyam du 'dres de ltar bslab par bya'o// 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sem
35a8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen pos de ltar gnas par bya zhing de bzhin du bslab par bya ste/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha
35b1(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas shing yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral ba yin no// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sem
35b2(brgyad stong): par gyur te/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis gnod sbyin gyi skad dang gnod sbyin gyi sgra dang / gnod sbyin gyi tshig dang gnod sbyin gyi gtam du byas pa dang / gnod
35b3(brgyad stong): sbyin gyi rab tu brjod pa gang yin pa de dag smras pa ni shes par rung gi/ gnas brten rab 'byor gang 'chad pa dang rab tu rjod pa dang ston pa dang nye bar sto/
35b4(brgyad stong): po 'di ni shes par yang mi rung ngo snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid de
35b5(brgyad stong): lta bu sems kyis yongs su shes nas lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu dag shes par mi rung shes par mi rung zhes bya ba de ni 'di ltar 'di la cung zad
35b6(brgyad stong): kyang spros pa med de/ 'di la cung zad kyang thos pa med do// de nas lha'i bu de dag yang 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ e ma'o 'phags pa rab 'byor 'dis
35b7(brgyad stong): ni gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro// e ma'o 'phags pa rab 'byor 'dis ni gsal bar byed par 'gyur te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor ni ring ba bas kyang ches
35b8(brgyad stong): ring du 'jug pa 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni phra ba bas kyang ches phra ba zab pa bas kyang ches zab par 'jug pas ston cing 'chad do snyam mo// de nas yang
36a1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di
36a2(brgyad stong): skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag de lta bas na gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa
36a3(brgyad stong): des bzod pa 'di la ma rten par mi 'grub bo// de bzhin du sbyar te gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
36a4(brgyad stong): 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang
36a5(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'dod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang rang byang chub thob par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la
36a6(brgyad stong): gnas par 'dod pa des bzod pa 'di la ma rten par mi 'grub po// gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod cing bla na med pa
36a7(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa ras bzod pa 'di la ma rten par mi 'grub po// de nas yang lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems
36a8(brgyad stong): te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di la chos nyan pa rang bzhin ci lta bu zhig btsal bar bya snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
36b1(brgyad stong): gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu dag kho bo la chos nyan pa ni sgyu ma dang sprul pa lta bu
36b2(brgyad stong): dag btsal bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni nyan par mi 'gyur mngon du byed par mi 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa
36b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor yang ci sems can de dog sgyu ma lta bu yin gyi de dag sgyu ma ni ma yin nam/ de skad
36b4(brgyad stong): ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag sems can de dag ni sgyu ma lta bu lha'i bu
36b5(brgyad stong): dag sems can de dag ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ lha'i bu dag de ltar na sgyu ma dang sems can dag ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// de ltar na rmi lam
36b6(brgyad stong): dang sems can de dag ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// lha'i bu dag chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa
36b7(brgyad stong): yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang lan cig phyir
36b8(brgyad stong): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu
37a1(brgyad stong): ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rang sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lnga bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o//
37a2(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o//
37a3(brgyad stong): de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma
37a4(brgyad stong): lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes zer ram yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes zer ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
37a5(brgyad stong): lha'i bu dag mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bur smra na chos gzhan lta ci spros/ lha'i bu de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor
37a6(brgyad stong): mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes zer ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag bdag ni gal te mya ngan las
37a7(brgyad stong): 'das pa las khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos gzhan zhig yod kyang de yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes smra'o// lha'i bu dag de ltar na sgyu ma dang mya
37a8(brgyad stong): las 'das pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// de ltar na rmi lam dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// de
37b1(brgyad stong): nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bu dang tshe dang ldan pa lto rings chen po dang tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po dang tshe dang ldan
37b2(brgyad stong): pa 'od srungs chen po dang nyan thos chen po gzhan dag gis byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor
37b3(brgyad stong): la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di la su dag yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur/
37b4(brgyad stong): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gnas brtan de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
37b5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rnams sam/ lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'i gang zag rnams sam/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa gang yin pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
37b6(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gnas brtan de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//
37b7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bshad pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin pa su yang mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di
37b8(brgyad stong): la chos gang yang ma smos chos gang yang yongs su snang bar ma byas/ chos gang yang ma bzhag go/ de bas na ci ltar 'di la chos gang yang ma smos chos
38a1(brgyad stong): yang yongs su snang bar ma byas chos gang yang ma bzhag pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di
38a2(brgyad stong): la yang dag par 'dzin pa gang yang mi 'byung ngo // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor gyis de
38a3(brgyad stong): ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa la bdag gis kyang mchod pa'i don du 'di ltar me tog dag mngon par sprul te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor la mngon
38a4(brgyad stong): par gtor ro snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de'i tshe me tog dag mngon par sprul nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la mngon par gto
38a5(brgyad stong): to// de nas gnas brtan che dang ldan pa rab 'byor lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la rjes su brjod pa'i phyir 'di snyam du sems te/ yang 'di ltar
38a6(brgyad stong): lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni bdag gis sngon chad sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnas na yang yod par
38a7(brgyad stong): ma mthong ste/ me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa'o// 'di ltar lha rnams kyi dbang pos mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni shing dang gel ba dang 'a
38a8(brgyad stong): shing las skyes pa ma yin gyi yid las byung ba'i me tog go snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi
38b1(brgyad stong): sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni ma skyes
38b2(brgyad stong): pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid las skyes pa'i me tog ni gang yang med de shing dang grol ba dang 'khri shing las skyes pa yang ma yin no// de nas
38b3(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kau shi ka gang khyod 'di skad du me tog 'di dag ni ma skyes
38b4(brgyad stong): pa ste/ me tog 'di dag ni yid las skyes pa ma yin gyi/ shing dang gel ba dang 'khri shing las skyes pa yang ma yin no zhes zer na/ kau shi ka gang
38b5(brgyad stong): ma skyes pa de ni me tog ma yin no// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ e ma'o 'phags pa rab 'byor ni shes rab zab
38b6(brgyad stong): ste ming dang tshig tu btags pa de yang ston la de dang 'gal bar yang mi byed/ de nyid kyang gsal bar byed cing de nyid kyang nye bar ston to snyam mo// de
38b7(brgyad stong): nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/
38b8(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor ci skad du nye bar ston pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya'o// de skad ces
39a1(brgyad stong): smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smos so// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no de de
39a2(brgyad stong): bzhin te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' byos 'di la bslab par bya'o// kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob
39a3(brgyad stong): na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mi slob po// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi slob phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi slob dgra bcom pa nyid la
39a4(brgyad stong): mi slob po// rang sangs rgyas nyid la mi slob/ sangs rgyas nyid la mi slob ste/ gangs 'di dag la mi slob pa de ni sangs rgyas nyid dang thams cad
39a5(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid la slob po// gang sangs rgyas nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal du med grangs med pa la
39a6(brgyad stong): slob po// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal du med grangs med pa la slob pa de ni gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//
39a7(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin de rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob
39a8(brgyad stong): po/ gang gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa dang gang tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma
39b1(brgyad stong): yin gang rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa de ni gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang dor bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob po//
39b2(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin de rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang dor bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob
39b3(brgyad stong): po/ chos 'ga' zhig yongs su gzung ba'i phyir yang mi slob ste/ skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob po// gang chos 'ga' zhig yongs su
39b4(brgyad stong): gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye
39b5(brgyad stong): ba'i phyir mi slob mi nub pa'i phyir mi slob ste/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing
39b6(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//
39b7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos 'ga' zhig yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub
39b8(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir mi slob pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob na/ tshe dang ldan
40a1(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing thams cad mkhyen
40a2(brgyad stong): pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan
40a3(brgyad stong): pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos 'ga' zhig yongs su bzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir
40a4(brgyad stong): mi slob pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob sangs rgyas kyi chos
40a5(brgyad stong): rnams kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub seMs
40a6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha rnams kyi
40a7(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
40a8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang las btsal bar bya/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
40b1(brgyad stong): pa ni tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis le'u las btsal bar bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i
40b2(brgyad stong): bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar 'phags pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di su'i mthur
40b3(brgyad stong): rig par bya 'di su'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus smras pa/ kau shi ka tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
40b4(brgyad stong): 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthur rig par bya/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang
40b5(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kau shi ka gang 'di skad du 'phags pa rab 'byor gang shes kyi pha rol
40b6(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di su'i mthur rig par bya 'di su'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ kau shi ka bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
40b7(brgyad stong): pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthur rig par bya'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya'o// kau
40b8(brgyad stong): ka gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang las btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni/ kau shi ka
41a1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzugs las btsal bar mi bya/ gzugs las gzhan
41a2(brgyad stong): du yang btsal bar mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba las ma yin 'du shes las ma yin/ 'du byed rnams las ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las bcal
41a3(brgyad stong): bar mi bya rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar gzugs ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
41a4(brgyad stong): yin/ gzugs las gzhan na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin 'du shes ma yin 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam
41a5(brgyad stong): par shes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin rnam par shes pa las gzhan na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// de skad ces smras pa dang lha/
41a6(brgyad stong): rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
41a7(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'phags pa
41a8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
41b1(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de de bzhin no kau shi ka de de bzhin te/ kau shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes
41b2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
41b3(brgyad stong): kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha'
41b4(brgyad stong): yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs che ba'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen
41b5(brgyad stong): po'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa che ba'i phyir kau shi ka 'di ltar ste shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pa
41b6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// gzugs tshad ma med pa'i phyir ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
41b7(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes tshad me med pa'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med/
41b8(brgyad stong): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin du
42a1(brgyad stong): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
42a2(brgyad stong): ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin
42a3(brgyad stong): pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir kau shi ka 'di lta de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
42a4(brgyad stong): ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa chen po zhes bya bar mngon par chags par mi byed do// de bzhin du tshad ma med
42a5(brgyad stong): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du chad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang de bzhin du mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya
42a6(brgyad stong): bar mngon par chags par mi byed do// kau shi ka de ltar bas na 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i
42a7(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka 'di ni mtha' yas po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka dmigs pa mtha' yas pa
42a8(brgyad stong): phyir/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mthas yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes
42b1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka yang ci ltar na dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol
42b2(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi thog ma dang dbus dang tha ma mi dmigs te de bas na
42b3(brgyad stong): kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ kau shi ka rnam grangs 'dis dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
42b4(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka gzhan yang gang gi phyir 'di ltar chos thams cad mtha' yas
42b5(brgyad stong): mu med de/ de rnams kyi thog pa 'am dbus sam tha ma yang mi dmigs te/ de bas na kau shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas
42b6(brgyad stong): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka gzugs kyi thog ma 'am dbus sam tha ma yang mi dmigs so// kau sha~M ka de bzhin du tshor ba dang
42b7(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i thog ma 'am dbus sam tha ma yang mi dmigs te/ kau shi ka rnam grangs 'dis kyang dmigs pa mtha'
42b8(brgyad stong): yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas mu
43a1(brgyad stong): med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can la thog ma 'am dbus sam tha ma yang mi dmigs so// kau shi ka de bas na sems can mtha'
43a2(brgyad stong): yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis che dang
43a3(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor ji ltar na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
43a4(brgyad stong): 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka bgrang ba dang mi ldan pa 'am/ bgrang ba mang pos
43a5(brgyad stong): sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// brgya byin gyis smras pa/
43a6(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor 'o na ci ltar sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu
43a7(brgyad stong): phyin pa zhes bya/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta ste sems can zhes bya ba 'di chos gang gi tshig
43a8(brgyad stong): bla dgas yin/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni chos kyi tshig bla dgas
43b1(brgyad stong): chos med pa'i tshig bla dgas kyang ma
43b2(brgyad stong): kyang ma yin te ming du btags pa 'di ni glo bur du byung ba'o// ming du btags pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'o// ming du btags pa 'di ni bdag gi ba
43b3(brgyad stong): med pa'o// 'di lta ste/ sems can sems can zhes ming du btags pa 'di ni dmigs su med pa'o// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
43b4(brgyad stong): kau shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems 'di la sems can du yongs su bstan par byas pa gang yang yod dam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa
43b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gang sems can du yongs su bstan par byas pa 'ga' zhig med pa de la sems can mtha'
43b6(brgyad stong): yas pa yod dam/ kau shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du
43b7(brgyad stong): yang bzhugs te/ mtha' las 'das pa rnam par rig par byed pa'i dbyangs dang gsung sa byangs zab mos sems can sems can zhes tshig tu brjod du zin
43b8(brgyad stong): kyang de la sems can gang yang skyes pa 'am skye bar 'gyur ba 'am skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba 'am 'gag pa yod dam/ brgya byin gyis
43b9(brgyad stong): smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog ma nas dag pa'i phyir dang thog ma nas yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro//
44a1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
44a2(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// kau shi ka de ltar yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas
44a3(brgyad stong): par rig par bya'o// de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa dang / drang srong dang bcas
44a4(brgyad stong): pa dang / skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams kyis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/ e ma'o chos e ma'o chos e ma'o chos rnam
44a5(brgyad stong): kyi chos nyid de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis legs par smras pas brjod cing bstan te bshad la rab tu
44a6(brgyad stong): bzhag go/ bcom ldan 'das deng sran chad bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba dang /
44a7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa legs par 'dzin
44a8(brgyad stong): to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang po bcas pa'i lha rnams dang tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa dang drang srong dang bcas pa dang /
44b1(brgyad stong): skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na mar me
44b2(brgyad stong): can zhes bya ba'i tshong dus kyi dbus su mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi drang nang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
44b3(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di dang bral bar gyur pas/ de'i tshe mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bram ze'i khye'u
44b4(brgyad stong): khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa na shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
44b5(brgyad stong): dang rkang par ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten rig pa skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
44b6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu de dag giso 'di skad
44b7(brgyad stong): ces bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgrub par
44b8(brgyad stong): byed pa dang rjes su 'dzin par byed pa ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to zhes gsol to// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong/
45a1(brgyad stong): pa las brgya byin gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa//
45a2(brgyad stong): bam po gsum pa// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor der lha'i bu gang dag 'dus te 'khod par gyur pa dang dge slong dang dge
45a3(brgyad stong): slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gang dag 'dus te 'khod par gyur pa dang / lha'i bu de rnams 'dus te 'khod par gyur par mkhyen cing 'khor
45a4(brgyad stong): bzhi po thams cad 'dus shing 'khod par yang mkhyen nas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang 'od
45a5(brgyad stong): gsal dang dge chung dang 'og min gyi lha'i bu rnams dpang du bzhag ste/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang
45a6(brgyad stong): tshangs pa chen po la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
45a7(brgyad stong): bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ rab tu 'don na/ de la bdud dam bdud
45a8(brgyad stong): kyi ris kyi lha grags lta ba dang / glags tshol ba dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la mi 'am mi ma yin pa glags/
45b1(brgyad stong): lta ba dang glags tshol ba rnams kyis grags rnyed par yang mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang yang ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byed par
45b2(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dag gzhan yang lha'i bu gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang lha'i bu gang dag gis
45b3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma bzung ba dang ma bcad sa pa dang kun chub par ma byas pa dang / rab tu mi 'don pa'i lha'i bu de dag rigs kyi bu de'i
45b4(brgyad stong): drung du 'ong 'dod par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
45b5(brgyad stong): rab tu 'don pa de la nyan par 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ rab tu
45b6(brgyad stong): 'don par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dag de zhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa
45b7(brgyad stong): dang kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de dgon par song yang rung shing drung du song yang rung khyim stong du song yang rung bla gab med par song yang rung
45b8(brgyad stong): lam du song yang rung lam gol bar song yang rung 'brog dgon par song yang rung rgya mtsho chen por song yang rung de dang der 'gro ba 'am 'chag pa 'am/
46a1(brgyad stong): 'dug pa 'am nyal ba na yang rung ste/ 'jigs par 'gyur ba 'am rengs par 'gyur ba nyid mi 'byung mi skye'o// de nas bcom ldan
46a2(brgyad stong): 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
46a3(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de ni theg pa gsum gyis sems can rnams 'dul bar bgyid
46a4(brgyad stong): cing sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi skyed pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha
46a5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o//
46a6(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
46a7(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de dag la bsrung ba
46a8(brgyad stong): dang bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pas kyang 'di skad ces
46b1(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog
46b2(brgyad stong): pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi
46b3(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba
46b4(brgyad stong): dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa de tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag nges par 'thob cing yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba ngo mtshar to// bco
46b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das yang ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung na pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad bzung bar 'gyur ram/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
46b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau shi ka de de bzhin no de bzhin te/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu
46b7(brgyad stong): phyin pa bzung bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad bzung bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang
46b8(brgyad stong): ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don par byed na kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di la yon tan gang dag 'dzin par 'gyur
47a1(brgyad stong): ba de dag thams cad legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po
47a2(brgyad stong): brgya byin gyis legs so zhes gsol nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces
47a3(brgyad stong): bka' stsal to// kau shi ka de la gang zhig chos 'di la rtsod par 'dod pa dang rgol bar 'dod pa dang 'gal bar byed 'dod na/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang rgol bar
47a4(brgyad stong): 'dod pa dang 'gal bar byed 'dod pa de dag gi rtsod pa dang rgol ba dang 'gal bar byed pa skyes shing skyes pa rnams slar nub pa nyid du 'gyur zhing gnas par
47a5(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur te/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang rgol bar 'dod pa dang 'gal bar byed 'dod pa de dag gi bsam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// de/
47a6(brgyad stong): ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'gyur te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang
47a7(brgyad stong): klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lug 'bog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa de'i rtsod pa'i gzhi
47a8(brgyad stong): ltar skyes shing skyes pa de dag slar yang nub pa nyid du 'gyur zhing gnas par mi 'gyur te/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang rgol bar 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar
47b1(brgyad stong): byed 'dod pa de dag gri bsam pa de ltar yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
47b2(brgyad stong): 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton
47b3(brgyad stong): du byed pa de tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na rtsi ma g+hi zhes bya ba dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar
47b4(brgyad stong): byed pa zhig yod de der skye bo sbrul gdug pa bkres shing zas 'dod de zas tshol ba zhig gis srog chags su gyur pa 'ga' zhig mthong ste skye bo sbrul gdug
47b5(brgyad stong): pa des zas kyi phyir bza' bar 'dod nas srog chags su gyur pa de'i dri'i phyogs su 'brang zhing bsgrags pa dang de nas srog chags su gyur pa de rtsim g+hi gang
47b6(brgyad stong): na yod pa der song nas phyin te 'dug pa dang de nas sbrul de rtsi de'i dri tsam gyis phyir ldog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar sbrul gyi gdug pa zil gyis gnon
47b7(brgyad stong): pa de ni rtsi de'i sman gyi yon tan du blta bar bya ste rtsi de ni de ltar mthu che'o// kau shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
47b8(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang sten pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed
48a1(brgyad stong): pa de la ni kau shi ka rtsod pa dang rgol ba dang 'gal bar byed pa'i gzhi skyes shing skyes pa gang yin pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
48a2(brgyad stong): gzi brjid dang stobs dang mthu dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs bskyed pas myur du de nyid nas med par 'gyur nye bar zhi zhing 'phel bar mi 'gyur te
48a3(brgyad stong): de gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid nas 'gag cing nub par 'gyur la gnas par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dod
48a4(brgyad stong): chags la sogs pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa nyid kyi bar du 'dzin pa dag nye bar zhi bar byed de rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no// kau shi ka rgyal po
48a5(brgyad stong): chen po bzhi dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
48a6(brgyad stong): cad kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don
48a7(brgyad stong): pa dang ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton du byed pa de la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang smra bar byed de des tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag yongs su bzung bar
48a8(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'om rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par
48b1(brgyad stong): byed pa dang rab tu ston na pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton du byed pa de'i tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur tshig 'jam par 'gyu
48b2(brgyad stong): tshig ran par 'gyur tshig 'chal pa med par 'gyur ro// khro bos zil gyis non par mi 'gyur/ nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir
48b3(brgyad stong): zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su dul bar byed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su 'dud par byed de khro ba 'phel bar mi
48b4(brgyad stong): byed/ nga rgyal 'phel bar mi byed khon du 'dzin pa yongs su mi 'chang gnod sems yongs su mi 'chang la bag la nyal mi 'dzin to// rigs kyi bu 'am
48b5(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo de ltar spyod pa de la dran pa dang byams pa skye bar 'gyur zhing de 'di snyam du sems te gal te bdag gis gnod sems bskyed du zin na
48b6(brgyad stong): bdag gi dbang po rnams 'khrugs shing bzhin gyi mdog kyang 'gyur bas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs shing
48b7(brgyad stong): 'di la slob par 'dod pa khro ba'i dbang du 'gro ba 'di ni mi rigs so snyam nas de myur du dran pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
48b8(brgyad stong): mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang
49a1(brgyad stong): lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton du byed par 'gyur ba des tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de skad ces
49a2(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol phyin
49a3(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su dul ba dang khengs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ngo mtshar to//
49a4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par 'gyur
49a5(brgyad stong): 'chang bar 'gyur klog par 'gyur kun chub par byed par 'gyur rab tu 'don par 'gyur ston par 'gyur nye bar ston par 'gyur lung 'bogs par 'gyur kha ton
49a6(brgyad stong): byed par 'gyur zhing gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ma de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed
49a7(brgyad stong): ba dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pas g.yul 'gyed pa'i che g.yul du thog mar zhugs par gyur na de
49a8(brgyad stong): g.yul du 'jug gam g.yul du zhugs sam g.yul las 'das sam ga yul gyi nang du 'gro 'am 'greng ngam 'dug kyang rung ste/ kau shi ka rigs
49b1(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yid la 'dzin pa 'am 'chang ba 'am/ klog pa 'am kun chub par byed pa 'am/ rab tu
49b2(brgyad stong): 'don pa 'am ston pa 'am nye bar ston pa 'am/ lung 'bogs pa 'am kha ton byed pa de srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni gnas ma yin/
49b3(brgyad stong): zhing go skabs med do// gzhan gyi gnod pa byed pas de srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba 'di yang gnas ma yin no// kau shi ka yang gal te 'ga' zhig gis
49b4(brgyad stong): de la dbyug pa 'am mtshon nam bong ba 'am gzhan gang yang rungs pas 'phangs na de'i lus la phog par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka
49b5(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o// kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i rig
49b6(brgyad stong): sngags so// kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chad med pa'i rig sngags so// kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
49b7(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rig sngags so// kau shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa med pa'i rig sngags so// kau shi ka 'di
49b8(brgyad stong): lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka rig sngag sa 'di la slob pa'i
50a1(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ni bdag la gnod pa bya bar yang mi sems gzhan la gnod pa bya bar yang mi sems gnyis ka
50a2(brgyad stong): la gnod pa bya bar yang mi sems so// kau shi ka rig sngags 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bla na med pa yang dag
50a3(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
50a4(brgyad stong): kau shi ka rig sngags 'di la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gang ma thob pa 'am ma shes pa 'am mngon sum du ma byas
50a5(brgyad stong): pa gang yang med do// de de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o// kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
50a6(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs
50a7(brgyad stong): pa dang kha ton du byed par 'gyur ba des tshe 'di la yon tan 'di yang yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka gzhan yang gang du shes rab kyi pha rol
50a8(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di chung ngu na bris te glegs bam du chud par byas shing mchod pa sngon du byas te bzhag nas bkur stir byed la/ mi 'dzin mi 'chang mi klog
50b1(brgyad stong): kun chub par mi byed rab tu 'don par mi byed ston par mi byed nye bar ston par mi byed lung 'bogs par mi byed kha ton mi byed pa der yang kau shi ka sngon gyi/
50b2(brgyad stong): las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par sems can rnams la mi dang mi ma yin pa grags lta ba dag gis glags bltas kyang grags rnyed par mi 'gyur
50b3(brgyad stong): te de ni gnas med do// kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di la yon tan 'di yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka 'di lta ste
50b4(brgyad stong): dper na gang dag byang chub kyi snying po na 'dug pa dang byang chub kyi snying po'i khor yug na 'dug pa dang byang chub kyi snying po'i nang na 'dug pa dang byang chub kyi
50b5(brgyad stong): shing gi rtsa ba na 'dug pa'i ming dang mi ma yin pa dang byol song yan chad kyang sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis
50b6(brgyad stong): gtse ba 'am gnod par bya ba 'am 'bebs par byed mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang dag sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa dang khon med par
50b7(brgyad stong): dang mi skrag pa rab tu sgom par mdzad cing rab tu ston par mdzad pa 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
50b8(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams der mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang mngon par rdzogs par
51a1(brgyad stong): 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin du kau shi ka gang du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'dzin pa dang
51a2(brgyad stong): 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton du byed pa der kau shi ka
51a3(brgyad stong): sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par sems can mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis gtse ba'am gnod par bya ba 'am 'bebs par byed mi nus so//
51a4(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis sa phyogs de sems can rnams kyi mchod rten du gyur par byas pa dang phyag bya ba dang rjed
51a5(brgyad stong): par bya ba dang mchod par bya ba dang ri mor bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur du bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang bla mar bya ba dang der nye bar phyin pa'i sems can rnams
51a6(brgyad stong): kyi skyob pa dang skyabs dang gnas dang dpung gnyen du 'gyur bar byas pas so// kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di la phan yon 'di dag
51a7(brgyad stong): kyang yongs su 'dzin to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
51a8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas glegs bam du chud par bgyis te bzhag la/ de la lha'i me
51b1(brgyad stong): tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang / lha'i na bza' dang lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril
51b2(brgyad stong): bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang kho ra yug tu lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po drag gis bkur stir bgyis pa dang bla mar bgyis pa
51b3(brgyad stong): dang / rjed par dang mchod pa dang ri mor bgyis pa dang bsnyen bskur bgyis pa dang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
51b4(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung dag mchod rten gyi nang du stsal te yongs su 'dzin cing 'chang la de dag la yang de bzhin du lha'i
51b5(brgyad stong): me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang / lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang / lha'i na bza' dang lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang
51b6(brgyad stong): lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang khor yug tu lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir bgyis pa dang bla mar bgyis
51b7(brgyad stong): pa dang rjed pa dang mchod pa dang ri mor bgyis pa dang bsnyen bkur bgyis na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de gnyis gang bsod nams ches mang du
51b8(brgyad stong): skyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau shi ka de'i phyir
52a1(brgyad stong): 'di khyod nyid la dri bar bya ste khyod kyis ci ltar nus pa de bzhin du lung ston cig/ kau shi ka 'di ci snyam du sems/ de bzhin gsheg
52a2(brgyad stong): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bdag gi dngos po mngon par grub pa gang yin pa des lam gang
52a3(brgyad stong): zhig la bsrabs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
52a4(brgyad stong): dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes shing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis
52a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
52a6(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
52a7(brgyad stong): brnyes shing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de lta bas na 'o na ni bdag gi dngos po'i sku 'di
52a8(brgyad stong): brnyes pas de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su mi 'gro'i// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa
52b1(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thams cad
52b2(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba yin zhing / kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag gi dngos po'i sku brnyes pa
52b3(brgyad stong): 'di yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa las byung ba yin te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rten du gyur pa yin no// rten 'di la
52b4(brgyad stong): rten nas ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu 'byed par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu 'byed par yang 'gyur/ chos kyi sku rab tu 'byed par yang
52b5(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ dge 'dun gyi sku rab tu 'byed par yang 'gyur ro// de ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu bdag gi dngos po'i sku brnyes pa gang yin
52b6(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rten du gyur pas na/ sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur cing phyag bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang bla mar
52b7(brgyad stong): bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang mchod par bya ba dang ri mor bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya bar gyur pa yin la/ de bzhin du nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang
52b8(brgyad stong): deg la yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// de bas na kau shaM ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas glegs bam
53a1(brgyad stong): du chud par byas te bzhag la/ de la lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i
53a2(brgyad stong): na bza' dang lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang khor yug tu lha'i mar me phreng ba dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po
53a3(brgyad stong): dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rig
53a4(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mchod
53a5(brgyad stong): pa byas par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dri ba na glegs bam du chud pa 'di la bkur stir
53a6(brgyad stong): byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag byed na 'di nyid de las bsod nams ches mang du skyed
53a7(brgyad stong): // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byed pa des thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mchod pa byas par 'gyur//
53a8(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling
53b1(brgyad stong): 'di'i mi gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri bar mi bgyid/ 'dzin par mi bgyid/ 'chang bar mi bgyid/ klog par mi bgyid/ kun chub par
53b2(brgyad stong): mi bgyid/ rab tu 'don par mi bgyid/ ston par mi bgyid/ nye bar ston par mi bgyid/ lung 'bogs par mi bgyid/ kha ton du mi bgyid/ shes
53b3(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang gdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan
53b4(brgyad stong): ngag dang khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par mi bgyid de/ bkur stir mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ rjed
53b5(brgyad stong): bar mi bgyid/ mchod par mi bgyid/ ri mor mi bgyid/ bsnyen bkur mi bgyid pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ci bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i
53b6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bgyid pa de ltar don chen po can du ma 'tshal lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das ci bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung
53b7(brgyad stong): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bgyis pa de ltar phan yon chen po dang ldan par rtogs par ma gyur lags sam/ de ltar 'bras bu
53b8(brgyad stong): che ba dang rnam par smin pa che bar des rig par ma gyur lags sam/ 'on te 'tshal cing rtogs la rig kyang slar zhing dad par ma gyur pa lags/ de skad
54a1(brgyad stong): ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau shi ka 'di ci
54a2(brgyad stong): snyam du sems 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag las gang dag sangs rgyas la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang gang dag chos la rtogs nas dad pa dang
54a3(brgyad stong): ldan pa dang gang dag dge 'dun la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa ci snyed cig yod/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnam
54a4(brgyad stong): kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag las gang dag sangs rgyas la rtogs nas dang pa/
54a5(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa dang gang dag chos la rtogs nas dad pa dang / gang dag dge 'dun la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo // de skad ces gsol
54a6(brgyad stong): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau shi ka de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling
54a7(brgyad stong): gi mi de dag las gang dag sangs rgyas la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang gang dag chos la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang gang dag dge 'dun la rtogs
54a8(brgyad stong): nas dad pa dang ldan pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo // kau shi ka gang dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag lan cig/
54b1(brgyad stong): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang
54b2(brgyad stong): ches nyung ngo // gang dag rang byang chub mngon du byed pa ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ses
54b3(brgyad stong): bskyed pa de ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sems bskyed pa de rab
54b4(brgyad stong): tu rgyas par byed pa de ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de sems bskyed
54b5(brgyad stong): pa rgyas par byas nas brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas pa de ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal
54b6(brgyad stong): 'byor du byed pa de ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo //
54b7(brgyad stong): gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'bad de phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo //
54b8(brgyad stong): gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'bad de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ni
55a1(brgyad stong): nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'bad de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
55a2(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
55a3(brgyad stong): dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/
55a4(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing 'bad pa gzhan rnams la shes rab
55a5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar ston cing lung 'bogs pa dang de dag la yang 'dzin du 'jug pa dang 'chang du 'jug pa dang klog tu 'jug pa dang kun chub
55a6(brgyad stong): par byed du 'jug pa dang rab tu 'don du 'jug pa dang ston du 'jug pa dang nye bar ston du 'jug pa dang lung 'bogs su 'jug pa dang kha tor byed du 'jug
55a7(brgyad stong): pa de dang de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na
55a8(brgyad stong): bza' dang / lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang khor yug tu lha'i mer me'i phreng ba dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa
55b1(brgyad stong): mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed/ rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed pa dag yin no// kau shi ka yang
55b2(brgyad stong): gang dag byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas byang chub kyi sems rgyas par byed cing byang chub kyi sems rab tu rgyas par byas te byang
55b3(brgyad stong): chub tu spyod pa'i sems can dag ni gzhal du med pa grangs med par yod mod kyi/ ko'u shi ka yang sems can gzhal du med pa grangs med pa byang chub kyi
55b4(brgyad stong): phyir spyod pa de dag las gal te na gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
55b5(brgyad stong): ka bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni brtson 'grus zhan pa dang le lo can dang sems pa dman pa dang sems dman pa dang 'du shes dman pa
55b6(brgyad stong): dang mos pa dman pa dang shes rab dman pa rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o// kau shi ka de bas na de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang myur du bde ba
55b7(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas rgyun mi 'chad par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan
55b8(brgyad stong): par bya'o// gzung bar bya'o bcang bar bya'o klag par bya'o kun chub par bya'o rab tu gdon par bya'o bstan par bya'o nye bar bstan par bya'o// lung 'bog
56a1(brgyad stong): par bya'o// kha ton du bya'o yongs su dri bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'di snyam
56a2(brgyad stong): du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
56a3(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs pas/ bdag cag gis kyang 'di la bslab par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag cag gi ston pa'o zhes shes
56a4(brgyad stong): te/ kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs kyang rung yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/
56a5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya'o// kau shi ka de bas na de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am
56a6(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mchod
56a7(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po can bye ba du ma byed du bcug ste/ byas nas kyang des
56a8(brgyad stong): de la nam 'tshe ba'i bar du lha'i me tog dang / lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang lha'i
56b1(brgyad stong): gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan ngag dang kho ra yug tu lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis
56b2(brgyad stong): mchod par byed de bkur bstir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ ci rigs kyi
56b3(brgyad stong): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang
56b4(brgyad stong): ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/ gang shes
56b5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang pas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang
56b6(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang /
56b7(brgyad stong): gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par storan pa dang 'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang ci lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir
56b8(brgyad stong): yongs su dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du
57a1(brgyad stong): gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub pa byas
57a2(brgyad stong): par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par byas te 'chang ngam bzhag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba
57a3(brgyad stong): dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam
57a4(brgyad stong): pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am
57a5(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams kyi phung po mang du skyed do// kau shi kA rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs
57a6(brgyad stong): pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can bye ba du ma lta zhog/ kau shi ka yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las 'dzam bu'i gling 'di kun tu rin po che sna bdun
57a7(brgyad stong): gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can gyis yongs su gang bar byed du bcug ste/ byas nas kyang de dag la nam 'tshe ba'i
57a8(brgyad stong): bar du lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang lha'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril
57b1(brgyad stong): bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang khor yug tu lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par
57b2(brgyad stong): byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka de ci snyam du sems ci rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed dam
57b3(brgyad stong): brgya byin gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu
57b4(brgyad stong): 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'dis bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub
57b5(brgyad stong): tu sems bskyed nas lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog po dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang /
57b6(brgyad stong): lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang gzhan dag la yang dag par ston pa dang 'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang ci lta bur grub pa'i shes
57b7(brgyad stong): rab kyis 'dir yongs su dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring
57b8(brgyad stong): du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa sgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs
58a1(brgyad stong): bam du chud par byas te 'chang ngas bzhag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma
58a2(brgyad stong): dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang kho ra yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/
58a3(brgyad stong): bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams
58a4(brgyad stong): mang du skyed do// kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can rnams kyis yod
58a5(brgyad stong): su gang ba lta zhog/ kau shi ka yang gal te gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad las sems can re res
58a6(brgyad stong): rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can re re byed du bcug ste/ de dag la nam 'tshe ba'i bar du lha'i me toH
58a7(brgyad stong): dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lhan
58a8(brgyad stong): ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod pa byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed
58b1(brgyad stong): mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka de ci snyam du sems ci sems can de dag thams cad de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/
58b2(brgyad stong): brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang
58b3(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'dis bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dang de rtog cing mos la
58b4(brgyad stong): sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu
58b5(brgyad stong): 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang 'di'i don rnam par
58b6(brgyad stong): 'grel pa dang yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang ci lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongs su dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshu la rgyun chad par
58b7(brgyad stong): ma gyur cig dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
58b8(brgyad stong): chen po rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par byas te 'chang ngam/ bzhag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
59a1(brgyad stong): pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang
59a2(brgyad stong): khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed
59a3(brgyad stong): bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de'i gzhi las bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i
59a4(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad lta zhog/ kau shi ka yang stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams
59a5(brgyad stong): cad las sems can re res rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can re re byed du bcug ste/ de dag la ni
59a6(brgyad stong): 'tsho ba'i bar du lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang / lha'i byug pa dang lha'i bye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang lha'i gdugs dang lha'i
59a7(brgyad stong): rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lnga'i ba dan dag dang khor yug tu lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de bkur
59a8(brgyad stong): stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems ci sems can de dag thams cad de'i gzhi la
59b1(brgyad stong): bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
59b2(brgyad stong): kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di ches bsod nams mang du skyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog
59b3(brgyad stong): cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed
59b4(brgyad stong): pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang
59b5(brgyad stong): 'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang ji lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyi 'dir yongs su dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul
59b6(brgyad stong): rgyun chad par ma gyur cig dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems
59b7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par byas te 'chang ngam bzhag la shes rab
59b8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag
60a1(brgyad stong): dang khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par
60a2(brgyad stong): byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de'i gzhi las bsod nams ches mang du skyed do//
60a3(brgyad stong): kau shi ka stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta zhog/ kau shaM ka yang stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed cig
60a4(brgyad stong): yod pa de dag thams cad las sems can re res rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can der byed du
60a5(brgyad stong): bcug ste/ de dag la nas 'tshe ba'i bar du lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang / lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza'
60a6(brgyad stong): dang / lha'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dang khor yug tu lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis
60a7(brgyad stong): mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka de ci snyam du sems ci sems can
60a8(brgyad stong): de dag thams cad de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
60b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'dis bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// gang shes rag
60b2(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang
60b3(brgyad stong): 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang gzhan dag la
60b4(brgyad stong): yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang 'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang / ci lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongs
60b5(brgyad stong): su dpyod par byed pa dang sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par
60b6(brgyad stong): bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs
60b7(brgyad stong): bam du chud par byas te 'chang ngam bzhag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na
60b8(brgyad stong): bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang kho ra yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod
61a1(brgyad stong): par byed de/ bkur stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur bye na/ kau shri ka rigs kyi bu 'am
61a2(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de'i gzhi las bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// kau shi ka stong gnyis pa bar mi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
61a3(brgyad stong): thams cad lta zhog/ kau shri ka yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad las sems
61a4(brgyad stong): can de dag re res rin po che sde bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can re re byed du bcug ste/ de dag la nam
61a5(brgyad stong): 'tshe ba'i bar du lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal
61a6(brgyad stong): mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang khor yug tu lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur
61a7(brgyad stong): stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ kau shi ka de ci snyam du sems ci sems can de dag thams cad de'i gzhi las
61a8(brgyad stong): bsod nams ches mang du skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
61b1(brgyad stong): kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'dis bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de
61b2(brgyad stong): rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par
61b3(brgyad stong): byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang 'di'i
61b4(brgyad stong): don rnam par 'grel pa dang yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang ci lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongs su dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun
