114a6(brgyad stong): 'di nye bar gtad na kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni nges par
114a7(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka
114a8(brgyad stong): gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur la/ de dag
114b1(brgyad stong): nyid la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bar byas nas byin zhing nye bar gtad de/ don dang
114b2(brgyad stong): bcas shing yi ge dang bcas pa nye bar ston na/ kau shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ ci rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/
114b3(brgyad stong): brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi phung po de grangs su bgyi bar sra ba ma
114b4(brgyad stong): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi phung po de bgrang bar yang dper yang dpes bstan par bgyi bar yang rten du yang rgyur yang bgyi bar sla ba ma
114b5(brgyad stong): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di ches bsod nams mang du skyed de/ gang gis
114b6(brgyad stong): phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa
114b7(brgyad stong): de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bri ba byas nas byin zhing nye bar gtad de don dang bcas pa nye bar ston pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol
114b8(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa'o// kau shi ka yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog par gyur pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
115a1(brgyad stong): @phyin pa 'di nye bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can
115a2(brgyad stong): ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur la de dag la yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo//
115a3(brgyad stong): gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bri ba byas nas byin zhing nye bar gtad la don dang bcas shing yi ge dang bcas pa nye bar
115a4(brgyad stong): ston pa dang / kau shi ka yang gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog par gyur pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar gtang
115a5(brgyad stong): pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ kau shi ka stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag
115a6(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur la de dag la yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam
115a7(brgyad stong): la bri ba byas nas byin zhing nye bar gtad de don dang bcas shing yi ge dang bcas pa nye bar ston pa dang / kau shi ka yang stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams
115a8(brgyad stong): cad phyir mi ldog par gyur pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lto zhog/ kau shi ka stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten
115b1(brgyad stong): gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur la de dag la yang rigs kyi bu 'am/
115b2(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bri ba byas nas byin zhing nye bar gtad de don dang bcas shing yi ge dang bcas pa nye bar
115b3(brgyad stong): ston pa dang / kau shi ka yang stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog par gyur pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye
115b4(brgyad stong): bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang
115b5(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur la de dag la yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
115b6(brgyad stong): pa 'di glegs bam la bri ba byas nas byin zhing nye bar gtad de don dang bcas shing yi ge dang bcas pa nye bar ston pa dang / kau shi ka yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
115b7(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/
115b8(brgyad stong): kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
116a1(brgyad stong): @pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur la de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la
116a2(brgyad stong): bri ba byas nas byin zhing nye bar gtad de don dang bcas shing yi ge dang bcas pa nye bar ston na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems ci rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi
116a3(brgyad stong): las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi phung po
116a4(brgyad stong): de grangs su bgyi bar sla ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi phung po de bgrang bar yang dper yang dpes bstan par bgyi bar yang rten du yang rgyur
116a5(brgyad stong): yang bgyi bar sla ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di ches bsod nams mang du skyed de/
116a6(brgyad stong): gang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa de dag
116a7(brgyad stong): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bri ba byas nas byin zhing nye bar gtad de don dang bcas shing yi ge dang bcas pa nye bar ston cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
116a8(brgyad stong): 'di 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang / kau shi ka de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan zhig byung ste de 'di skad du bdag ni 'di dag pas ches myur du bla na med
116b1(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes zer ne/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gis mngon par shes par/
116b2(brgyad stong): shin tu myu ra du'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'doms shing rjes su ston na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de bas
116b3(brgyad stong): 'di nyid ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
116b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci lta ci ltar bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par
116b5(brgyad stong): bgyi shing rjes su bstan par bgyi ba lags so// de lta de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi ba dang rjes su bstan par bgyi ba lags pas
116b6(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid la nye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid la nye bar gyur na gang dag gi gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang bro tshal ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnams
116b7(brgyad stong): yongs su spyad pa de dag gi bya ba byas pa de dag 'bras bu chen po dang phan yon chen por bgyid pa des na de bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// de ci'i slad du she na/
116b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ba 'di ni de lta bu nyid lags
117a1(brgyad stong): pa'i srad du'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kau shi ka gang khyod byang chub sems
117a2(brgyad stong): dnga'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la spro ba sbyin pa dang yongs su 'dzin pa dang rjes su sten par byed pa ni legs so legs so// kau shi ka khyod kyi bya ba ni 'di yin te/
117a3(brgyad stong): 'phags pa nyan thos gang zhig sems can thams cad rjes su 'dzin par byed 'dod pa des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag
117a4(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la spro ba 'phel bar byed pa dang yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang rjes su sten par byed pa de ltar 'di bya ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub
117a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'di las skyes te/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
117a6(brgyad stong): rnams kyis byang chub kyi sems 'di ma bskyed du zin na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la slob par yang
117a7(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob par yang mi 'gyur la ma bslabs na ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur
117a8(brgyad stong): ba zhig na/ gang gi phyir de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la slob ste de'i phyir byang chub tu
117b1(brgyad stong): sems bskyed do// de'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa
117b2(brgyad stong): las/ bsod nams kyi rnam grangs kyi le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas
117b3(brgyad stong): gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba yongs
117b4(brgyad stong): su bsngo ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / gang yang sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang tshul
117b5(brgyad stong): khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
117b6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba yongs su bsngo ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di nyid mchog ces bya'o dam pa zhes bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o rab ces bya'o//
117b7(brgyad stong): mchog rab ces bya'o gya nom pa zhes bya'o bla ma zhes bya'o bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong na med pa zhes bya'o mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes
117b8(brgyad stong): bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
118a1(brgyad stong): byams pa yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis thams cad nas thams cad du song ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ stong gsuM
118a2(brgyad stong): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa'i gzhal du med pa/ grangs med pa'i grangs med pa tshad med pa'i tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsam
118a3(brgyad stong): gyis mi khyab pa/ mtha' yas mu med pa yod pa rnams kyi phyogs re re'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams re rer/ 'das pa'i dus na gzhal du med pa'i
118a4(brgyad stong): gzhal du med pa/ grangs med pa'i grangs med pa/ tshad med pa'i tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mthas yas mu med pa'i de bzhin
118a5(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ lam chad pa 'jug pa/ chad pa/ spros pa dang srid par 'dren pa chad pa mchi ma zad pa tsher ma bcom
118a6(brgyad stong): pa khur shin tu bor ba bdag gi don rjes su thob pa srid par sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag par kun shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sems thams cad kyi
118a7(brgyad stong): dbang dam pa'i pha rol gson pa/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/
118a8(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das
118b1(brgyad stong): pa'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur pa'i bar de/ de dag gi bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po
118b2(brgyad stong): dang shes rab kyi phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag
118b3(brgyad stong): yin pa dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
118b4(brgyad stong): dang / de bzhin du mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang yongs su shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang
118b5(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / phan par gzhed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin
118b6(brgyad stong): pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gzhal du med pa grangs med pa gang yin pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
118b7(brgyad stong): gang yin pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / zil
118b8(brgyad stong): gyis mnan pa dpag tu med pa dang thams cad zil gyis non pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa'i mchog gang yin pa dang / sgrib pa med par chags pa med pa thogs pa med
119a1(brgyad stong): pa mnyam pa med pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dpe med pa dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa ci lta ba'i ye shes kyi stobs gang yin pa dang /
119a2(brgyad stong): stobs kyi nang na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi stobs gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang gzigs pa gang yin pa dang / stobs bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /
119a3(brgyad stong): mi 'jigs pa bzhi mchog tu yongs su rdzogs par khong du chud pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad don dam par mngon par sgrub pas chos khong du chud pa gang yin pa dang /
119a4(brgyad stong): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi sgron ma thogs pa dang chos kyi rnga rdung ba dang chos kyi dung 'bud pa dang chos kyi dung sgrogs pa dang / chos kyi ral
119a5(brgyad stong): gri 'debs pa dang chos kyi char 'bebs pa dang chos kyi mchod sbyin sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par mdzad cing yang dag par
119a6(brgyad stong): stobs pa dang / gang yang chos bstan pa de dag dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams la/ gang dag brtul
119a7(brgyad stong): ba dang bsrabs pa dang mos par gyur pa dang nges par gyur pa dang rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin
119a8(brgyad stong): pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
119b1(brgyad stong): bstan pa de dag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi byang
119b2(brgyad stong): chub la lung bstan pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i
119b3(brgyad stong): dngos po dang tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang / slob pa'i zag
119b4(brgyad stong): ba med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / mi slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / so so'i skye bo gang dag gi chos de dag la
119b5(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang dge bsnyen
119b6(brgyad stong): ma rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod
119b7(brgyad stong): nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa rnams dang / der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ches ston pa de dag la lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang na mkha'
119b8(brgyad stong): lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag dang byol song gi ske gnas su song ba'i sems can gang de dag thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba
120a1(brgyad stong): bskrun pa gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'dal ba la yang gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa gang
120a2(brgyad stong): dag yin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la yang gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas
120a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la brten pa dang / chos la brten pa dang dge 'dun rnams la brten pa dang yid kyis bsgom par bya ba'i gang zag dag la brten nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun
120a4(brgyad stong): pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad ma lus shing lus pa med par gcig tu mngon par bsdus te/ bsdoms shing gzhal nas rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis
120a5(brgyad stong): rjes su yi rang ste/ dam pa dang gtso bo dang rab dang rab mchog dang gya nom pa dang bla mdang bla na med pa dang gong na med pa dang mnyam pa med pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
120a6(brgyad stong): rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang la/ de ltar rjes su yi rang nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
120a7(brgyad stong): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par gyur cig snyam pas ngag tu brjod par bya ba yin te/ de la gang zag byang chub
120a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa'i theg pa can dag dngos po gang dag dang dmigs pa gang dag dang rnam pa gang dag gis yongs su bsngo zhing sems de bskyed pa na cis dngos po de dag dang
120b1(brgyad stong): dmigs pa de dag dang rnam pa de dag ci ltar mtshan mar byas pa de bzhin du dmigs sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byam
120b2(brgyad stong): pas gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor dngos po de dag dang dmigs pa de dag dang rnam pa de dag ci ltar mtshan mar byas
120b3(brgyad stong): pa de bzhin du mi dmigs so// de skad ces smras pa dang / gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad
120b4(brgyad stong): ces smras so// gal te de dngos po med par dang dmigs pa med pa la dmigs par byed cing mtshan mar byed na ci ltar 'di 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang sems phyin ci log
120b5(brgyad stong): pa dang lta ba phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'dod chags kyang dngos po med bzhin du mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba la bde ba dang bdag med pa
120b6(brgyad stong): la bdag dang mi sdug pa la sdug par rnam par brtags shing kun tu brtags nas/ 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang sems phyin ci log pa dang lta ba phyin ci log par 'byung
120b7(brgyad stong): ngo// gzhan yang dngos po ci lta ba dang dmigs pa ci lta ba dang rnam pa ci lta ba bzhin du byang chub kyang de bzhin sems kyang de bzhin yin na de lta na chos thams cad dang
120b8(brgyad stong): khams thams cad kyang de bzhin no// gal te yang dngos po ci lta ba dang dmigs pa ci lta ba dang rnam pa ci lta ba de bzhin du byang chub kyang de bzhin sems kyang de bzhin
121a1(brgyad stong): yin na/ des na dngos po gang dag dang dmigs pa gang dag dang rnam pa gang dag gis/ sems gang zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
121a2(brgyad stong): byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa 'am/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos gang zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gang du
121a3(brgyad stong): yongs su sngo bar byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'dug
121a4(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor 'di ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du bshad par mi bya bstan par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
121a5(brgyad stong): la gang dad pa tsam dang dga' ba tsam dang mos pa tsam dang gus pa tsam dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rab 'byor phyir mi ldog
121a6(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du 'di bshad par bya'o nye bar bstan par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dge ba'i bshes
121a7(brgyad stong): gnyen gyis nye bar bstan par gyur pa de yang 'di la mi 'gong kun tu mi zhum bag mi tsha bag 'khums par mi 'gyur 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par mi byed bcom zhing phyir
121a8(brgyad stong): phyogs par mi 'gyur mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu mi skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang bar
121b1(brgyad stong): byas nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// / 'phags pa shes
121b2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po bdun pa// // de nas gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa'
121b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// byams pa sems gang gis rjes su yi rang nas gang yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i sems de yang zad cing
121b4(brgyad stong): 'gag par gyur la bral zhing rnam par gyur pa yin te/ des na gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i sems de gang zhig
121b5(brgyad stong): yin/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i sems de yang gang
121b6(brgyad stong): yin la/ gang gi tshe sems gnyis phrad pa med pa dang sems de rang bzhin gyis yongs su bsngo bar yang mi nus na/ sems kyis sems yongs su bsngo bar nus dang
121b7(brgyad stong): yang ci ltar 'gyur/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor theg pa la gsar du
121b8(brgyad stong): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas dngang zhing kun tu skrag la kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par gyur na mi rung ngo // 'phag
122a1(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor yang ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de bla na med pa yang dag
122a2(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongs su 'dzin pa dang rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems
122a3(brgyad stong): yongs su sngo bar byed pas ji ltar rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems de legs par yongs su bzung zhing legs par yongs su bsngos par 'gyur/ de nas gnas
122a4(brgyad stong): brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la brtsams shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa gzhir
122a5(brgyad stong): byas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la smras pa/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/
122a6(brgyad stong): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med cing grangs med pa yod pa'i phyogs re re stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams re rer
122a7(brgyad stong): yang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lam chad pa 'jug pa chad pa spros pa dang srid par 'dren pa chang pa mchi ma zad pa cher ma bcom pa khur shin tu bor ba bdag
122a8(brgyad stong): gi don rjes su thob pa srid par sbyor ba yongs su zad pa yang dag par kun shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu
122b1(brgyad stong): son pa gzhal du med cing grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste bla
122b2(brgyad stong): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs
122b3(brgyad stong): su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur pa'i bar te/ de dag gi bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu
122b4(brgyad stong): phyin pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa gang
122b5(brgyad stong): yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i phung po
122b6(brgyad stong): dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa rnams dang / phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje/
122b7(brgyad stong): chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gzhal du med cing grangs med pa gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang
122b8(brgyad stong): bshad pa dang / chos de la gang gis bslabs pa dang lhag par mos pa dang gnas pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
123a1(brgyad stong): de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de dag gi dge ba'i
123a2(brgyad stong): rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gang dag rang byang
123a3(brgyad stong): chub tu lung bstan pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang tshul khrims
123a4(brgyad stong): khrims las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsgoms pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang mi slob pa'i zag
123a5(brgyad stong): pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / chos de la so so'i skye bo gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma
123a6(brgyad stong): yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag gis chos de thos te thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / byol song
123a7(brgyad stong): gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag gis chos de thos te thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / sems can gang dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ang
123a8(brgyad stong): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa ste/ de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yin pa de dag
123b1(brgyad stong): thams cad gcig tu bsdus te bsdoms shing gzhal nas ma lus par byas te/ rjes su yi rang bar bya ba ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan
123b2(brgyad stong): pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
123b3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po ci ltar 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang byang chub sems dpa'
123b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po byams pas gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
123b5(brgyad stong): chen pos sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de la sems su 'du shes par ma gyur na de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang
123b6(brgyad stong): ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// ci ltar sems de la sems de 'di
123b7(brgyad stong): yin no zhes yang dag par mi shes pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur lta ba
123b8(brgyad stong): phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro// de ste sems gang gis gang yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de la sems de ni 'di yin no zhes yang dag par shes shing / sems su 'du
124a1(brgyad stong): shes par gyur na de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang sems phyin ci log pa dang lta ba phyin ci log
124a2(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ro// gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems gang yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de la 'di ltar yang dag par shes shing 'di ltar sems
124a3(brgyad stong): te/ sems de la sems pa ni 'di ltar zad pa la zad pa'o zhes de ltar yang zad par shes la 'gags pa dang bral ba dang rnam par gyur pa yin no zhes de ltar shes te gang
124a4(brgyad stong): zad pa de yang yongs su bsngo bar mi nus la/ sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de'i chos nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang dag gis yongs su bsngo ba'i chos
124a5(brgyad stong): de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang dag tu yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin no// zhes gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo na yang dag par
124a6(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngo ba yin gyi log par yongs su bsngo ba ma yin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor
124a7(brgyad stong): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'das pa ci lta ba de bzhin du ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lam chad pa 'jug pa chad pa spros pa dang
124a8(brgyad stong): srid par 'dren pa chad pa gzhal du med cing grangs med pa de dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog
124b1(brgyad stong): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i bar dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos
124b2(brgyad stong): nub par mi 'gyur ba'i bar de/ de dag gi bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang /
124b3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i
124b4(brgyad stong): ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa rnams dang / phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang /
124b5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gzhal du med cing grangs med pa gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang 'chad par 'gyur ba gang yin
124b6(brgyad stong): pa rnams dang chos de la slob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa rnams dang / lhag par mos par 'gyur ba rnams dang gnas par 'gyur ba de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnam
124b7(brgyad stong): dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ba de dag gi pha rol
124b8(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dag rang sangs
125a1(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi byang chub la lung ston par 'gyur ba de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams kyi sbyin pa
125a2(brgyad stong): las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i
125a3(brgyad stong): dngos po gang yin pa rnams dang / slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang mi slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams
125a4(brgyad stong): dang / chos de la so so'i skye bo gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ba dang / gang yang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang na mkha'
125a5(brgyad stong): lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag gis chos de thos par 'gyur ba dang thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ba dang //
125a6(brgyad stong): gang yang byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag gis kyang chos de thos par 'gyur ba dang thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskrun par 'gyur ba
125a7(brgyad stong): dang / sems can gang dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la dge ba'i rtsa
125a8(brgyad stong): ba bskrun par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te bsdoms shing gzhal nas ma lus par byas te/
125b1(brgyad stong): rjes su yi rang bar bya ba ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang /
125b2(brgyad stong): tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci ltar 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur lta ba phyin ci
125b3(brgyad stong): log tu mi 'gyur zhe na/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems gang gis gang yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de la sems su 'du shes par mi
125b4(brgyad stong): 'gyur na de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
125b5(brgyad stong): chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// ci ltar sems de la sems de 'di yin no zhes yang dag par mi shes pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
125b6(brgyad stong): 'du shes phyin ci log par mi 'gyur sems phyin ci log par mi 'gyur lta ba phyin ci log par mi 'gyur ro// de ste sems gang gis gang yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de
125b7(brgyad stong): la sems de ni 'di yin no zhes yang dag par shes shing sems su 'du shes par gyur na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci
125b8(brgyad stong): log pa dang sems phyin ci log pa dang lta ba phyin ci log par 'gyur ro// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems gang yongs su bsngo ba'i sems
126a1(brgyad stong): de la 'di ltar shes shing 'di ltar sems te/ sems de la sems pa na de ltar zad pa la zad pa'o zhes de ltar yang dag par shes shing 'gags/
126a2(brgyad stong): ba dang bral ba dang rnam par gyur pa yin no zhes de ltar shes te gang zad pa de yang yongs su bsngo bar mi nus/ sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de'i chos
126a3(brgyad stong): nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang dag gis yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de dag nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang dag tu yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin no zhes
126a4(brgyad stong): gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo na yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba yin gyi log par yongs su bsngo ba ma yin te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs
126a5(brgyad stong): su bsngo bar bya'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med
126a6(brgyad stong): med cing grangs med pa rnams na da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ma chad pa 'jug pa chad pa spros pa dang srid par 'dren pa chad pa gzhal du med cing
126a7(brgyad stong): grangs med pa bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams kyi sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
126a8(brgyad stong): par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos nub pa'i
126b1(brgyad stong): bar te/ de dag gi bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
126b2(brgyad stong): 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs
126b3(brgyad stong): pa'i phung po gang yin pa rnams dang / phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs
126b4(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi yon tan gzhal du med cing grangs med pa gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos gang bshad pa dang / chos de la
126b5(brgyad stong): gang gis bslabs pa dang lhag par mos pa dang gnas pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi byang chub
126b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa de dag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
126b7(brgyad stong): yin pa rnams dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg can dag rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la lung ston pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa
126b8(brgyad stong): ba gang yin pa rnams dang gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byang ba'i dngos po/
127a1(brgyad stong): dang bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa rnams dang / slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams/
127a2(brgyad stong): dang / mi slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / chos de la so so'i skye bo gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / lha dang klu dang
127a3(brgyad stong): gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag gis chos de thos te thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa
127a4(brgyad stong): ba bskon pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag gis chos de thos te thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / gang dag gis sangs
127a5(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa
127a6(brgyad stong): ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te bsdoms shing gzhal nas ma lus par byas te rjes su yi rang bar bya ba ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang nas/ rjes
127a7(brgyad stong): su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
127a8(brgyad stong): chen po ci ltar 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur zhe na/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
127b1(brgyad stong): chen po de sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de la sems su 'du shes par mi 'gyur na de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba
127b2(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// ci ltar sems de la sems de ni 'di
127b3(brgyad stong): yin no zhes yang dag par mi shes pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes phyin ci log par mi 'gyur sems phyin ci log par mi 'gyur lta ba
127b4(brgyad stong): phyin ci log par mi 'gyur ro// de ste sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de la sems de ni 'di yin no zhes yang dag par shes shing sems su 'du shes
127b5(brgyad stong): par gyur na de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang sems phyin ci log pa dang lta ba phyin ci log par 'gyur ro// yang
127b6(brgyad stong): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems gang yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de la 'di ltar shes shing 'di ltar sems te/ sems de la sems pa
127b7(brgyad stong): na de ltar zad pa la zad pa'o zhes de ltar yang dag par shes shing 'gags pa dang bral ba dang rnam par gyur pa yin no zhes de ltar shes te gang zad pa de yang yongs
127b8(brgyad stong): su bsngo bar mi nus/ sems gang gi yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de'i chos nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang dag gis yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin/
128a1(brgyad stong): chos gang dag tu yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin no zhes gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo na yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba
128a2(brgyad stong): yin gyi/ log par yongs su bsngo ba yin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor gzhan
128a3(brgyad stong): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lam chad pa 'jug pa chad pa spros pa dang srid
128a4(brgyad stong): par 'dren pa chad pa gzhal du med cing grangs med pa dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
128a5(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las
128a6(brgyad stong): 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar dang dam pa'i chos
128a7(brgyad stong): ma nub pa dang nub par mi 'gyur ba dang nub par ma gyur pa'i bar te/ de dag gi bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge
128a8(brgyad stong): ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam
128b1(brgyad stong): par grol ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa rnams dang / phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang /
128b2(brgyad stong): snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gzhal du med cing grangs med pa gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos
128b3(brgyad stong): gang bshad pa dang 'chad par 'gyur ba dang 'chad pa dang chos de dag la gang gis bslabs pa dang slob par 'gyur ba dang / slob pa dang / mos pa dang mos par
128b4(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba dang mos par byed pa dang gnas pa dang gnas par 'gyur ba dang gnas par byed pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
128b5(brgyad stong): 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang lung ston par 'gyur ba dang
128b6(brgyad stong): lung ston pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gang
128b7(brgyad stong): dag rang byang chub la lung bstan pa dang lung ston par 'gyur ba dang lung ston par de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi the
128b8(brgyad stong): pa can rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang tshul khrims las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang bsgoms pa las byung
129a1(brgyad stong): ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang mi slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i
129a2(brgyad stong): rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / chos de la so so'i skye bo gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang skrun par 'gyur ba dang skrun pa dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin
129a3(brgyad stong): dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa gang gis kyang chos de thos par gyur pa dang thos par 'gyur ba
129a4(brgyad stong): dang thos pa dang thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang skyed par 'gyur ba dang skyed pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can gang dag gis dam pa'i
129a5(brgyad stong): chos de thos par gyur pa dang thos par 'gyur ba dang thos pa dang thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang skrun par 'gyur ba dang skrun pa dang sems can gang dag gi
129a6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la dge ba'i
129a7(brgyad stong): rtsa ba bskrun pa dang skrun par 'gyur ba dang skrun pa de rnams thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te bsdoms shing gzhal
129a8(brgyad stong): nas ma lus par byas te rjes su yi rang por bya ba ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba dang dam pa dang gtso bo dang rab dang mchog rab dang
129b1(brgyad stong): gya nom pa dang bla na med pa dang gong na med pa dang mnyam pa med pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ba la de ltar rjes su yi rang
129b2(brgyad stong): nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes bla na med pa yang dag pa
129b3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su sgrub par gyur cig snyam pas ngag tu brjod pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ji ltar 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi
129b4(brgyad stong): 'gyur sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur zhe na/ gal te yongs su sngo bar byed pa 'di snyam du chos de dag ni zad pa 'gags pa bral ba
129b5(brgyad stong): rnam par gyur pa yin pas gang du chos de zad par mi 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o zhes sems pa de lta na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su
129b6(brgyad stong): bsngos pa yin no// gal te yang 'di ltar chos kyis ni chos yongs su mi bsngo'o snyam du nye bar rtog pa de lta na yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
129b7(brgyad stong): tu yongs su bsngos pa yin te/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar yongs su sngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur
129b8(brgyad stong): sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni yongs su bsngo ba de la mngon par zhen pa med do// gal te
130a1(brgyad stong): yang 'di snyam du sems kyis sems mi shes shing chos kyis chos mi shes so zhes yang dag par shes pa de lta na yang bla na med pa yang dag par
130a2(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin te 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba bla na med pa'o// gal te yang byang chub
130a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de shes na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa ma yin no//
130a4(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni yongs su bsngo ba de la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir ro// gal te yang de 'di snyam du bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de yang dben pa
130a5(brgyad stong): zhi ba'o zhes rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de yang dben pa zhi ba'o zhes sems pa de ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
130a6(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// gal te de 'du shes thams cad ni dben pa'o zhi ba'o snyam du de ltar yang mi shes pa de ltar na 'di ni byang chub sems
130a7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// gang yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa
130a8(brgyad stong): ba de ci 'dra ltar yongs su bsngo ba de dang de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang de 'dra ba nyid de/ gang gis de yongs su bsngos pa de yang de'i mtshan nyid can de'i rigs can de'i ris
130b1(brgyad stong): su gtogs pa de'i rang bzhin can yin par gal te de ltar shes na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
130b2(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba gnang bar mi mdzad do// gang 'das pa de ni zad pa 'gags pa bral ba rnam par gyur
130b3(brgyad stong): pa'o// gang ma 'ongs pa de yang ma thob pa'o// da ltar byung ba de la ni gnas pa mi dmigs la/ gang mi dmigs pa de ni mtshan ma ma yin zhing yul ma yin
130b4(brgyad stong): par gal te de ltar mtshan mar byed cing mi sems na bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa ma yin no// de ste dran pa dang bral bas
130b5(brgyad stong): mtshan mar mi byed cing mi sems pa dang / dran pa dang bral ba'am khong du ma chud pas yid la mi byed na de lta na yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
130b6(brgyad stong): chub tu yongs su bsngos pa ma yin no// de ste mtshan ma de la sems shing mtshan mar mi byed na de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i
130b7(brgyad stong): rtsa ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di la bslab pa
130b8(brgyad stong): bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i thabs mkhas par rig par bya'o// gang thabs mkhas pa 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su
131a1(brgyad stong): bsngo ba 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye ba yin no// thabs mkhas pa 'di la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
131a2(brgyad stong): chen pos ni shes rab kyi phyin pa 'di nyid rgyun mi chad par mnyan par bya gzung bar bya bcang bar bya klag par bya kun chub par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya bstan par
131a3(brgyad stong): bya nye bar bstan par bya/ lung 'bog par bya kha ton du bya yongs su dri bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par thos pa dang
131a4(brgyad stong): mi ldan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bsngo ba'i bya ba 'di la 'jug mi nus so// de la gang 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ma
131a5(brgyad stong): brten kyang bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar nas so zhes zer na/ de la de skad ma zer cig ces brjod
131a6(brgyad stong): par bya ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gi dngos po de dag 'gags pa dang 'du byed de dag kyang 'gags pa ste zhi ba dben pa dmigs pa dang bral ba yin no//
131a7(brgyad stong): 'on kyang gang zag de ni yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid la mtshan mar byas shing rnam par brtags nas yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin ma yin pa la yang dag pa ji lta bar 'du shes
131a8(brgyad stong): pas dmigs pa la mi dmigs par yongs su sngo bar byed pa yin te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos
131b1(brgyad stong): pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gnang bar mi mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa
131b2(brgyad stong): la mtshan mar byed cing rnam par rtog pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa la rnam par dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid de'i dmigs pa chen po yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
131b3(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyi yongs su bsngo ba don chen po byed pa'o zhes mi gsung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe
131b4(brgyad stong): na/ yongs su bsngo ba de ni dug dang bcas shing zug rngu dang bcas pa yin no// 'di lta ste dper na kha zas bzang po dug can zhig yod la de bzhin du de'i kha dog dang dri
131b5(brgyad stong): dang ro dang reg pa'i sgo nas 'dod par bya ba yang yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang dug dang bcas pa yin pas na mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su spang bar bya ba yin gyi
131b6(brgyad stong): yongs su longs sprad par bya ba ma yin no// de nyid skyes bu byis pa'i rang bzhin can shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyis yongs su longs sbed par bsaM
131b7(brgyad stong): te/ des zas de za ba na de'i kha dog dang dri dang ro dang reg pa'i sgo nas myangs pa na bde bar byed la zhu ba'i tshe de la rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur te de/
131b8(brgyad stong): de'i gzhi las shi ba 'am shi ba tsam gyi sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di la kha cig log par zin cing log par rig pa dang log
132a1(brgyad stong): bar kha ton byas pas logs par smras pa'i don ma shes shing don yang dag par lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa dang / 'di skad du rigs
132a2(brgyad stong): kyi bu khyod chur sheg/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med cing grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang da ltar
132a3(brgyad stong): byung ba rnams kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar gzung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang rgya
132a4(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur ba dang rgya ba'i bar dang phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang 'da'
132a5(brgyad stong): ba'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur pa dang nub par mi 'gyur ba dang mi nub pa'i bar te/ bar de'i 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sang
132a6(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang de dag gi nyan thos rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol
132a7(brgyad stong): ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'
132a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang / lung ston par 'gyur ba dang lung ston pa de dag gis dge ba'i
132b1(brgyad stong): ba bskrun pa dang skrun par 'gyur ba dang skrun pa gang yin pa rnams dang / gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gang dag rang byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang lung
132b2(brgyad stong): ston par 'gyur ba dang lung ston pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang skrun par 'gyur ba dang sbran pa gang yin pa rnams dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi
132b3(brgyad stong): gang zag gang dag nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang lung ston par 'gyur ba dang lung ston po de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / skrun par 'gyur
132b4(brgyad stong): ba dang skran pa gang yin pa rnams dang / so so'i skye bo gang dag gis der dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang skrun par 'gyur ba dang skrun pa gang yin pa rnams te de rnams
132b5(brgyad stong): thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsdoms te gzhal nas ma lus par byas te ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang nas/ rjes su yi
132b6(brgyad stong): ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar gyis shig ces 'doms shing rjes su ston
132b7(brgyad stong): par 'gyur te/ de ltar na yongs su bsngo ba de ni mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bas dug nyid du 'gyur te 'di lta ste dper na kha zas de dug dang bcas pa yin
132b8(brgyad stong): no/ de ltar na dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la yongs su bsngo ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dmigs pa ni dug dang bcas pa'o// de bas na gang zag byang
133a1(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gyis de ltar bslab par mi bya'o// yang des ci ltar bslab par bya zhing ci ltar 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /
133a2(brgyad stong): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gzungs par bya ba dang / ci ltar yongs su bzung na legs par yongs su
133a3(brgyad stong): bzung bar 'gyur zhing ji ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ba dang ji ltar yongs su bsngos na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu legs par yongs su
133a4(brgyad stong): bsngos par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa mi gda' bar 'dod pa des dge
133a5(brgyad stong): ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad 'di ltar rjes su yi rang bar bya zhing 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
133a6(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang sangs rgyas kyi sman gyis mkhyen cing gzigs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de rigs
133a7(brgyad stong): gang yin pa dang ris gar gtogs pa dang ci 'dra ba dang rang bzhin gang yin pa dang mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang chos nyid gang gis yod pa de bzhin du rjes su yi rang
133a8(brgyad stong): zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de ci ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
133b1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas de dag gis rjes su gnang bar bzhin du bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o snyam pa ste/ de ltar rjes su yi rang zhing de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i
133b2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur zhing / yang dag par rjes su yi rang bar byas pa dang
133b3(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu legs par yongs su bsngos par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
133b4(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la skur pa mi 'debs pa ma yin te/ lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pas yongs su sngo bar byed pa de'i yongs su bsngo ba de
133b5(brgyad stong): lta bu ni dug med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba yin yongs su bsngo ba chen po yin chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba yin/ yongs su rdzogs shing shin tu yongs
133b6(brgyad stong): su rdzogs pa yin no// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gyi/ tshul khrims gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
133b7(brgyad stong): gang yin pa dang / shes rab gang yin pa dang / rnam par grol ba gang yin pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa gang yin pa/ ci ltar 'dod
133b8(brgyad stong): pa'i khams su mi gtogs gzugs kyi khams su mi gtogs gzugs med pa'i khams su mi gtogs pa dang 'das pa ma yin ma 'ongs pa ma yin da ltar byung
134a1(brgyad stong): ba yang ma yin pa de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dus gsum dang khams gsum du mi gtogs pa'i phyir de bzhin
134a2(brgyad stong): du yongs su bsngo ba yang ma gtogs pa'o// chos gang du yongs su bsngo ba des yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de yang ma gtogs pa'o// gal te de ltar mos shing
134a3(brgyad stong): de ltar yongs su bsngo na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar yongs su spro bar byed pa de'i yongs su bsngo ba ni chud ma zos pa yin te ma gtogs pa'i
134a4(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngo ba yongs su bsngo ba dag med pa yongs su ba chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba yongs su rdzogs shing legs par yongs su rdzogs pa
134a5(brgyad stong): yin no// de ste yongs su bsngo ba de la mngon par chags shing mtshan mar byed na log par yongs su bsngo ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
134a6(brgyad stong): chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba gang zhig dge ba'i rtsa ba de ci ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mkhyen cing ci ltar rjes su gnang ba de ltar chos kyi dbyings
134a7(brgyad stong): kyi yongs su bsngo ba 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de lta na de legs par phar yongs su bsngos pa yin no// snyam zhing
134a8(brgyad stong): de ltar bdag gis yongs su bsngo'o snyam na 'di ni yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba yin te/ de ltar yongs su bsngos pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
134b1(brgyad stong): byang chub tu legs par yongs su bsngos pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor khyod
134b2(brgyad stong): ston pa'i bya ba byed cing gang khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos ston pa ni rab 'byor legs so legs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
134b3(brgyad stong): 'byor yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba'o// chos nyid 'di nyid la sangs
134b4(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ci ltar mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de rigs gang yin pa dang ris gar gtogs pa dang / ci 'dra ba dang
134b5(brgyad stong): rang bzhin gang yin pa dang mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang chos nyid gang gis yod pa de ltar rjes su yi rang ba dang / ci ltar rjes su gnang ba de ltar bdag gis
134b6(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngo'o snyam pa 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
134b7(brgyad stong): sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par bkod cing bzhags
134b8(brgyad stong): pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba las skyes pa'i
135a1(brgyad stong): bsod nams kyi phung po 'di nyid mchog ces bya'o dam pa zhes bya'o gtso bo zhes bya'o rab ces bya'o mchog rab ces bya'o gya nom pa zhes bya
135a2(brgyad stong): bla ma zhes bya'o bla na med pa zhes bya'o gong na med pa zhes bya'o mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor yang stong gsuM
135a3(brgyad stong): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad dge bo bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod
135a4(brgyad stong): pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can
135a5(brgyad stong): ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bsam gtan bzhi thob par gyur pa de dag gi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de bas kyang byang chub sems
135a6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di ni mchog ces bya'o dam pa zhes bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o rab ces
135a7(brgyad stong): bya'o mchog rab ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o bla ma zhes bya'o bla na med pa zhes bya'o gong na med pa zhes bya'o mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o mi mnyam pa dang
135a8(brgyad stong): mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa
135b1(brgyad stong): de dag thams cad bsam gtan bzhi rdzogs par gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi/
135b2(brgyad stong): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad tshad med pa bzhi thob par gyur pa dang / rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi
135b3(brgyad stong): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad tshad med pa bzhi thob pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab
135b4(brgyad stong): 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad gzugs med pa'i snyoms

135b7(brgyad stong): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci skyed yod pa de dag thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur pa dang / rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po
135b8(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab
136a1(brgyad stong): 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun du

136a7(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong

136b1(brgyad stong): 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad dgra bcom par gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon par

136b3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas su gyur pa dang / rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur
136b4(brgyad stong): ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma skyed dag na sems can gang
136b5(brgyad stong): dag yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs par gyur la/ de dag thams cad kyi sa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
136b6(brgyad stong): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gzhan dag nyid na sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad la/ byang chub sems dpa' re res chos gos dang bsod snyoms
136b7(brgyad stong): dang / mal cha dang na ba'i gsos smin dang yo byad dang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad dang bde ba la reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
136b8(brgyad stong): snyed du rim gror byas te sbyin pa de yang dmigs pa'i 'du shes kyi so byin la/ rnam grangs des na yongs su brtag nas sems can de rnams thams cad las re re la
137a1(brgyad stong): yang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad las kyang byang chub sems dpa' re res bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du chos gos dang /
137a2(brgyad stong): bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byed dang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad dang bde ba la reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis rim grer byas te bkur
137a3(brgyad stong): stir byed bla mar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor byed bsnyen bkur byed de/ de bzhin du re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis rnam grang
137a4(brgyad stong): 'dis sbyin pa byin zhing / de bzhin du thams cad la yang sbyin pa byin ni rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems ci byang chub sems dpa' de dag de'i gzhi las bsod nams
137a5(brgyad stong): mang du skyid dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das gzhal du ma mchis so bde
137a6(brgyad stong): bar gshegs pa gzhal du ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni grangs su bgyi bar yang sra ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
137a7(brgyad stong): de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni bgrang bar yang dper yang dpes bstan par bgyi bar yang gzhir yang rgyur yang bgyi bar sla ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
137a8(brgyad stong): gal te bsod nams kyi phung po de gzugs can zhig lags na ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu/ yang mi shong
137b1(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no//
137b2(brgyad stong): de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor yang gang gi phyir gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba chos
137b3(brgyad stong): kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa de'i phyir de'i bsod nams mang du skyed de
137b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings yongs su bsngo ba las skyes pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la ni dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
137b5(brgyad stong): rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro// stong gi char yang brgya phrag stong gi char yang bye ba'i char
137b6(brgyad stong): yang bye ba phrag brgya'i char yang bye ba phrag stong gi char yang bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gre'o// grangs su
137b7(brgyad stong): yang nye bar mi 'gro/ bgrang bar yang dper yang dpes bstan par bya bar yang gzhir yang rgyur yang nye ba'i rgyur yang mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar snga ma
137b8(brgyad stong): dmigs pa'i 'du shes kyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa ni shin tu mang po sbyin na yang shin tu mang por yang grangs su de 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
138a1(brgyad stong): kyi lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu rnams thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
138a2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yod
138a3(brgyad stong): su bsngos pa 'di ni yongs su bsngo ba chen po lags te/ 'di ltar gang du dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod
138a4(brgyad stong): nams mngon par 'du byed pa de snyed kyang zil gyis mnan pa lag so// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu brgya phrag stong gis lha'i me tog dang lha'i bdug pa dang
138a5(brgyad stong): lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma rnams kyi char dang lha'i rin po che'i char dang lha'i na bza'i char gyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor mngon
138a6(brgyad stong): par rab tu gtor nas/ lha'i gdugs dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das
138a7(brgyad stong): la bkur stir byas bla mar byas rjed par byas mchod par byas ri mor byas/ bsnyen bkur byas te lha'i sil snyan rnams rab tu dkrol nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol/
138a8(brgyad stong): to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni bsngo ba chen po lags te/ 'di ltar gang du dmigs
138b1(brgyad stong): pa can gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bgyid pa'i phung po chen po de snyed kyang zil gyis gnon pa lags so//
138b2(brgyad stong): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba'i slad du 'di ni bsngo ba chen po lags so// de bzhin du lha'i ris gzhan dag nas
138b3(brgyad stong): kyang lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir bya ba dam pa dang bla mar bya ba dam pa dang rjed par bya ba dam pa dang mchod par bya ba dam pa dang ri mor bya ba dam pa
138b4(brgyad stong): dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dam pa rnams kyis/ bkur stir byas bla mar byas rjed par byas mchod par byas ri mor byas bsnyen bkur byas nas de skad du sgra byung
138b5(brgyad stong): zhing dbyangs rjes su bsgrags so// de bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste 'thab bral dang dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang tshangs ris dang
138b6(brgyad stong): tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang tshangs pa kun 'khor dang tshangs chen dang 'od chung dang tshad med 'od dang 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang tshod med dge dang dge rgyas
138b7(brgyad stong): dang / sprin med dang bsod nams 'phel dang 'bras bu che dang 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang gya nom snang dang shin tu mthong
138b8(brgyad stong): dang 'og min gyi lha dag kyang de bzhin du thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sem
139a1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba des
139a2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyi yun ring po de tsam du bsags pa dang de ltar rgya cher yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung
139a3(brgyad stong): po de snyed kyang zil gyis gnon pa ngo mtshar to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu
139a4(brgyad stong): dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
139a5(brgyad stong): yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i don du sbyin pa byin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/
139a6(brgyad stong): lha'i bu dag rnam grangs 'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed gzhan dang gzhan dag na sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams
139a7(brgyad stong): cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ka'i
139a8(brgyad stong): klung gi bye ma snyed gzhan dang gzhan dag gi sems can thams cad la chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dang bde bar sbar ba thams
139b1(brgyad stong): cad dang bde ba la reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug ste sbyin pa byin zhing / de bzhin du
139b2(brgyad stong): dmigs pa'i 'du shes can de dag thams cad kyis kyang sbyin pa byin pa'i bar dang / rnam grangs 'dis sems can de rnams thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnam
139b3(brgyad stong): thams cad re re nas yongs su brtags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' re re nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad kyi bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du
139b4(brgyad stong): 'dug ste/ sems can de dag thams cad la chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dang bde bar sbar ba thams cad dang bde ba
139b5(brgyad stong): la reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis rim gror byed cing / sbyin pa de yang dmigs pa'i 'du shes kyis byin la/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
139b6(brgyad stong): phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa zhig gis 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang byang chub sems
139b7(brgyad stong): dpa' dang rang sangs rgyas dang gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can de rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang rnam par grol
139b8(brgyad stong): ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang / de la sems can gzhan dag gis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskrun pa dang snyan par 'gyur ba dang ska
140a1(brgyad stong): par byed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsdoms te gzhal nas ma lus par byas te ma lus pa rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes/
140a2(brgyad stong): su yi rang zhing dam pa dang gtso bo dang rab dang mchog rab dang gya nom pa dang bla ma dang bla na med pa dang gong na med pa dang gong ma'i yang gong ma dang mnyam pa med pa dang /

140b1(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir ro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po brgyad pa// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'phyo

140b7(brgyad stong): yi rang ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor gal te
140b8(brgyad stong): gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dag 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi chos rnams mi 'dzin rlom sems su mi byed mi dmigs mi rtog rnam par mi rtog

144b7(brgyad stong): su zin pa gang zhig 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang shes rab kyi bu
144b8(brgyad stong): po dang rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gi tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang
145a1(brgyad stong): @#rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang / nyan thos de dag gi tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam
145a2(brgyad stong): par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams

145a4(brgyad stong): rab dang mchog rab dang gya nom pa dang bla ma dang bla na med pa dang gong na med pa dang gong ma'i yang gong ma dang mnyam pa med pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang shin tu mnyam
145a5(brgyad stong): pa med pa dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang zhing rjes su yi rang nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na

145a8(brgyad stong): yang bye ba'i char yang bye ba brgya'i char yang bye ba stong gi char yang bye ba brgya stong gi char yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangs su yang bgrang
145b1(brgyad stong): bar yang dper yang dpes bstan par bya bar yang gzhir yang rgyur yang mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ni dmigs
145b2(brgyad stong): pa'i 'du shes can gyis bzod pa yang dag par blangs te gnas pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
145b3(brgyad stong): kyi sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag parla zhugs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhags
145b4(brgyad stong): nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gzhan dag gi sems can thams cad kyis mtshang brus shing brdegs te spros kyang nga
145b5(brgyad stong): rgyal dang bcas pa dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed ni bzod pa yang dag par blangs te gnas pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor gang dag stong
145b6(brgyad stong): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
145b7(brgyad stong): dag par zhugs par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhags nas bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug cing 'chag pas mad

151a1(brgyad stong): @skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu

151a3(brgyad stong): mngon par bsgrubs pas chos gang yang gtod par mi byed do// sha ri'i bu gang gi tshe chos gang yang gtod par mi byed pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i
