151a7(brgyad stong): mi byed do// mngon par 'du byed pa ci lta ba de ltar gtong bar mi byed do// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'on ci ltar gtong bar bgyid/ bcom ldan
151a8(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka ci ltar gtong bar mi byed pa de ltar gtong bar byed do// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci srid du gang gis shes rab
151b1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis chos gang yang mi skyed mi 'gog pa dang chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang 'gog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas la/ gnas pa
151b2(brgyad stong): yang ma lags pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
151b3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar yang 'du shes par bgyid na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du bgyid shes rab kyi pha rol
151b4(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di gsog tu bgyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsob tu bgyid de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi bgyid pa lags so// de skad ces gsol
151b5(brgyad stong): pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de de bzhin no rab 'byor de de bzhin te// rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis
151b6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgyang ring du byed pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsog tu byed pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsob tu byed pa dang
151b7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi byed par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs 'di ni yod de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su
151b8(brgyad stong): gsal bar byas na gzugs yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin 'du shes ma yin 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa yongs
152a1(brgyad stong): su gsal bar byed pa ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
152a2(brgyad stong): yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su gsal bar byas pa
152a3(brgyad stong): ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas nyid yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin sangs rgyas nyid yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin// gnas brtan rab 'byor
152a4(brgyad stong): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
152a5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems rnam grangs gang gis 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di pha rol tu phyin pa chen po yin/ gnas brtan rab 'byor
152a6(brgyad stong): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs chen por mi bgyid chung ngur mi bgyid gzugs sdud par mi bgyid g.yengs par mi bgyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba
152a7(brgyad stong): ma lags/ 'du shes ma lags 'du byed rnams ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa chen por mi bgyid chung ngur mi bgyid rnam par shes pa sdud
152a8(brgyad stong): par mi bgyid g.yengs par mi bgyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gang lags pa de dag kyang stobs dang ldan par mi bgyid
152b1(brgyad stong): stobs ma mchis par yang mi bgyid sdud par mi bgyid g.yengs par mi bgyid do// thams cad mkhyen pa gang lags pa de yang chen por mi bgyid chung ngur mi
152b2(brgyad stong): sdud par mi bgyid g.yengs par mi bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi bsdus ma g.yengs pa lags so// bcom ldan
152b3(brgyad stong): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te de ltar 'tshal na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags na/ bdag ni thams cad mkhyen
152b4(brgyad stong): ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa ste 'di ltar sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o// 'di ltar sems can 'di dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam du
152b5(brgyad stong): 'tshal ba lta smos su ci mchis/ de ci'i sad du zhe na/ sems can 'di dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam pa gang lags pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
152b6(brgyad stong): pa'i rgyu mthun pa ma lags te/ sems can du dmigs pa 'di nyid de'i dmigs pa chen por 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
152b7(brgyad stong): sems can ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa dang skye ba ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bgyi ste/ sems can ngo bo nyid ma mchis pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
152b8(brgyad stong): ngo bo nyid ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// sems can dben pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par rig par bgyi'o// sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pas
153a1(brgyad stong): @na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bgyi'o// sems can mi 'jigs pa'i chos nyid lags pa na shes rab kyi pha
153a2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa mi 'jig pa'i chos nyid du rig par bgyi'o// sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par
153a3(brgyad stong): 'chang rgya bar rig par bgyi'o// sems can yang dag pa'i don ci lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag
153a4(brgyad stong): ba'i don ci lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar rig par bgyi'o// sems can stobs yang dag par bsgrub pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stob
153a5(brgyad stong): yang dag par bsgrub pas rig par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lag
153a6(brgyad stong): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes
153a7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos shing nem ner mi bgyid the tshom mi 'tshal rmongs par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de gang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes
153a8(brgyad stong): par rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i don dang / chos nyid dang don gyi tshul dang chos nyid kyi tshul gyi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur la rjes
153b1(brgyad stong): su 'chal bar 'gyur zhing rjes su rtogs par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yun ring po ji srid cig tu spyad cing tshul bsrungs par
153b2(brgyad stong): rig par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
153b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byas shing yongs su dris nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas shi 'phos te
153b4(brgyad stong): 'dir skyes par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur byas
153b5(brgyad stong): shing / yongs su dris nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par gyur pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin zab mo 'di 'chang ba dang ston pa
153b6(brgyad stong): dang / nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa nyan te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ston par 'du shes bskyed do//
153b7(brgyad stong): bdag gi ston pa mngon sum du gyur te bdag gi ston pa mthong ngo snyam du sems bskyed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chang ba dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa
153b8(brgyad stong): dang lung 'bogs pa la rna ba blags nas gus par nyan te gtam gyi bar chad mi byed do// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni yun ring por
154a1(brgyad stong): spyad cing tshul bsrungs pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin du rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas mang po
154a2(brgyad stong): la bsnyen bkur byas pa de lta bu'i tshul du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yang
154a3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan pa 'am rtogs pa 'am bsam pa 'am bskyed pa 'am nye bar gzung bar nus sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni 'di
154a4(brgyad stong): zhes 'am shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de 'di la'o zhe 'am shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni ga ge mo zhig na'o zhes sam/ rnam pa dang rtags dang mtshan ma 'dis so
154a5(brgyad stong): zhes kyang bstan pa 'am mnyan par nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
154a6(brgyad stong): ni phung po 'am khams sam skye mched du bstan pa 'am mnyan pa 'am rtogs pa 'am bsam pa 'am nye bar gzung bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
154a7(brgyad stong): 'byor chos thams cad dben pa nyid dang chos thams cad shin tu dben pa nyid yin pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bstan pa 'am mnyan pa 'am rtogs
154a8(brgyad stong): pa 'am bsam pa 'am bskyed pa 'am nye bar gzungs par mi nus so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched las gzhan na yang med par
154b1(brgyad stong): rig par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phung po dang khams dang skye mched nyid stong pa dben pa zhi bas so// de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bung
154b2(brgyad stong): po dang khams dang skye mched 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// stong pa dang dben pa dang zhi ba'i phyir dmigs su med de// chos thams cad kyi mi dmig
154b3(brgyad stong): pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do// gang gi tshe 'du shes pa dang kun shes pa dang brtags pa dang tha snyad mi 'byung ba de'i tshe shes rab kyi
154b4(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
154b5(brgyad stong): pa zab po 'di la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa'i yun ring po ji srid cig sprad cing tshul bsrungs par rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang
154b6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dbang po'i rim pa yod pas 'di ni rnam par phye ste lung bstan par bya ba yin no// rab 'byor yang rnam grangs gang
154b7(brgyad stong): gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dag mthong nas de dag gi drung du
154b8(brgyad stong): tshangs par spyod pa spad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ma dad ma mos par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs kyang yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon yang sangs
155a1(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis thad nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chang ba dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa la ma gus so//
155a2(brgyad stong): ma gus pas legs par mi nyan to// legs par ma nyan pas bsnyen bkur mi byed do// bsnyen bkur mi byed pas yongs su mi 'dri'o// yongs su ma dris
155a3(brgyad stong): pas mngon par mi dad do// mngon par dad pas 'khor de nas 'byol te/ de dag gzhi de las chos kyi 'phongs par 'gyur ba dang / mthun pa'i las byas shing
155a4(brgyad stong): bsags la kun nas bsags shing nye bar bsags pas da ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chang ba dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa na ma gus pas
155a5(brgyad stong): 'byol zhing ma dad la mos par mi byed pas lus dang sems kyi tshogs pa sgrub par mi byed do// tshogs pa sgrub par mi byed pas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a
155a6(brgyad stong): mi shes mi mthong khong du mi chud rig par mi byed de/ de dag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma dad par 'gyur ro// ma dad pa ni mi nyan to// mi nyan pa ni mi
155a7(brgyad stong): shes so// ma shes pas ni mi mthong ngo // ma mthong bas ni khong du chud do// khong du mi chud pa ni chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i las byed yang dag par
155a8(brgyad stong): sogs par byed kun tu sogs par byed nye bar sogs par byed do// de dag chos kyi phongs par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i las byas pa dang bsags pa dang kun nas
155b1(brgyad stong): bsags pa dang nye bar bsags pa des shes rab 'chel par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro// de dag shes rab 'chal par 'gyur
155b2(brgyad stong): ba dang mthun pa'i las mngon par 'dus byas pa dang bsags pa dang / kun nas bsags pa dang nye bar bsags pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad
155b3(brgyad stong): pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa na spong bar 'gyur skur bar 'gyur mi snyan par brjod par 'gyur te skur nas kyang 'byol bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor shes rab kyi
155b4(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spong ba dang skur pa dang mi snyan par brjod pas ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen
155b5(brgyad stong): ba nyid spangs par 'gyur skur bar 'gyur mi snyan par brjod par 'gyur te/ de dag ni rang gi rgyud bcom zhing bsregs nas blo chung ba shes rab chung ba bsod nams
155b6(brgyad stong): chung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba chung po'i gang zag dad pa tsam dang ldan pa dga' ba tsam dang ldan pa/ dang ba tsam dang ldan pa 'dun pa tsam dang ldan pa las dang po pa skal ba med
155b7(brgyad stong): pa'i rang bzhin can gzhan rnams kyi yang dad pa tsam dang dga' ba tsam dang dang btsam dang 'dun pa tsam de yang phyir bzlog cing 'bral bar byed ldog par byed de/ 'di
155b8(brgyad stong): la bslab par mi bya'o// zhes smra zhing 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung ma yin no zhes tshig tu rjod par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag bdag gi rgyud bcom zhing phral te gzhan
156a1(brgyad stong): gyi rgyud kyang bcom zhing phral nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skur pa 'debs par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skur pa/
156a2(brgyad stong): btab na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skur pa btab par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skur pa btab na 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sang
156a3(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skur pa btab par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi drung nas 'byol bar 'gyur/ chos kyi
156a4(brgyad stong): yongs su btang bar 'gyur dge 'dun las yongs su phyi rol tu 'gyur ro// de ltar de rnams thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad dkon
156a5(brgyad stong): mchog gsum las phyi rol tu 'gyur te/ de dag sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba nye bar gcod par byed pas sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su
156a6(brgyad stong): rnam par smin par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i las nye bar sogs par 'gyur ro// de dag de lta bu'i las mngon par 'du byed pa dang nye bar bzhag pa dang / kun nas
156a7(brgyad stong): blang ba dang chos kyi phongs par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i rang bzhin de nyid kyis lo brgya phrag mang po dang lo stong phrag mang po dang lo brgya stong phrag mang po dang lo bye
156a8(brgyad stong): ba brgya phrag mang po dang lo bye ba stong phrag mang po dang / lo bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba chen po
156b1(brgyad stong): rnams su ltung bar 'gyur ro// de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de dag de ltar yun ring por sems ca
156b2(brgyad stong): dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho ba na mes 'jig pa'i bskal pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mes 'jig pa'i bskal pa byung ba na 'jig rten gyi
156b3(brgyad stong): khams gzhan dag na sems can dmyal ba chen po gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'dor bar 'gyur te de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro// der
156b4(brgyad stong): bor te sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu ltung bar gyur pa de dag der yang sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho bar 'gyur ro//
156b5(brgyad stong): de dag der yang sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho ba na der yang slar de kho na bzhin du mes 'jig pa'i bskal pa 'byung bar
156b6(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// de dag mes 'jigs pa'i bskal pa byung ba na de nas shi 'phos ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na sems can dmyal ba chen po yod pa
156b7(brgyad stong): der 'dor te de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// der yang kho na bzhin du sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho
156b8(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur ro// de dag der yang yun ring por sems can dmyal ba chen po de nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho ba na der yang mes 'jig pa'i skal pa 'byung bar
157a1(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// de dag tu mes 'jig pa'i bskal pa byung ba na yang de dag de nas shi 'phos te/ lus ma zad cing lhag ma dang bcas pa'i las de
157a2(brgyad stong): nyid kyis slar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'dor bar 'gyur zhing bor bar gyur pa na yang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag slar sems
157a3(brgyad stong): can dmyal ba chen po rnams su sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal chen po de dag myong bar 'gyur te ji srid du mes 'jig pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba de srid du myong bar
157a4(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag sdug bsngal mang po myong ba dang mthun pa'i las nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de lta bu'i tshig gi nyes pa spros pa'i phyir
157a5(brgyad stong): re/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i las bgyis shing nye//
157a6(brgyad stong): bar bsags pa rnams ni/ yid kyis nonges par sprad pa dang ngag gis nong par spyad pa 'di'i gzugs brnyan nam rjes su mthun pa 'am tshul mthun pa tsam yang
157a7(brgyad stong): ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no sha ri'i bu de de bzhin to/ sha ri'i bu mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas shing nye bar bsags
157a8(brgyad stong): pa rnams ni yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ngag gis nyes par spyad pa'i las byas shing bsags te kun nas bsags pa dang nye bar bsags pa 'di'i gzugs brnyan
157b1(brgyad stong): nab rjes su mthun pa 'am/ tshul mthun pa tsam yang ma yin no// gang su dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chang ba dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa
157b2(brgyad stong): la phyir gzhil bar sems shing skur par 'gyur mi snyen par zer bar 'gyur te/ 'di la bslab par mi bya'o zhes smra bar 'gyur la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa
157b3(brgyad stong): ma yin no zhes tshig smra bar 'gyur zhing sems can gzhan dag kyang de dang bral bar byed pa de dag ni rang gi rgyud bcom nas gzhan gyi rgyud kyang 'joms par 'gyur/ rang
157b4(brgyad stong): gi rgyud dug can du byas nas gzhan gyi rgyud kyang dug can du byed par 'gyur/ rang nyid brlag nas gzhan yang brlag par byed par 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyang shes
157b5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma shes ma rtogs la gzhan dag kyang 'di la bslabs par mi bya'o// zhes 'dzin du 'jug pa'o// sha ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu
157b6(brgyad stong): rang bzhin can ni blta bar yang ngas mi gnang na de dag dang 'grogs pa lta ci smos rnyed pa dang bkur sti lta ci smos gnas pa lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
157b7(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bu de lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi gang zag de dag ni chos la sun 'byin par rig par bya ba yin no// shA ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu'i rang bzhin can de dag ni
157b8(brgyad stong): lo 'dab rul pa lta bur gyur par rig par bya'o// sha ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu de dag ni nag po'i rang bzhin can nag po nye bar skyed par rig par bya'o// sha
158a1(brgyad stong): ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu de dag las gang dag mnyan pa dang dad par bya bar sems pa de dag thams cad kyang tshul me yin pas brlag par 'gyur/
158a2(brgyad stong): ro// sha ri'i bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sun 'byin pa de dag ni sha ri'i bu chos la sun 'byin pa'i gang zag tu rig par bya'o// sha ri'i bus gsol
158a3(brgyad stong): pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang zag der skyes shing sems can dmyal ba chen po na mchis pa de'i lus kyi tshad ma bstan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
158a4(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gang zag sems can dmyal ba chen po der skyes pa de'i lus kyi tshad lta zhog cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zag de lta bu'i rang bzhin
158a5(brgyad stong): can gyi lus kyi tshad thos nas khrag dron po kha nas skyug cing 'chi bor 'gyur ba'am 'chi ba tsam mam sdug bsngal mi bzod pa dang nad kyis reg cing tshig pa 'am
158a6(brgyad stong): de la mya ngan gyi zug tu zhugs pa 'am ga yang sa chen por ltung ba 'am bskam pa 'am snying par gyur na mi rung bas na gang la nyes pa de dag yod pa'i lus de'i
158a7(brgyad stong): chad 'jigs pa chen po can de ltar bu thos par ma gyur ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lus de'i tshad 'di tsam du 'gyur ro zhes tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la go
158a8(brgyad stong): skabs ma phye'o// lan gnyis lan gsum du yang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// gang zag de'i lus kyi tshad kyis
158b1(brgyad stong): phyi ma'i skye bo la snang bar bgyis par 'gyur bas ngag dang yid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dang kun tu bsags pa dang nye bar bsags pa 'dis sems
158b2(brgyad stong): can dmyal ba chen po'i lus 'di lta bu chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
158b3(brgyad stong): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gang dag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa mngon par 'dus byas pa bsags shing
158b4(brgyad stong): kun nas bsags la nye bar bsags pa 'dis yun ring po 'di tsam du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyis phyi ma'i skye bo la snang bar byas
158b5(brgyad stong): par 'gyur te/ sha ri'i bu sdug bsngal de nyid la gzhal du med pa dang sdug bsngal mang por bshad pa gang yin pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
158b6(brgyad stong): bu mo gang dag dkar po'i skal ba can rnams skyo bar 'gyur zhing de nas de chos kyis phong par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i las de dag las rnam par ldog cing bsod
158b7(brgyad stong): nams mngon par 'du byed pa kho na byed de/ bdag kyang de dang 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal dang phrad par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos spong
158b8(brgyad stong): bar mi byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos lus
159a1(brgyad stong): kyi las dang ngag gi las dang yid kyi las shin tu bsdams par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar ngag gis nongs pa
159a2(brgyad stong): smras pa de lta bu'i ngo bos bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po chen po 'di skyes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das yang las gang gis bsod nams ma lags
159a3(brgyad stong): pa'i phung po chen po 'di skyes par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dag gis nyes par smras pa de lta bu'i ngo bos bsod nams ma
159a4(brgyad stong): yin pa'i phung po chen po 'di tsam skyes so// rab 'byor gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di sun dbyung bar sems par 'gyur skur par sems
159a5(brgyad stong): par 'gyur phyir gzhil bar sems par 'gyur ba'i skyes bu gti mug can de dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di nyid du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
159a6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di phyir bcil na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub kyang phyir bcil bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub phyir bcil
159a7(brgyad stong): na 'das pa dang ma 'ong ba dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir bcil bar 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa
159a8(brgyad stong): nyid phyir bci la na dam pa'i chos phyir bcil bar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos phyir bcil na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phyir bcil par 'gyur
159b1(brgyad stong): ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phyir bcil ba de lta na ni dkon mchog gsum las thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad
159b2(brgyad stong): phyi rol du gyur pa yin pas ches gzhal du med cing grangs med pa'i mi dge ba'i las chen po mngon par 'du byed pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka'
159b3(brgyad stong): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu
159b4(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di la phyir gzhi la bar sems pa de'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
159b5(brgyad stong): bu mo de bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'am/ shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i ngag gi las kyis 'di chos zab mo dag la mi dad cing rab tu dad par mi
159b6(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sdig pa'i chos 'di gnyis dang ldan pas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la phyir 'jil bar 'gyur ro//
159b7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chang ba dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa na phyir gzhil bar sems par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni rnam pa bzhi
159b8(brgyad stong): po 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de sdig pa'i grogs pa'i lag tu son par 'gyur ba 'am/ mngon par mi brtson par 'gyur ba
160a1(brgyad stong): 'am/ phung po la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba 'am/ bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod de nyes pa'i skabs tshol bar 'gyur ba'o// 'phags
160a2(brgyad stong): ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las dmyal ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bdun pa'o// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong
160a3(brgyad stong): ga bam po dgu pa// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
160a4(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par mi brtson pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song bas mos par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
160a5(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ de de bzhin no rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mngon par mi brtson pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang blo zhen pa dang don du
160a6(brgyad stong): mi gnyer ba dang thos pa nyung ba dang shes rab zhan pa dang sdig pa'i grogs po'i nye bar brtan pa dang legs par mi nyan pa dang / mi 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can dang dge ba'i
160a7(brgyad stong): chos la mi brtson pas mos par dka'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das e ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mos par dka' ba'i slad du 'di tsam du
160a8(brgyad stong): zab pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs ngo bo nyid med
160b1(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir
160b2(brgyad stong): zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o//
160b3(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs la sngon gyi mtha'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzugs kyi phyi ma'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/

160b5(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' ma bcing
160b6(brgyad stong): ma grel pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa la sngon gyi mtha'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i phyi ma'i mtha' ma bcings
160b7(brgyad stong): ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa la phyi ma'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i da ltar byung ba ma bcing
160b8(brgyad stong): ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par shes pa la da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
161a1(brgyad stong): @shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi brtson pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa dang sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba dang bdud kyi dbang du gyur

164a7(brgyad stong): 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gang du chags pa 'di dag kyang bshad pas ci tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di legs par bshad cing legs par bstan te/

164b1(brgyad stong): pa de dag gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzugs stong pa'o// snyam pa ni chags pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang
164b2(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams dang tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam pa ni chags pa'o// 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos rnams so zhes yang
164b3(brgyad stong): dag par shes pa ni chags pa'o// ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams so zhes yang dag par shes pa ni chags pa'o// da ltar byung ba'i chos
164b4(brgyad stong): rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams so zhes yang dag par shes pa ni chags pa'o// gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can sems dang po bskyed pas

164b7(brgyad stong): dang po'o zhes byang chub kyi sems de yang dag par shes shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes yongs su sngo bar byed pas
164b8(brgyad stong): te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa des sems kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar ni mi nus so// kau shi ka de bas na
165a1(brgyad stong): @gzhan la yang dag par ston pa dang yang dag par 'god pa dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
165a2(brgyad stong): byed pas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag pa nyid rjes su rtogs pas yang dag par bstan par bya yang dag par dgod par bya yang
165a3(brgyad stong): dag par gzengs bstod par bya/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ste/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bdag nyid la yang gnod par mi byed cing
165a4(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par 'god pas gzhan 'god par byed par yang 'gyur la chags pa'i mtha' 'di dag thams cad kyang rnam par spangs
165a5(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
165a6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po dag la chags pa'i mthe' 'di dag khong du chud par byed pa legs so legs so// rab 'byor de'i phyir chags pa rab tu phra ba gzhan dag kyang
165a7(brgyad stong): brjod par bya ste legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shog dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
165a8(brgyad stong): 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa
165b1(brgyad stong): dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar yid la byed na yang rab 'byor mtshan ma ji srid pa de srid du chags pa
165b2(brgyad stong): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtshan ma las ni chags par 'gyur ro// de ltar na de 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
165b3(brgyad stong): 'das rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ngo // de ltar rjes su yi rang nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bla na
165b4(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes yongs su sngo bar byed na/ rab 'byor yang chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'das pa
165b5(brgyad stong): 'am ma 'ongs pa 'am da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ gang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ma yin pa de ni dus gsum las nges par grol ba/ gang dus gsuM
165b6(brgyad stong): las nges par grol ba de ni yongs su bsngo ba dang mtshan mar bya ba dang dmigs par bya bar mi nus shing / de ni mthong ba dang thos pa dang rtogs pa dang rnam par shes
165b7(brgyad stong): pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ni zab po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
165b8(brgyad stong): dben pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin zab po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
166a1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i phyir dang / rab 'byor rang bzhin dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin zab bo// rab
166a2(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin dben pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
166a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad rang bzhin dben pa nyid de rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dben pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes
166a4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
166a5(brgyad stong): kyis ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
166a6(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rlung bzhin gyis
166a7(brgyad stong): chos de dag gang yang med do// rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin med pa rang bzhin med pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin yin te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi
166a8(brgyad stong): mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir na mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
166b1(brgyad stong): chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med de rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi
166b2(brgyad stong): rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin med pa rang bzhin med pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin yin te/
166b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ltar na chags pa'i mtha' de dag thams cad rnam par spangs pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
166b4(brgyad stong): ni zab pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor gyis gsol
166b5(brgyad stong): pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rjes su rtogs par dka' ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar
166b6(brgyad stong): su yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags
166b7(brgyad stong): sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems kyis shes par bya ba ma yin sems kyis rtogs par
166b8(brgyad stong): bya ba ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bgyis pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
167a1(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ rab 'byor byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma byas pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
167a2(brgyad stong): 'das de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ci ltar spyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
167a3(brgyad stong): 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gzugs la mi spyod no/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
167a4(brgyad stong): de bzhin du gal te tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ gol te rnam par shes po la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong
167a5(brgyad stong): do/ gal te gzugs mi rtags pa'o zhes mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang gal te rnam par
167a6(brgyad stong): shes pa mi rtag pa'o zhes mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs stong pa'o zhes mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod do// de bzhin
167a7(brgyad stong): tu tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ gal te rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam du mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
167a8(brgyad stong): gal te gzugs ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa'o snyam du mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzugs kyi rdzogs pa ma yin pa'am rdzogs pa gang yin
167b1(brgyad stong): ba de ni gzugs ma yin te gal te de ltar yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la
167b2(brgyad stong): ma yin gal te rnam par shes pa rdzogs pa ma yin pa dang rdzogs pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam par shes pa rdzogs pa ma yin pa
167b3(brgyad stong): 'am rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ de ltar yang mi sprod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
167b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi phyir de ltar ci srid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
167b5(brgyad stong): rnams kyi chags pa dang bcas pa nyid dang chags pa ma mchis pa nyid bshad pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub
167b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du cha
167b7(brgyad stong): ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang gal te rnam par shes pa la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin phyin pa la
167b8(brgyad stong): spyod do// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
168a1(brgyad stong): phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi
168a2(brgyad stong): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// sa'i khams la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
168a3(brgyad stong): spyod do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// sbyin
168a4(brgyad stong): po'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha
168a5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
168a6(brgyad stong): chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
168a7(brgyad stong): dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rigs pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la tshogs pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'i
168a8(brgyad stong): snyam du mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod
168b1(brgyad stong): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid la chags pa dang
168b2(brgyad stong): bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rang sangs rgyas nyid la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med
168b3(brgyad stong): pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// sangs rgyas nyid la chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi
168b4(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor gal te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang chags pa dang bcas pa dang chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
168b5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni gzugs la chags pa mi skyed do de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin
168b6(brgyad stong): 'du shes ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin rnam par shes pa la chags pa mi skyed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar na mig la
168b7(brgyad stong): chags pa mi skyed pa nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar la chags pa mi skyed/ sa'i khams la chags pa mi skyed pa nas rnam par shes pa'i
168b8(brgyad stong): khams kyi bar la chags pa mi skyed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa mi skyed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lam yin bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
169a1(brgyad stong): lam yin brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma yin bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma yin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa
169a2(brgyad stong): mi skyed/ byang chub kyi phyogs rnams la ma yin stobs rnams la ma yin mi 'jigs pa rnams la ma yin so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la ma yin sangs
169a3(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams la chags pa mi skyed do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa mi skyed lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma
169a4(brgyad stong): yin phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lam yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid la chags pa mi skyed/ rang sangs rgyas nyid la chags pa mi skyed/ sangs rgyas nyid la chags pa
169a5(brgyad stong): mi skyed/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa mi skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma chags pa ma bcings pa ma grol ba
169a6(brgyad stong): yang dag par ma 'das pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na chags pa thams cad las rab tu bzla ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
169a7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos 'di ni zab ste/
169a8(brgyad stong): ni bstan kyang mi 'grib mo bstan kyang mi 'grib bstan kyang mi 'phel ma bstan kyang mi 'phel ba ni ngo mtshar to// de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis/
169b1(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor legs so legs so rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na
169b2(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci srid 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing nam mkha'i bsngags pa brjod kyang nam mkha' yongs su
169b3(brgyad stong): 'phel bar mi 'gyur/ bsngags pa ma brjod kyang nam mkha' yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu la brjod kyang rjes
169b4(brgyad stong): su chags par yang mi 'gyur kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ bsngags pa ma brjod kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
169b5(brgyad stong): de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de yang bstan kyang de skyed du zad do ma bstan kyang de snyed du zad do// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bco
169b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa gang zhig
169b7(brgyad stong): zhum par mi bgyid ya ya bor mi 'gyur te/ 'di la rnal 'byor tu yang bgyid la phyir mi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes
169b8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' sgom pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis go cha 'di bgos pa
170a1(brgyad stong): de dag ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa lags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang sems can rnams kyi srad du go cha bgo bar 'tshal ba
170a2(brgyad stong): de ni nam mkha' dang lhan cig go cha bgo bar 'tshal ba lags so// gang zhig nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems can chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems can
170a3(brgyad stong): chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha bgo bar 'tshal ba de ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po
170a4(brgyad stong): bgos pa lags te bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bo lags so// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal
170a5(brgyad stong): ba de ni bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' yongs su thar bar 'tshal ba lags so// de ni bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' 'degs par 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan
170a6(brgyad stong): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de ni
170a7(brgyad stong): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha chen po thob pa lags so// de nas dge slong gzhan zhig gis bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas
170a8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
170b1(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang mi skyed chos gang yang 'gog par mi bgyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces smras
170b2(brgyad stong): so/ 'phags pa rab 'byor gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la de ltar rnal 'byor du byed pa de ci la rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
170b3(brgyad stong): kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnal 'byor du byed pa de ni nam mkha' la rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la
170b4(brgyad stong): slob cing rnal 'byor tu byed par sems pa de ni bla gab med pa la rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'dri
170b5(brgyad stong): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa
170b6(brgyad stong): dang sba ba ci zhig bgyi ba bka' stsal bar gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kau shi ka chos gang
170b7(brgyad stong): la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang smra bar bya ba'i chos de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/
170b8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ci ltar bshad pa 'di la gnas na de nyid
171a1(brgyad stong): de la srung ba dang skyob pa dang sbed par 'gyur ro// de ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na ni mi dang mi ma yin pa de la glags lta ba
171a2(brgyad stong): dang glags tshol ba dag gis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la
171a3(brgyad stong): bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar bya bar sems pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar bya bar sems so// kau shi ka 'di ci snyam du sems khyod kyis
171a4(brgyad stong): brug cha la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar byed par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
171a5(brgyad stong): kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod cing gnas pas ni chos thams cad kyang brag cha lta bur yongs
171a6(brgyad stong): su shes so// de bas na rlom sems su mi byed yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi shes yang dag por mi shes chos de dag kyang med cing yang dag par mi snang la/
171a7(brgyad stong): yang dag par med cing mi dmigs so zhes gnas te/ gal te de ltar gnas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum
171a8(brgyad stong): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rgyal po chen po bzhi po dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin thams cad dang tshangs pa chen po thams cad dang mi mdzad kyi bdag
171b1(brgyad stong): po tshangs pa chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
171b2(brgyad stong): te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang rgyal po chen po de dag dang lha rnams kyi
171b3(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin thams cad dang tshangs pa chen po thams cad dang tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs
171b4(brgyad stong): kyis sangs rgyas stong dang de dag gis ming 'di dag nyid dang tshig 'di dag nyid dang yi ge 'di dag nyid dang rab 'byor ces bya ba'i dge slong 'di dag nyid kyis shes rab kyi
171b5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid nye bar bstan cing / der yang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin rnams nyid kyis yongs su dris shing
171b6(brgyad stong): yongs su zhus te sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bshad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas kyang bla na med
171b7(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chang bar 'gyur ba shes par
171b8(brgyad stong): gyur to// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de
172a1(brgyad stong): @nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di
172a2(brgyad stong): ni ming tsam mo// ming de yang 'di'o zhes mi dmigs te ngag gi dngos po 'di nyid ming zhes bgyi'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang ma mchis mi dmigs
172a3(brgyad stong): te/ ming ci lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ci lta bar ming yang de bzhin te/ chos 'di gnyis ni ma mchis
172a4(brgyad stong): shing mi dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
172a5(brgyad stong): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ming 'di dag nyid dang / tshig 'di dag nyid dang yi ge 'di dag nyid dang sa phyogs 'di nyid tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid
172a6(brgyad stong): 'chad par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ltar
172a7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams ni gzugs rtag pa ma yin/ mi rtag pa ma yin/ gzugs bcings pa ma yin grol ba ma yin pas mtha' yas
172a8(brgyad stong): 'das shing rnam par dag pa'o zhes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin//
172b1(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa rtag pa ma yin mi rtag pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa bcings ma yin grol ba ma yin pas mtha' las 'das shing rnam par dag pa'o zhes mngon pa
172b2(brgyad stong): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
172b3(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ming 'di dag nyid dang tshig 'di dag nyid dang yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
172b4(brgyad stong): 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
172b5(brgyad stong): 'das e ma'o shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs rnam par dag pas/ shes
172b6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byer de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi/
172b7(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa rnam
172b8(brgyad stong): par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa
173a1(brgyad stong): dang 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
173a2(brgyad stong): yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor nam mkha' rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs gos pa med cing
173a3(brgyad stong): yongs su 'dzin pa med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par
173a4(brgyad stong): shes pa gos pa med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor nam mkha' dang brag cha smrar med cing
173a5(brgyad stong): brjod du med la/ dmigs su med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor nye bar gos pa dang gos pa med pa'i chos thams cad
173a6(brgyad stong): kyis gos pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
173a7(brgyad stong): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag par 'gyur ba de
173a8(brgyad stong): dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa
173b1(brgyad stong): dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de dag la ni mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur rna ba'i nad ma yin sna'i nad ma yin lce'i nad ma
173b2(brgyad stong): yin lus kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rmongs pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro// de dag ni nyam nga ba mi spong bas 'chi ba'i dus mi bgyid do// de dag la lha'i bu brgya
173b3(brgyad stong): stong phrag mang po dag de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro// tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang bco lnga la chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dang
173b4(brgyad stong): gang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad par 'gyur ba de dang der bsod nams ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
173b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de de bzhin no rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
173b6(brgyad stong): bu mo de de'i phyi bzhin du lha brgya stong phrag mang po dag rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// lha brgya stong phrag mang po dag der 'ong bar 'gyur ro// chos ston pa de shes rab
173b7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad par byed pa'i chos nyan par 'dod pa de dag thams cad kyang bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
173b8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rin po che bla na med pa'o// rab 'byor de'i phyir yang rigs kyi bu 'am/
174a1(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi
174a2(brgyad stong): ger 'dri ba dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed
174a3(brgyad stong): pa la bar chad mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rin po che chen po ni dgra mang ba yin te/ ci tsam du gces par gyur pa bzhin
174a4(brgyad stong): du dgra ches lci bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che chen po 'di ni 'jig rten na bla na med pa'i rin po che ste 'jig rten
174a5(brgyad stong): la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa chos thams cad mi skye ba dang mi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med par bya ba'i phyir mi 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis
174a6(brgyad stong): nye bar gnas pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang la yang mi gnas chos gang la yang mi sbyor chos gang la yang yongs su mi 'dzin
174a7(brgyad stong): to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad ni med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
174a8(brgyad stong): ma gos pa'o// rab 'byor ma gos pa zhes bya ba 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ma gos pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
174b1(brgyad stong): ma gos pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ma gos pas na rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma gos pa'o//
174b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gal te de ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par mi shes na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor yang shes rab
174b3(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang la yang 'jug par byed pa 'am nges par 'jug par byed pa 'am/ yang dag par ston par byed pa 'am/ nges par ston par
174b4(brgyad stong): byed pa 'am/ yongs su thob par byed pa 'am nges par thob par byed pa med do// de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po dag par snang la ca co dang ga zha dag byed de
174b5(brgyad stong): gos dag 'thor zhing 'di skad du e ma 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba lan gnyis su byung bar snang ngo zhes kyang zer ro// de nas bcom ldan
174b6(brgyad stong): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis su bskor ba ma yin te/ chos
174b7(brgyad stong): gang la yang rab tu bskor ba 'am ldog pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// de
174b8(brgyad stong): skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gang zhig chos thams cad
175a1(brgyad stong): la chags pa ma mchis pa dang / gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal yang chos gang
175a2(brgyad stong): yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor yang chos gang yang yang dag par mi ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
175a3(brgyad stong): chen po de'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos gang zhig dmigs par bya ba 'am chos gang zhig bstan par bya ba de ni med la 'ga' zhig gis
175a4(brgyad stong): 'ga' zhig bskor bar bya ba yang med do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni shin tu mngon par ma grub pa ste/ chos gang yang ldog par mi
175a5(brgyad stong): 'gyur rab tu bskor bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni thog ma nas mngon par ma grub pa ste/ chos thams cad ni rang
175a6(brgyad stong): bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de
175a7(brgyad stong): bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid ni rab tu 'jug pa 'am ldog pa med do// rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa yang 'jug pa 'ang ldeg pa med do// rab 'byor/
175a8(brgyad stong): smon pa med pa yang 'jug pa 'am ldog pa med do// rab 'byor gang 'di ltar bstan pa 'di ni chos thams cad bstan pa yin te/ sus kyang bstan pa med la sus kyang
175b1(brgyad stong): thos pa yang med sus kyang mnos pa yang med sus kyang mngon sum du byas pa yang med sus kyang mngon sum du byed pa yang ma yin/ sus kyang mngon sum du byed par
175b2(brgyad stong): yang mi 'gyur ro// chos bstan pa 'dis ni su yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ chos
175b3(brgyad stong): bstan pa 'dis ni su yang sbyin pa'i gnas su byas pa yang med do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
175b4(brgyad stong): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dmigs su ma
175b5(brgyad stong): mchis par mnyam pa'i slad du 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shin tu stong pa'i slad du 'di ni dben pa'i pha rol tu
175b6(brgyad stong): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni mi rdzi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ming ma mchis shing lus ma
175b7(brgyad stong): mchis pa'i srad du 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i pha
175b8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phung po
176a1(brgyad stong): lnga dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni ming mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i
176a2(brgyad stong): slad du 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad gzungs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin
176a3(brgyad stong): ba'o// bcom ldan 'das mi bas pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i slad du 'di ni mi bas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma grub pa'i
176a4(brgyad stong): slad du 'di ni chos thams cad mi skye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
176a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dag
176a6(brgyad stong): mi skye ba'i slad du 'di ni mi 'pho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs pa'i slad du la
176a7(brgyad stong): ni 'dul ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa rnam par shes par bgyid pa'i slad du 'di ni rmi lam dang / sgra bstan dang mig
176a8(brgyad stong): yor dang / smig rgyu dang sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni kun nas
176b1(brgyad stong): nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rten mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// @
176b2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das nam mkha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni gos pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rlom sems thams cad las 'das
176b3(brgyad stong): pa'i slad du 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das g.yo ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin
176b4(brgyad stong): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi slad du 'di ni mi g.yo ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad phyin ci leg
176b5(brgyad stong): pa de bzhin nyid kyi slad du 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi slad du 'di
176b6(brgyad stong): ni ldang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i srad du 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
176b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du 'di ni skyon ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yongs su rtog pa ma mchis pa'i srad du 'di ni /
176b8(brgyad stong): mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i srad du 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
177a1(brgyad stong): chos thams cad ldang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma/
177a2(brgyad stong): zhen pa'i slad du 'di ni mtha' gnyis mi rtogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni tha mi dad pa'i pha rol
177a3(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad la 'dod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni mchog tu mi 'dzin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// /
177a4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rnam par rtog pa zhi ba nyid kyi slad du 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid tshad ma mchis pa nyid kyi slad du
177a5(brgyad stong): 'di ni gzhal du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu
177a6(brgyad stong): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad 'dus ma bgyis pa'i slad du 'di ni mi rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad nam mkha'
177a7(brgyad stong): dang mnyam pa'i slad du 'di ni sdug bsngal ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i srad du 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
177a8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma chags pa'i slad du 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma
177b1(brgyad stong): grub pa'i slad du 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mtha' yas mu ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni stong pa nyid thams cad kyi pha rol
177b2(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs de rnams dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
177b3(brgyad stong): rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i pha rol
177b4(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam
177b5(brgyad stong): gtan dang po la sogs pa mi dmigs pa'i srad du 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal la
177b6(brgyad stong): sogs pa mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni bden pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa la sogs pa mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni sa bcu'i
177b7(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi rdzi ba'i slad du 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shin tu ma zhum pa'i slad du 'di ni mi 'jigs
177b8(brgyad stong): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad chags pa ma mchis pa dang / thog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni so so yang dag par rig
178a1(brgyad stong): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i slad du 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams
178a2(brgyad stong): cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma log pa de bzhin nyid kyi slad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// /
178a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rnam
178a4(brgyad stong): pa thams cad yongs su mkhyen pa'i slad du 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'phags pa
178a5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad
178a6(brgyad stong): stong pa/ bam po bcu pa// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi
178a7(brgyad stong): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du snang bar 'gyur ba yang sngon rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas par 'gyur ba dang sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba
178a8(brgyad stong): bskrun pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ba yin na/ gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba
178b1(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur klog par 'gyur kun chub par byed par 'gyur rab tu 'don par 'gyur ston par 'gyur nye bar ston par 'gyur lung 'bog par 'gyur kha ton byed par 'gyu
178b2(brgyad stong): zhing gzung ba dang bcang ba dang bklags pa dang kun chub pa dang rab tu ston pa dang bstan pa dang nye bar bstan pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byas nas de bzhin
178b3(brgyad stong): nyid du slob pa dang de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon tsam dang ldan par mi
178b4(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la brnyan bkur byas par 'gyur ro// gang dag da ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/
178b5(brgyad stong): nyan par 'gyur zhing mnyan nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur 'chang bar 'gyur klog par 'gyur kun chub par byed par 'gyur rab tu 'don par 'gyur nye bar ston par 'gyur
178b6(brgyad stong): lung 'bogs par 'gyur/ kha ton byed par 'gyur de bzhin nyid du slob par 'gyur de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'gyur de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ba'i
178b7(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thad dus kyang shes rab
178b8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su zhus shing yongs su dris par byas pa yin no//
179a1(brgyad stong): gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa 'di bshad pa dang bstan pa dang nye bar bstan pa la 'gong bar mi 'gyur kun tu zhum par mi/
179a2(brgyad stong): 'gyur bag tsha bar mi 'gyur bag 'khums par mi 'gyur yid phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pa dang
179a3(brgyad stong): ldan par mi 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus lha
179a4(brgyad stong): rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi 'di lta bu'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyi shes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
179a5(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid 'chad pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa la/ mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub tu
179a6(brgyad stong): sems bskyed de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang /
179a7(brgyad stong): lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton bgyid pa dang de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du bgyid par 'gyur ba de ni phyir mi ldog
179a8(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ba de bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
179b1(brgyad stong): 'di ni zab ste/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon du ma thos shing yongs su ma dris pa'i rang bzhin can du
179b2(brgyad stong): gyur pa dang sngon spyad pa dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis ni 'di ltar zab pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos par mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das yang gang dag
179b3(brgyad stong): 'di la mos shing ma rtogs pas spong bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni/ sngon gyi mthar yang 'di ltar zab pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
179b4(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di nyid bshad pa na spangs par gyur to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i slad du sngon gyi mthar ma sbed pas
179b5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ci ltar yang mos par mi nus so// gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa na spong bar 'gyur ba de
179b6(brgyad stong): dag kyang de bzhin du rig par bgyi ste/ de dag gis sngon gyis mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid bshad pa na spangs pa lags te 'di ltar de dag
179b7(brgyad stong): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la dad pa ma mchis bzod pa ma mchis sred pa ma mchis 'dun pa ma mchis brtson 'grus ma mchis dang ba ma
179b8(brgyad stong): mchis mos pa ma mchis so// de dag gis ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la yongs su ma dris te yongs su dri ba ma
180a1(brgyad stong): @bgyis so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa sha ri'i bu shes rab
180a2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon ma sprad pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la mos par
180a3(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur ba de la ngo mtshar ci zhig yod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbango po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab
180a4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal
180a5(brgyad stong): ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de de bzhin no de bzhin te/ kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba
180a6(brgyad stong): de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di
180a7(brgyad stong): las skyes te/ kau shi ka thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las skyes pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu phye ba yin no// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
180a8(brgyad stong): pa 'di la spyad par bya/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas par bya/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du bya'o// de nas
180b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
180b2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol
180b3(brgyad stong): phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kau shi ka/
180b4(brgyad stong): legs so legs so// kau shi ka gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar bya ba dang yongs su
180b5(brgyad stong): dri bar byed par sems dpa' ni yang khyod legs so// kau shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus skyes pa yin no// kau shi ka byang chub sems
180b6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod na/ gzugs la mi gnas gzugs so zhes mi gnas te kau shi ka 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
180b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po gzugs la mi gnas gzugs so zhes mi gnas pa de ltar na kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed
180b8(brgyad stong): pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa la mi gnas rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi gnas te/ kau shi ka 'di ltar byang chub
181a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par shes pa la mi gnas rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi gnas pa de ltar na kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sem
181a2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// kau shi ka gzugs so zhes mi sbyor te/ kau shi ka 'di ltar gzugs so zhes mi sbyor ba de ltar na gzugs
181a3(brgyad stong): so zhes mi gnas pa yin no// kau shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'dra byed rnam dang rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi sbyor te/ kau shi ka 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'o
181a4(brgyad stong): zhes mi sbyor ba de ltar na rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi gnas pa yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas shing de ltar rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ro// de
181a5(brgyad stong): nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes
181a6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gting dpag dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
181a7(brgyad stong): phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu gzugs zab po snyam du mi gnas
181a8(brgyad stong): te/ sha ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs zab bo snyam du mi gnas pa de ltar na gzugs le rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed nam
181b1(brgyad stong): dang / sha ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zab po snyam du mi gnas te/ sha ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam par shes pa zab bo snyam du mi gnas pa de ltar na rnam par shes pa la/
181b2(brgyad stong): rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// sha ri'i bu gzugs zab po snyam du rnal 'byor du mi byed de/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs zab po snyam du rnal 'byor du mi byed pa
181b3(brgyad stong): de ltar na gzugs zab po snyam du mi gnas pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zab po snyam du
181b4(brgyad stong): rnal 'byor du mi byed de/ sha ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam par shes pa zab po snyam du rnal 'byor du mi byed pa de ltar na rnam par shes pa zab bo snyam du mi gnas pa yin no//
181b5(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
181b6(brgyad stong): zab ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog par lung bstan pa rnams kyi mdun du bshad par bgyi ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
181b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de ni nem nur mi bgyid the tshom 'tshal bar mi 'gyur rmongs par mi 'gyur rtsod par mi 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la lha rnams
181b8(brgyad stong): kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa sha ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bsten pa'i mdun du shes
182a1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad na nyes pa cir 'gyur/ de skad ces sbas pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus lha rnams kyi dbang po
182a2(brgyad stong): brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba
182a3(brgyad stong): dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang mnyan pa thob par gyur la/ thos nas kyang dngang bar mi 'gyur kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi
182a4(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni kau shi ka rgyang ring po nas 'ong bar rig par bya ste/ yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa
182a5(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par yin par rig par bya'o// 'di ni ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par
182a6(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ de ni lung bstan pa la bsnyen pa yin par rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
182a7(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig gam gnyis sam gsum las mi 'da' ste/ de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par
182a8(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ mnyes par byas nas
182b1(brgyad stong): kyang thugs phyung bar byed par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yang lung bstan pas 'bras bu yod par byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa
182b2(brgyad stong): mthong ba de las kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// ji srid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
182b3(brgyad stong): chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ba de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang brnyen bkur bya ba dang rim gror bya ba nas bla na med pa yang dag par
182b4(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar gyi 'bras bu yod par byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i
