182b5(brgyad stong): bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang byeg
182b6(brgyad stong): bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang mnyan pa thob par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mchis pa
182b7(brgyad stong): lags te yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi na/ gang 'di thos nas kyang 'dzin pa
182b8(brgyad stong): dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed par 'gyur
183a1(brgyad stong): pa rnams lha smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu de de/
183a2(brgyad stong): bzhi no de bzhin te/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur
183a3(brgyad stong): bya ba dang mnyan pa thob par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shA ri'i bu rgyang ring po nas 'ongs pa yin te/ yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag
183a4(brgyad stong): par zhugs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa yin par rig par bya na/ gang 'di thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang
183a5(brgyad stong): rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
183a6(brgyad stong): pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dper gsol bar bdag spobs so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs so// bcom
183a7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang zhig gi rmi lam du yang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug
183a8(brgyad stong): barmi na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
183b1(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu bsnyen pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba
183b2(brgyad stong): dang / phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang mnyen pa thob par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni rgyang ring po
183b3(brgyad stong): nas mchis pa lags te/ yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags na/ thos nas kyang bzung ba dang
183b4(brgyad stong): bcang ba dang klag pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton du bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci
183b5(brgyad stong): 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni lung bstan pa dang bsnyen pa lags shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs
183b6(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi 'i slad du lung bstan par 'gyur bar rig par
183b7(brgyad stong): bgyi'o// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di than mnyan pa yang rnyed par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni yun ring po nas
183b8(brgyad stong): theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags par rig par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me gang shes rab
184a1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang / nye bar
184a2(brgyad stong): ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton du bgyid par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can chos kyis phongs
184a3(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i las bsags pa dang phal cher ma bral ba de dag gi sems phal cher ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mi mthun par 'gyur
184a4(brgyad stong): zhing sems ldog par 'gyur ro// sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa ni phal cher yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di la rab tu mi 'jug cing rab dad par mi 'gyur te/ gang
184a5(brgyad stong): dag yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di la rab tu 'jug cing rab tu dad par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa lags te bcom ldan 'das de
184a6(brgyad stong): dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu zhig 'brog dgon par dpag tshad brgya pa 'am dpag tshad nyis
184a7(brgyad stong): brgya pa 'am dpag tshad sum brgya pa 'am dpag tshad bzhi brgya pa 'am dpag tshad lnga brgya pa 'am dpag tshad brgya phrag bcu pa'i 'brog dgon pa nas byung ste des byung ba dang mtshan
184a8(brgyad stong): ma gang gis grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal mchis par mngon pa'i mtshan ma sngar gda' ba ba lang rdzi 'am phyags rdzi 'am mtshams sam kun dga' ra ba phun sum chog
184b1(brgyad stong): pa 'am tshal phun sum tshogs pa'am de ma lags pa'i mtshan ma gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ des sngar mtshan ma de dag mthong ba dang / 'di snyam du 'di ltar sngar
184b2(brgyad stong): mtshan ma 'di dag snang bas/ de ltar grong ngam grong khyer ram grong rdal du nye bar gyur to snyam nas de ni dbugs phyin pa rnyed pa lags te/ de la slan chad chom po yid la
184b3(brgyad stong): bgyid pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la nye
184b4(brgyad stong): bar gnas na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsnyen pa lags te/ byang chub
184b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par rig par bgyi'o// de yang nyan thos
184b6(brgyad stong): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la skrag par mi 'gyur 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des sngar gyi mtshan ma 'di dag mthong ste/ 'di
184b7(brgyad stong): lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang mnyan pa thob pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
184b8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ sha ri'i bu ci ltar 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthus sgra/
185a1(brgyad stong): ba dang smra bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du yang gnas 'di la khyod spobs par bgyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / com ldan 'das la/
185a2(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na 'di na skyes bu la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po lta 'tshal bar gyur te/ de rgya
185a3(brgyad stong): mtsho chen po ltar mchis pa dang ci lta ci ltar de rgya mtsho chen po lta bar mchis pa de lta de ltar gal te des sdong po 'am sdong po'i mtshan ma 'am ri 'am ri'i mtshan ma mthong
185a4(brgyad stong): na des 'di snyam du 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po ni da dung ring ngo snyam du 'tshal bar bgyi'o// gal te phyis sdong po 'am sdong po'i mtshan ma 'am ri 'am ri'i mtshan ma mthong na
185a5(brgyad stong): des 'di snyam du 'di nas ni rgya mtsho chen po dang nye'o snyam du 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni rim gyis dma' ba lags pas rgya mtsho chen po'o
185a6(brgyad stong): nang na sdong po 'am sdong po'i mtshan ma 'am ri 'am ri'i mtshan ma gang yang ma mchis te/ 'di ltar yang rgya mtsho chen po de mig gis mngon gsum du ma mthong ba de lta na yang
185a7(brgyad stong): rgya mtsho chen po ni bdag gis bsnyen te 'di phan chad rgya mtsho chen po mi ring ngo snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
185a8(brgyad stong): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa na 'di snyam du rig par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
185b1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bdag gis bdag mngon sum du ni lung ma bstan pa de lta na yang 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag lung ba ston pa dang bsnyen pa/
185b2(brgyad stong): rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang mnyan pa thob
185b3(brgyad stong): pa'i srad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na dpyid ka'i dus nye bar gnas pa na shing sna tshogs kyi yal ga'i lo ma rnying pa rnams lhag pa las lo sna tshog
185b4(brgyad stong): byung ste/ lo ma rnams byung ba dang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams nags tshal dag la sngar gyi mtshan ma de dag mthong nas/ da ni me tog dang 'bras bu rnams ring
185b5(brgyad stong): po mi thogs par 'byung ngo snyam nas yid dga' bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sdong po las mtshan ma 'di lta bu dag sngar gda' ba'i slad du'o/
185b6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi
185b7(brgyad stong): ba dang mnyen pa rnyed pa'i skad du nye bar gnas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin
185b8(brgyad stong): pa lags par rig par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni de la sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis nye bar bstabs pa lags so// de la gang sngon
186a1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha de dag ni 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la yang bla na med pa yang
186a2(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i mtshan ma sngar byung ba yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
186a3(brgyad stong): byang chub tu ring po mi thogs par lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro snyam nas rab tu dga' bar 'gyur zhing rangs te yid mgu ba skye bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
186a4(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste dper na bud med sbrum ma mngal lci bar gyur pa de gang gi tshe lus bskyod na cher snyom par 'gyur te de 'chag pa la dad tshor mi 'gyur kha zas chung ngu 'tshal bar
186a5(brgyad stong): 'gyur rmug pa dang gnyid chung bar 'gyur smra ba nyung bar 'gyur stobs chung bar 'gyur sdug bsngal mang bar 'gyur smre bzhin du mang du gnas par 'gyur/ 'grogs pa la
186a6(brgyad stong): dad che bar mi 'gyur sngon gyi tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa sten cing nges par bsten la bsgoms te mang du byas pas 'di lta bu'i tshor ba lus kyis myong ngo snyam
186a7(brgyad stong): ba de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ci ltar sngar gyi mtshan ma 'di dag mthong ba de ltar bud med 'di ni ring po mi thogs par bu 'byung bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
186a8(brgyad stong): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa de/ gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang /
186b1(brgyad stong): bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang mnyan pa'i srad du nye bar gnas la/ nyan pa na de la dga' zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la don du gnyer ba'i sems bskyed pa de'i tshe/
186b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ring po mi thogs par lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur
186b3(brgyad stong): bar 'chal bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu legs so legs so
186b4(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bu 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus khyod spobs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
186b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag 'di ltar legs par yong
186b6(brgyad stong): su bzung ba dang legs par sbyangs pa dang yongs su gtad pa'i bar 'di ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub
186b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying rtse ba dang skye bo phal po che'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i
186b8(brgyad stong): phyir zhugs pa ste/ lha dang mi dang sa la snying brtse ba can snying brtse ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod
187a1(brgyad stong): pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bla na med pa'i chos ston par 'dod pa'o// rab
187a2(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa na ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
187a3(brgyad stong): phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
187a4(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba'i ma yin 'du
187a5(brgyad stong): shes kyi ma yin 'du byed rnams kyi ma yin rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de// gzugs kyi 'grib
187a6(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba'i ma yin 'du shes kyi ma yin 'du byed rnams kyi ma yid rnam par shes
187a7(brgyad stong): pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
187a8(brgyad stong): spyod do// chos ma yin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ltar na 'di'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs
187b1(brgyad stong): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bstan pa 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
187b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rab 'byor rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab po// rab
187b3(brgyad stong): 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar yang mi shes na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /
187b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar yang mi shes na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha
187b5(brgyad stong): ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar zab pa 'di la su zhig mos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
187b6(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprad par gyur pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
187b7(brgyad stong): la mos par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyad par gyur pa lags/
187b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na spyad par gyur pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu 'di lo byang chub sems dpa'
188a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la mi rtog mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi rtog sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la yang mi rtog thams cad mkhyen
188a2(brgyad stong): pa nyid la mi rtog go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu stobs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam
188a3(brgyad stong): kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar spyad par gyur
188a4(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sang la yang mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ de ltar spyad par gyur pa zhes bya zhing spyad par gyur pa
188a5(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob po// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
188a6(brgyad stong): zab bo// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rin po che'i phung po'o// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' dag pa'i srad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
188a7(brgyad stong): ni dag pa'i phung po'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par
188a8(brgyad stong): bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha to/ bgyid pa dang yi ger 'dri ba la bar chad bgyid pa mang po 'byung ba 'di ni de/
188b1(brgyad stong): mtshar to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de
188b2(brgyad stong): bzhin te/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab
188b3(brgyad stong): tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang yi ger 'dri ba la bar chad byed pa mang du 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
188b4(brgyad stong): 'byor de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang
188b5(brgyad stong): ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang yi ger 'dri ba dag la bdud sdig can dag bar chad bya bar brtson par byed do// der myur du bris te gal
188b6(brgyad stong): te zla ba 'am zla ba gnyis sam zla ba gsum gyis 'dri na yang bri bar bya ba yin no// gal te lo gcig gis sam de phan chad 'dri bar 'gyur na de lta na yang rab 'byor rig
188b7(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar yin te rin po che chen po gang yin pa de
188b8(brgyad stong): la ni bar chad byed pa mang du 'byung ngo // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
189a1(brgyad stong): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston
189a2(brgyad stong): ba dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton bgyid pa dang yi ger 'dri ba la bdud sdig can bar chad kyi las bgyi bar spro ba rnam pa mang po skyes nas brtson pa bgyid par 'gyur ro//
189a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu
189a4(brgyad stong): 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang yi ger 'dri ba la bdud sdig can bar chad kyi las bya bar brtson par ni 'gyur mod kyi de ltar
189a5(brgyad stong): na yang yi dam ma nyams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bar chad byed mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la che dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces
189a6(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par/
189a7(brgyad stong): byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton bgyid pa dang yi ger 'dri ba la bdud sdig cin dag par bgyi ba la spro ba skye bar 'gyur
189a8(brgyad stong): ba de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na deng sang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par
189b1(brgyad stong): bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton bgyid pa dang yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis mthus rigs
189b2(brgyad stong): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang
189b3(brgyad stong): lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces
189b4(brgyad stong): bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i sangs
189b5(brgyad stong): rgyas rnams kyi mthus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung
189b6(brgyad stong): 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ro// de
189b7(brgyad stong): ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de gang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med grangs med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhug
189b8(brgyad stong): te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lu
190a1(brgyad stong): 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang yi ger 'dri ba la dgongs par 'gyur yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
190a2(brgyad stong): gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa
190a3(brgyad stong): dang kha ton byed pa dang yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ba dag la yang
190a4(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dgongs par 'gyur yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ sha ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pa dang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su
190a5(brgyad stong): bzung ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag la bar chad byed mi nus so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces
190a6(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa
190a7(brgyad stong): dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton bgyid pa dang yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang de bzhin
190a8(brgyad stong): nyid du slob pa dang de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang sa
190b1(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub
190b2(brgyad stong): par bgyid pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton bgyid pa dang yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang
190b3(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du bgyid par 'gyur ba de ltar sgrub par 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis che/
190b4(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no de bzhin te// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams
190b5(brgyad stong): cad ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang
190b6(brgyad stong): 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed pa dang yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang
190b7(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag
190b8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa
191a1(brgyad stong): dang kha ton byed pa dang yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par
191a2(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ sha ri'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs so// sha ri'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gsheg
191a3(brgyad stong): pas gzigs so// sha ri'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs so// thos nas kyang bzung ba dang bcangs pa dang
191a4(brgyad stong): bklags pa dang kun chub par byas pa dang rab tu bton pa dang bstan pa dang nye bar bstan pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byas pa dang yi ger bris nas de bzhin
191a5(brgyad stong): nyid du slob pa dang de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur te/ bla na
191a6(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas 'chang bar 'gyu
191a7(brgyad stong): klog par 'gyur kun chub par byed par 'gyur rab tu 'don par 'gyur ston par 'gyur nye bar ston par 'gyur lung 'bogs par 'gyur kha ton byed par 'gyur yi ger
191a8(brgyad stong): 'bri bar 'gyur gyi de bzhin nyid du mi slob de bzhin nyid du mi sgrub de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du mi byed pa de dag ni/ de bzhin nyid du mi slob pa dang de bzhin nyid du mi sgrub pa dang
191b1(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du mi byed pas/ de bzhin nyid dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gnas par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ shA ri'i bu de dag kyang
191b2(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs te/ sha ri'i bu de dag kyang de bzhin
191b3(brgyad stong): gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi sman gyis rnam par gzigs so// sha ri'i bu de dag gi 'bad pa dang / yongs su g.yo ba de yang don chen po dang / phan yon
191b4(brgyad stong): chen po dang 'bras bu chen po dang rnam par smin pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi don dam
191b5(brgyad stong): pa dang ldan pa yin te/ sems can thams cad la yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya bas nye bar gnas so// sha ri'i bu yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan
191b6(brgyad stong): pa'i mdo sde 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i dus kyi tshe chos 'dul ba snying po gsar pa thob pa na lho phyogs su 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
191b7(brgyad stong): lho phyogs nas kyang bar ta nir 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ba ra ta ni nas kyang byang phyogs su 'byung ste/ sha ri'i bu de'i dus na gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
191b8(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa deng lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed par 'gyur zhing tha na gleg
192a1(brgyad stong): bam du chud par byas nas 'chang bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs so// de dag ni de bzhin
192a2(brgyad stong): gshegs pas mkhyen to// sha ri'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs so/ sha ri'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi
192a3(brgyad stong): spyan gyis rnam par gzigs so// sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lta bur zab mo 'di yang 'di ltar phyi ma'i dus
192a4(brgyad stong): phyi ma'i tshe na byang gi yul dang byang gi phyogs kyi char rgyas par 'gyur lag sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de la byang gi yul dang
192a5(brgyad stong): byang gi phyogs kyi cha der gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mnyan nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnal 'byor du byed pa de dag
192a6(brgyad stong): rgyas par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa dang 'dri ba dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub por byed pa dang /

192a8(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhug par rig par bya'o//
192a9(brgyad stong): ri bu de das ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so//
192b1(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang gi yul dang byang gi phyogs kyi char gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa dang 'dri ba dang 'dzin pa

192b5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po mang zhing shin tu mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu de dag mang mod kyi mang po de dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang 'dri ba dang /
192b6(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang lung 'bogs pa dang kha ton byed par 'gyur ba dang de bzhin

192b8(brgyad stong): ta zham par mi 'gyur bag tsha bar mi 'gyur bag 'khums pa ra mi 'gyur yid phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur dngang bar mi 'gyur kan tu skrag par mi 'gyur kan tu skrag

193a4(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa yin no// de dag ni tshul khrims yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// de dag ni 'di lta ste bla na med pa
193a5(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di nyid las brtsams te skye bo mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
193a6(brgyad stong): mo de dag la nga nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam byas so// de dag ni tshe rabs 'phos kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa dang shes rab
193a7(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa 'di nyid la yang dag par spyod par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams nas de nyid kyi
193a8(brgyad stong): gtam byed par 'gyur de nyid kyi gtam la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// de dag la legs par gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mnyam par
193b1(brgyad stong): gzhag par 'gyur te bdud kyis kyang dbye bar byed mi nus na 'di lta ste sems can gzhan dag gis 'dun pa 'am sngags kyi sgo nas dbye ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
193b2(brgyad stong): de ni 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mthu brtan pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de thos nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
193b3(brgyad stong): 'di la dga' ba dang dang ba dang rab tu dang ba rgya chen po thob par 'gyur ro// de dag gis ni 'di lta ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la skye bo mang po dag
193b4(brgyad stong): gis dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni nga'i mngon sum du tshig 'di skad du/ byang
193b5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa'i spad pa spyod pa na bdag gis srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang srog chags stong phrag mang po dang srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang srog chags
193b6(brgyad stong): bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang srog chags bye ba stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po rnams bla na

196b6(brgyad stong): bdud kyi las mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bar du gcod par bgyid pa'i bdud kyi las mang po tshul ci lta bu dag 'byung /
196b7(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa de dag gis
196b8(brgyad stong): spobs par yun ring mo zhig na 'byung bar 'gyur te rab 'byor 'di ni bdud kyi las dang por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor spobs pa de skyes na yang yid g.yengs pa
197a1(brgyad stong): nyid du 'gyur te 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de dag glal ba dang rgod pa dang steg cing yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur na 'di yang
197a2(brgyad stong): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor sems rnam par g.yeng bas kun chub par byed na 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor rnam par shes
197a3(brgyad stong): pa phan tshun dang ldan pas yi ger 'dri na 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor dran pa mi 'thob na 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab
197a4(brgyad stong): 'byor phan tshun bzhad gad byed cing yi ger 'dri na 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor phan tshun co 'dri zhing yi ger 'drin 'di yang bdud kyi las su
197a5(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o// rab 'byor mig g.yeng zhing yi ger 'dri na 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor yi ger 'dri ba dag phan tshun tshogs pa dang
197a6(brgyad stong): mi mthun par gyur na 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor bdag gis 'di'i gting mi rnyed ro mi myong ngo zhes stan las langs te 'gro na 'di yang
197a7(brgyad stong): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lung ma bstan to zhes sems ma dad pas stan las langs te song na

197b1(brgyad stong): kyang ma spros/ bdag gi pha ma'i ming dang rigs kyang 'dir ma smos/ bdag gang du skyes pa'i rigs kyang ma smos so snyam nas/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
197b2(brgyad stong): phyin pa mi nyan par sems shing de nas 'gro bar sems na sems bskyed pa de dag ji snyed kyis de dag ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar/ gang du de dag
197b3(brgyad stong): gis slar rnal 'byor nyid du bya bar 'gyur ba/ bskal pa de snyed du 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi/
197b4(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi nyan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la nges par
197b5(brgyad stong): 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can
197b6(brgyad stong): dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub par byed pa 'dis spangs shing bor nas mdo sde gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
197b7(brgyad stong): sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa de nyid de dag nyid de dag yongs su btsal bar sems par 'gyur te rab 'byor 'di yang de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o//
197b8(brgyad stong): 'byor yang ci ltar 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dag la slob par mi 'dod pa dang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dag la nges
198a1(brgyad stong): par 'byung bar mi 'dod pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mi slob ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ma bslabs pa
198a2(brgyad stong): 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dag la nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ltar blo chung ba de dag 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das
198a3(brgyad stong): ba'i chos rnams yang dag pa'i lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'i rtsa ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spangs shing bor nas yal ga la 'ju bar sems so//
198a4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ khyi ni jo bos thad nas zan gong bslang ba btang ste/ las byed pa'i mi las zan kham btsal bar sems pa de bzhin du rab 'byor/
198a5(brgyad stong): phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang la la dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rtsa ba 'di bor te nyan
198a6(brgyad stong): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yal ga dang lo ma dang 'dab ma lta bu las snying po sangs rgyas nyid btsal bar sems par 'gyur te rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
198a7(brgyad stong): de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo chung ba de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub par byed par
198a8(brgyad stong): mi shes te/ de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spangs shing bor nas de las gzhan pa'i mdo sde gang dag nyan thos kyi sa mngon par ston pa dang rang sangs
198b1(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi sa mngon par ston pa de dag la lhag par kun chub par bya bar sems par 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dge ni yal ga
198b2(brgyad stong): dang lo ma dang 'dab ma lta bu la zhugs pa yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci ltar ga
198b3(brgyad stong): zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can dag dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dag slob pa de ltar bslabs par mi bya'o// rab 'byor gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can
198b4(brgyad stong): dag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dag ci ltar slob ce na/ rab 'byor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gcig pu dul bar bya'o// bdag gcig pu
198b5(brgyad stong): zhi bar bya'o bdag gcig pu yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam ste/ bdag 'ba' zhig dul ba dang zhi ba dang yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir dge
198b6(brgyad stong): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa'i sbyor ba rtsom ste/ rab 'byor yang de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par mi bya'o//
198b7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni 'jig rten thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyang de bzhin nyid la gnas
198b8(brgyad stong): par bya sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid la dgod par bya ste sems can gyi khams gzhal du med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes
199a1(brgyad stong): de ltar bslab par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa'i sbyor ba
199a2(brgyad stong): de ltar brtsam par bya zhing des rlom sems su yang mi bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ glang po che ma mthong ba'i skyes bu la la zhig glang po che'i kha
199a3(brgyad stong): dog dang dbyibs tshol te/ des mun khung nas glang po che zhig rnyed nas snang ba ga la ba der brtags so// der rtags nas glang po che'i rjes btsal bar sems
199a4(brgyad stong): shing glang po che'i rjes las glang po che'i kha dog dang dbyibs gzung bar sems na rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ ci skyes bu de yang mkhas pa'i rang bzhin
199a5(brgyad stong): can yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du gang
199a6(brgyad stong): zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi shes shing mi 'dri bar de spangs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
199a7(brgyad stong): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ mdo sde gang dag nyan thos kyi sa mngon par ston pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon par ston pa
199a8(brgyad stong): de dag yongs su btsal bar sems pa de dag de lta bu'i tshul du rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
199b1(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu rin po che don du gnyer ba zhig rgya mtsho chen po mthong nas/ der rin po che dag la mi dpyod cing mi sems la mi 'jug par de rin po che'i
199b2(brgyad stong): rgyur ba lang gi rmig rjes kyi nang du tshol bar sems shing ba lang gi rmig rjes dang rgya mtsho chen po mtshungs par bya bar sems na/ rab 'byor 'di ci snyam du sems
199b3(brgyad stong): ci skyes bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
199b4(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed kyang ma rtogs shing mi shes pas
199b5(brgyad stong): 'dor bar byed de mdo sde gang dag nyan thos kyi sa mngon par ston pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon par ston pa de dag la brtson pa chung ngus gnas par 'dod pas
199b6(brgyad stong): btsal bar sems pa de dag ni de lta bu'i tshul du rig par bya'o// gang du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ma brjod par/ bdag gcig pu dul ba dang zhi bar gnas
199b7(brgyad stong): pa dang 'di ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba nyid do// zhes bya ba dang nang du yang dag gzhag pa dang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o lan cig
199b8(brgyad stong): phyir 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob par bya'o// rang byang chub thob par bya'o// tshe 'di nyid la len pa med
200a1(brgyad stong): par zag pa las sems yongs su grol bar byas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes brjod pa de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
200a2(brgyad stong): sa dang ldan pa zhes bya ste 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar sems bskyed par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems
200a3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing go cha chen po bgos pa yin te de dag gis nam du yang spro ba chung ngu la sems mi bskyed
200a4(brgyad stong): do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa de dag ni 'jig rten yongs su 'dren pa 'jig rten gyi don byed pa yin te/ de bas na de dag gis dus rtags tu
200a5(brgyad stong): rgyun mi 'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la legs par bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba
200a6(brgyad stong): yongs su ma smin pa blo chung ba lhag pa'i bsam pa zhan pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag mi shes shing khong du chud pas/ shes rab kyi
200a7(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin 'di spangs shing bor nas mdo sde gang dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon par ston pa de dag yongs su btsal bar sems te/ rag
200a8(brgyad stong): 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can 'di lta bu'i tshul can de dag gi 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
200b1(brgyad stong): mkhan nam shing mkhan gyi slob ma zhig rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshang du khang pa byed par 'dod pa dang sgrub par 'dod nas/ de nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang
200b2(brgyad stong): gi tshad dang dkyil 'khor yongs su tshol te/ de yongs su tshol bas nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang mthong ba dang / de de dag gi tshad gzung bar sems na/
200b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad kyi khang pa byed par 'dod pa dang sgrub par 'dod pas/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi
200b4(brgyad stong): tshad gzung bar bya ba yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
200b5(brgyad stong): de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can la la dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos shing shes rab
200b6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spangs shing rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btang nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang ldan pa'i
200b7(brgyad stong): mdo sde dag las thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su tshol bar sems te mdo sde gang dag bdag gcig pu dul bar bya'o bdag gcig pu zhi bar bya'o bdag gcig pu
200b8(brgyad stong): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes de ltar mngon par ston pa/ bdag 'ba' zhig dul ba dang zhi ba dang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba thob par byed
201a1(brgyad stong): pa de lta bu'i tshul gyi mdo sde dag yongs su tshol zhing de lta bur slob par sems na/ rab 'byor 'de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems
201a2(brgyad stong): dpa' de dag kyang mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya ba 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
201a3(brgyad stong): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di yang de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig 'khor los sgyur
201a4(brgyad stong): ba'i rgyal po lta 'dod par gyur la des 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong ste mthong nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang gzi brjed/
201a5(brgyad stong): dang rdzu 'phrul 'di 'dra'o zhes mtshan mar bzung nas des mkhar gyi rgyal po mthong nas/ des mkhar gyi rgyal po de'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang gzi brjid dang
201a6(brgyad stong): 'phrul dang mtshan ma bzung ste/ bye brag shes par mi nus pas 'di skad du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de ni kha dog dang dbyibs dang gzi brjid dang rdzu 'phrul dang
201a7(brgyad stong): mtshan ma 'di kho na 'dra'o zhes zer na/ rab 'byor de ci'i snyam du sems/ grang 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang mkhar gyi rgyal po dang mtshungs par bya bar sems
201a8(brgyad stong): pa'i skyes bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis

201b2(brgyad stong): pa 'di thos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
201b3(brgyad stong): pa 'di ring du byas nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems par 'gyur te/
201b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di yang de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi nga ldan pa'i mdo sde 'di dag las byang chub
201b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar bya'o zhes nga mi smra ste/ rab 'byor yang 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
201b6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa gang bshad pa de la ma slabs par byang chub sems
201b7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mdo sde gzhan dag tu byang
201b8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'grub pa ni dka' ba yin no// rab 'byor de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phan yon de
202a1(brgyad stong): dag yang dag par gzigs pas rnam grangs du mas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
202a2(brgyad stong): 'di yang dag par ston yang dag par 'god yang dag par gzengs bstod yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed yang dag par 'jog par byed de/ de ltar na byang chub
202a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor yang de ci snyam du sems/ gang
202a4(brgyad stong): dag phyir mi ldog pa'i theg pa chen po thob cing bsgrubs nas/ de lta bur bor te theg pa dman pa yongs su btsal bar sems na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag
202a5(brgyad stong): kyang mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
202a6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu bkres pa zhig gis kha zas ro brgya pa zhu na phan pa zhu na bde ba tshe'i mthar thug pa'i bar du bkres pa dang skom pa bzlog
202a7(brgyad stong): pa zhig rnyed la/ des de bor te zhag drug cu pa'i 'bras chen btsal bar sems shing zhag drug cu pa'i 'bras chen rnyed nas kha zas ro brgya pa bor te/ zhag
202a8(brgyad stong): drug cu pa'i 'bras chen de za bar sems na/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ ci skyes bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol
202b1(brgyad stong): ga bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i
202b2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btang
202b3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du byas nas nyan thos kyi theg pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde
202b4(brgyad stong): dag btsal bar sems shing / mdo sde gang dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon par ston pa de dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang thabs mkhas
202b5(brgyad stong): pa btsal bar sems na/ rab 'byor de ci'i snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya 'am/ rab

202b8(brgyad stong): chung zhing byin chung ba dang lhan cig mtshungs par bya bar sems na/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ ci skyes bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par
203a1(brgyad stong): bya 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
203a2(brgyad stong): 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
