238b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis kyang chos thams cad ni bsam gyis mi khyab mnyam pa med gzhal du med grangs med mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ rab 'byor de
238b6(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni sems dang bral ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab po// snyom pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir mnyam pa med do//
238b7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang mnyam pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par shes par gyur pa'i chos kyi tshig bla dgas so// gzhal du med pa dang
238b8(brgyad stong): bgrang du med pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba yang de bzhin te/ rab 'byor gzhal du med pa dang bgrang du med pa dang mi mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni/
239a1(brgyad stong): mnyam pa dang grangs dang tshad ma dang bral ba'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams gzhal du med pa dang 'grang du med pa dang
239a2(brgyad stong): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no// chos 'di dag ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang bgrang du med pa dang gzhol du med pa nyid kyis ni mi mnyam pa dang
239a3(brgyad stong): mnyam pa dang bgrang du med pa dang gzhal du med pa yin no// kye mchos 'di dag ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pas mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par mi 'jug pa
239a4(brgyad stong): yin te/ rab 'byor de bas na chos 'di dag ni mnyam pa med pa zhes brjod do// nam mkha' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir chos 'di dag bsam gyis mi
239a5(brgyad stong): khyab pa'o// namo mkha' mnyam pa med pa'i phyir chos 'di dag mnyam pa med pa'o// nam mkha' gzhal du med pa'i phyir chos 'di dgra gzhal du
239a6(brgyad stong): med pa'o// nam mkha' grangs med pa'i phyir chos 'di dag grangs med pa'o// nam mkha' mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir chos 'di dag ni mi
239a7(brgyad stong): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang mnyam pa med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang grangs med pa dang mi mnyam
239a8(brgyad stong): ba dang mnyam pa 'di dag bshad pa na yang / dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong mnyis stong yang len
239b1(brgyad stong): ba med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// dge bsnyen pa drug snong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul mid dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/
239b2(brgyad stong): dge bsnyen ma sum stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khris kyang mi skye ba'i
239b3(brgyad stong): chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de dag kyang bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
239b4(brgyad stong): tu lung bstan to// dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma gang dag chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa de dag kyang bcom ldan
239b5(brgyad stong): 'das kyis lung bstan te/ de dag kyang len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab
239b6(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab ste/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
239b7(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni bgyi ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
239b8(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab po// rab 'byor shes rab
240a1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
240a2(brgyad stong): dang ya dag par ldan no// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang yang dag par ldan no// 'di ni nyan thos kyi sa dang yang dag par ldan no// rab 'byor
240a3(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bos nas dbang bskur ba yul gyi mi la mthu dang brtson 'grus thob pa'i rgyal po'i bya ba gang zhig yin pa dang
240a4(brgyad stong): grong khyer gyi bya ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni blon po dang 'brel bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir rgyal po ni brtson pa chung zhing khur bor bar 'gyur ro//
240a5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de bzhin du gang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam nyan thos kyi chos kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol
240a6(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa dang yang dag par ldan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid de la bya ba byed do// rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis ni shes rab kyi pha rol
240a7(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas so// gzugs la yongs su mi 'dzin cing mngon par ma zhen par bya ba'i phyir dang de bzhin du tshor ba
240a8(brgyad stong): dang 'du shes dang 'dra byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la yongs su mi 'dzin cing mngon par ma zhen par bya ba'i phyir dang // rgyun du zhugs pa'i
240b1(brgyad stong): 'bras bu la yongs su mi 'dzin cing mngon par ma zhen par bya ba'i phyir dang de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
240b2(brgyad stong): dang dgra bcom pa la yongs su mi 'dzin cing mngon par ma zhen par bya ba'i phyir dang / rang byang chub la yongs su mi 'dzin cing mngon par ma zhen par bya ba'i phyir
240b3(brgyad stong): dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su mi 'dzin cing mngon par ma zhen par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar gnas so// rab 'byor
240b4(brgyad stong): gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su mi 'dzin cing mngon par ma zhen par bgyi ba'i slad du shes rab kyi
240b5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar gnas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la yongs su 'dzin pa 'am
240b6(brgyad stong): mngon par zhen par byed pa dgra bcom pa nyid ci khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags
240b7(brgyad stong): te/ bcom ldan 'das gang la yongs su 'dzin pa 'am mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba dgra bcom pa nyid kyi chos de lta bu ni bdag gis yang dag par rjes
240b8(brgyad stong): su ma mthong ngo / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor ngas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
241a1(brgyad stong): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rab 'byor ngas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
241a2(brgyad stong): bas yongs su 'dzin par mi byed mngon par zhen par mi byed do// rab 'byor de lta bas nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang yongs su 'dzin pa med
241a3(brgyad stong): cing mngon par zhen pa med do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i byang
241a4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang yongs su mi 'dzin cing mngon par zhen pa med do/
241a5(brgyad stong): zhes bgyi ba'i bstan pa 'di thos na/ dngang zhing kun tu skrag la kun tun skrag pa dang ldan par 'gyur du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang
241a6(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rgyu phun sum tshogs pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa dang yun ring po nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun
241a7(brgyad stong): bar gyur pa de dag gis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na mos par 'gyur ro// bcom 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang
241a8(brgyad stong): 'byor de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
241b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ni zab cing blta dka' ba rtogs par dka' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag shesar gyi pha
241b2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mos par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa yun ring por dge ba'i rtsa ba
241b3(brgyad stong): bskrun pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad
241b4(brgyad stong): kyis dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sa la bskal pa 'am bskal pa bas lhag par spyad pa dang / gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la nyi ma gcig
241b5(brgyad stong): tsam yang bzod cing sred de tshol ba dang sems pa dang 'jal ba dang nye bar rtogs pa dang / nye bar sems par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid de dag
241b6(brgyad stong): pas mchog tu 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de rnams la bka'
241b7(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan na lha'i bu dag des ni ches myur
241b8(brgyad stong): mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du re bar bya ste/ dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i sa la bskal pa 'am bskal pa bas lhag par spyod pa de dag gis ni ma yin no//
242a1(brgyad stong): de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
242a2(brgyad stong): to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
242a3(brgyad stong): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drang nas mchi'o zhes gsol te dong ngo //
242a4(brgyad stong): de dag ha cang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams su ma gnas par gyur gzugs na spyod
242a5(brgyad stong): pa'i lha'i bu rnams ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gnas par gyur to// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha
242a6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
242a7(brgyad stong): la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thos pa
242a8(brgyad stong): dang lhan cig kho nar shes rab kyi rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa thos la mos shing mi 'gong kun tu mi zham rnam par mi gnas mi rmongs
242b1(brgyad stong): the tshom mi za som nyi mi za bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par dga' na bcom ldan 'das de gang nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur
242b2(brgyad stong): ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang thos pa dang lhan cig kho nar shes
242b3(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa thos la mos shing mi 'gong kun tu mi zhum rnam par mi gnas mi rmongs the tshom mi za som nyi mi za bar blta
242b4(brgyad stong): ba dang mnyan pa la mngon pa dga' bar 'gyur zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing sgom par 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
242b5(brgyad stong): ba dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa mi spong zhing yid phyir phyogs par mi byed bzung ba dang bcang ba dang klag pa dang kun chub par bya ba dang rab tu gdon pa'i phyir
242b6(brgyad stong): 'dun pa skyed par 'gyur rjes su 'brang zhing phyi bzhin 'gro bar 'gyur chos smra ba mi gtong bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na ba be'u gzhon nu yod pa
242b7(brgyad stong): be'u mi gotang ba de bzhin du rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba zab mo 'di thos nas/ ci srid du
242b8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lus la thogs pa 'am glegs bam du chud par ma gyur pa de srid du chos smra ba mo gtong bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems
243a1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rab 'byor mi dag gi nang nas shi 'phos nas mir skyes pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol
243a2(brgyad stong): pa/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos nas 'dir
243a3(brgyad stong): skyes par gyur pa mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan
243a4(brgyad stong): 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur byas shing yongs su zhus yongs su dris la yongs su dri ba byas te sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan de dag nas shi 'phos nas
243a5(brgyad stong): 'dir skyes pa yang yod de de yang yon tan 'di dag nyid dang ldan par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
243a6(brgyad stong): chen po dga' ldan gyi lha dag gi nang nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de yang yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan par rig par bya ste/ gang gis byang chub sems
243a7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bsnyen bkur byas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las brtsams te/ yongs su zhus shing yongs su dris
243a8(brgyad stong): la yongs su dri ba byas pa de yang yon tan 'di dag dang ldan par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis rlab kyi pha rol
243b1(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas sngon gyi mthar yongs su ma zhus shing yongs su ma dris yongs su dri 'am byas pa de ni mi nyid kyi nang du skyes na yang shes rab
243b2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la nem nur du 'gyur rmongs par 'gyur sems zhum par 'gyur te// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de ni
243b3(brgyad stong): sngon gyi mthar yang yongs su mi dri ba'i rang bzhin du gyur par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na// 'di ltar de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
243b4(brgyad stong): bshad pa la nem nur du gyur rmongs par gyur sems zhum pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sngon gyi mtha
243b5(brgyad stong): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid nyi ma gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi'am lnga tsam du thos par 'gyur te/
243b6(brgyad stong): bsnyen bkur byas nas yongs su zhus shing yongs su dris la yongs su dri ba byas pa de ni dus re shig dad pa yin te/ slar yang stor bar 'gyur
243b7(brgyad stong): zhing yongs su dri bas 'phrogs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar yin te gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
243b8(brgyad stong): zab mo 'di sngon yongs su ma zhus yang dag par yongs su ma dris yang dag par yongs su dri ba ma byas shing rjes su ma 'brangs mi par gyur pa de ni/
244a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mnyan par bya ba'i phyir res 'ga' ni 'dun pas rjes su 'brang bar
244a2(brgyad stong): 'gyur res 'ga' ni 'dun par mi 'gyur ba de phyir zhing g.yengs pa dang zhum par 'gyur de'i blo rgod par 'gyur zhing ras bil gyi 'dab ma bzhin du
244a3(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni theg pa la yang dag par zhugs nas ring po ma lon zhing theg pa la gsar du zhugs te/ 'ongs par rig par
244a4(brgyad stong): bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de ni dad pa de dang dang ba de dang 'dun pa de rab tu gtong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
244a5(brgyad stong): mi 'di rjes su 'dzin par mi 'gyur rjes su 'jug par mi 'gyur rjes su sten par mi 'gyur bas de nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am de sa
244a6(brgyad stong): gnyis las gang yang rung ba'i sa gcig tu re bar bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa'i glu chag pa na gang dag der shing
244a7(brgyad stong): ngam spang leb la mi 'dzin tam shi ba'i ro la mi 'dzun rab 'byor de ni chu'i pha rol gyi 'gram du ma phyin par chu'i nang du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro zhes
244a8(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o// rab 'byor yang gang dag rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa'i gru chags pa na der shing ngam spang leb dam shi ba'i ro la 'jug na rab 'byor
244b1(brgyad stong): de ni chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur zhing bde bar pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par 'gyur te/ ma smas ma snad par skams la gnas par 'gyur ro zhes
244b2(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dad pa tsam dang dga' ba tsam dang 'dun pa tsam dang ldan yang des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
244b3(brgyad stong): pa la ma brten na rab 'byor de ni lam gyi bar ma dor rnam par 'jig par 'gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par nyan thos nyid dam rang sangs rgyas
244b4(brgyad stong): nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag
244b5(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dad pa yod pa dang bzod yod pa dang 'dun pa yod pa dang brtson 'grus yod pa dang ngag byed
244b6(brgyad stong): pa yod pa dang mos pa yod pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yod pa dang gtong ba yod pa dang gus par byed pa yod pa dang dga' yod pa dang mgu ba
244b7(brgyad stong): yod pa dang dang ba yod pa dang / rab tu dga' ba yod pa dang brtson pa mi gtong ba yod pa de dag gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten par
244b8(brgyad stong): byed na/ de ltar na de dag gi dad pa de dang bzod pa de dang sred pa de dang 'dun pa de dang brtson 'grus de dang bag byed pa de dang mos pa de dang lhag pa'i
245a1(brgyad stong): bsam pa de dang gtong ba de dang gus par byed pa de dang dga' ba de dang mgu ba de dang dang de dang rab tu dga' ba de dang brtson pa mi
245a2(brgyad stong): gtong ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na bud med dam skyes
245a3(brgyad stong): pa yang rung bum pa so ma btang bas chu 'chu na rab 'byor de'i bum pa de ni yun ring por mi thung ste de ni myur ba nyid du chag cing zhing par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//
245a4(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bum pa so ma btang ba'i phyir de ni mthar sa nyid du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la
245a5(brgyad stong): la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar dad pa yod pa dang bzod pa yod pa dang sred pa yod pa dang 'dun
245a6(brgyad stong): pa yod pa dang brtson 'grus yod pa dang bag byed pa yod pa dang mos pa yod pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa yod pa dang gtong ba yod pa dang gus par byed pa
245a7(brgyad stong): yod pa dang dga' ba yod pa dang rab tu dga' ba yod pa dang / dang ba yod pa dang / yid dga' ba yod pa dang brtson pa mi
245a8(brgyad stong): gtong ba yod du zin kyang de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bar gyur na rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de ni
245b1(brgyad stong): lam gyi bar ma dor rnam par 'jig par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi bar ma dor rnam par 'jig pa gang
245b2(brgyad stong): zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na bud med dam skyes pa yang rung ste bum pa legs par so
245b3(brgyad stong): btang bas 'bab chu 'am rdzing bu 'am lteng ka 'am mtsho 'am khron pa 'am de ma yin pa'i chu'i bzhi gzhan las chu bcus te/ des chu de khyer na rab
245b4(brgyad stong): 'byor bum pa des ni bde bar khyim du phyin par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar bum pa so legs par btang ba'i phyir ro//
245b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
245b6(brgyad stong): dad pa yod bzod pa yod sred pa yod 'dun pa yod brtson 'grus yod bag byed pa yod mos pa yod lhag pa'i bsam pa yod gtong ba yod gus par
245b7(brgyad stong): byed pa yod dga' ba yod rab tu dag pa yod dang ba yod yid dga' ba yod/ brtson pa mi gtong ba yang yod la/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
245b8(brgyad stong): dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung bar gyur na rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lam gyi bar ma dor rnam par 'jig par
246a1(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur te/ ma smas ma sdud par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// /
246a2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu bzhi pa// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin
246a3(brgyad stong): can zhig rgya mtsho'i gru mag tshags ma byas shing ma bcos pa bcing ba bcings nas ring du lon pa zhig chu'i nang du drangs nas der rdzas bskyas te gang
246a4(brgyad stong): zhing khal gyis non pa'i nang du zhugs par gyur na/ rab 'byor gru de ni 'di lta ste 'di lta bur 'jig pa'i chos can du 'gyur te chu'i pha rol tu ma rgal
246a5(brgyad stong): bar de'i rdzas kyang gzhan du 'gyur la gru de yang gzhan du 'gro bar rig par bya ste/ de ltar ded dpon thabs mi mkhas pa 'chal pa'i shes rab
246a6(brgyad stong): can de nor chen po dang bral ba dang phrad par 'gyur te rin po che'i 'byung gnas chen po las yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
246a7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dad pa yod bzod pa yod sred pa yod 'dun pa
246a8(brgyad stong): yod brtson 'grus yod bag byed pa yod mos pa yod lhag pa'i bsam pa yod gtong pa yod gus par byed pa yod dga' ba yod mag ba yod dad pa yod/
246b1(brgyad stong): rab tu dga' ba yod brtson pa mi gtong ba yod kyang / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing thabs mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur na/ rab
246b2(brgyad stong): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas ma thob pa nyid du bar ma dor chud zos shing yi gsod par 'gyur te/ rang gi don
246b3(brgyad stong): chen po las yongs su nyams par 'gyur zhing gzhan gyi don chen po'i rin po che'i phung po las yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i
246b4(brgyad stong): don chen po'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas las yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor ya byang chub sems dpa'i bar ma dor chud za ba gang
246b5(brgyad stong): zhe na/ 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na ded dpon mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i
246b6(brgyad stong): gru bcing ba legs par bcings mig tshags bya ba legs par byas nas bcom par bya ba legs par bcos te chu'i nang du drangs nas rdzas bskyas te gang
246b7(brgyad stong): bar byas nas legs par bshams shing mthun pa'i rlung dang sbyar te gang du 'gro bar 'dod pa'i phyogs su mthar gyis song no/ rab 'byor gru do ni chu'i 'jig
246b8(brgyad stong): par mi 'gyur gyi gru de ni gang du 'gro bar bya ba'i phyogs der phyin par 'gyur zhing ded dpon de yang rnyed pa chen po 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi rin po che dag dang ldan par
247a1(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro zhes rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
247a2(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dad pa yod bzod pa yod sred pa yod 'dun pa yod brtson 'grus yod bag byed pa yod mos pa yod lha pi'i
247a3(brgyad stong): bsam pa yod gtong ba yod gus par byed pa yod dga' ba yod mgu ba yod dang ba yod rab tu dga' ba yod/ brtson pa mi gtong ba yang yod la/ de shas
247a4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung shing thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bar gyur na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma
247a5(brgyad stong): dor chud zos par mi 'gyur yid gsod par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
247a6(brgyad stong): gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar yin te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang
247a7(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dad pa yod bzod pa yod sred pa yod 'dun pa yod brtson 'grus yod bag byed pa yod mos
247a8(brgyad stong): pa yod lhag pa'i bsam pa yod gtong ba yod gus par byed pa yod dga' ba yod mgu ba yod dang ba yod rab tu dga' ba yod brtson pa mi gtong ba yang
247b1(brgyad stong): yod la/ de'i chos 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung shing thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral na de ni gang gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
247b2(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba'i chos mngon du byed cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur ba ma gtog
247b3(brgyad stong): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi sgrub po// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu 'ga' zhig skyes nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa zhig
247b4(brgyad stong): rgan po rgas shing 'khogs par gyur la de'i lus la rlung las gyur pa 'am mkhris pas las gyur pa 'am/ bad kan las gyur pa 'am 'dus pa
247b5(brgyad stong): las gyur pa'i nad 'ga' zhig gis btab na rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems skyes bu de yang ma brtan par khri las ldang bar nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis
247b6(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te skyes bu de khri las ldang nus
247b7(brgyad stong): par gyur kyang de rgas pa de dang nad des bcom pas rgyang grags gcig srid dam rgyang grags gnyis srid du 'gro ba'i stobs med do// gal te skyes bu
247b8(brgyad stong): de khri las ldang nas kyang 'gro bar bya bar stobs med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang
248a1(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dad pa yod pa dang bzod pa yod pa dang sred pa yod pa dang 'dun
248a2(brgyad stong): pa yod pa dang brtson 'grus yod pa dang bag byed pa yod pa dang mos pa yod pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa yod pa dang gtong ba yod pa dang gus par byed pa
248a3(brgyad stong): yod pa dang dga' ba yod pa dang mgu ba yod pa dang dang ba yod pa dang rab tu dga' ba yod pa dang brtson pa mi gtong ba yod par gyur kyang / de shes rab kyi
248a4(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing thangs mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur pas la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
248a5(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la yang dag par zhugs su zin kyang rab 'byor yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni bar ma dor chud zos shing yi
248a6(brgyad stong): gsod par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
248a7(brgyad stong): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu skyes nas
248a8(brgyad stong): lo rgya nyi shu lon par gyur pa rgan po rgas shing 'khogs pa de nyid kyi lus la rlung las gyur pa 'am mkhris pa las gyur pa'am bad kan los gyur pa 'am
248b1(brgyad stong): 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad 'ga' zhig gis btab ste de'i g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyogs gnyis nas skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis legs par brten
248b2(brgyad stong): zhing 'jur bcug cing legs par bzung nas de la 'di skad du kye skyes bu khyod gang du 'gro bar bya ba'i gnas der khyod kyis ma phyin gyis bar du khyod bdag cag
248b3(brgyad stong): gnyis kyis brtan pas lam du bar ma dor brdeg 'chos pa'i 'jigs par mi 'gyur gyis/ khyod gang du 'gro 'dod pa der song zhig ces bsgo na khri de
248b4(brgyad stong): las ldang nus par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
248b5(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la dad pa yod pa dang bzod pa yod pa dang sred pa yod pa dang 'dun pa yod pa dang brtson 'grus yod pa dang /
248b6(brgyad stong): bag byed pa yod pa dang / mos pa yod pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa yod pa dang gtong ba yod pa dang gus par byed pa yod pa dang dga' ba yod pa dang mgu ba
248b7(brgyad stong): yod pa dang / dang ba yod pa dang rab tu dga' ba yod pa dang brtson pa mi gtong ba yod par gyur la/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung zhing
248b8(brgyad stong): thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bar gyur na/ rab 'byor 'byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor chud zos par mi 'gyur yi gsod par

249a2(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub kyi gnas rjes su thob nus par rig par bya'o// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las dpe'i
249a3(brgyad stong): le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan

249a6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po las dang po pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'dod pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la bsnyen par bya bsten par bya bsnyen bkur

249b1(brgyad stong): kyi bu khyod tshur shog sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du gyis shig de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
249b2(brgyad stong): pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du gyis shig/ rigs kyi
249b3(brgyad stong): bu khyod sbyin pa gang dang gang nyid byin pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
249b4(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gzugs gsum snyems shig/ de bzhin du tshor bar ma yin 'du shes su ma yin 'du byed rnams sum
249b5(brgyad stong): yin rigs kyi bu khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam shes par mi snyems shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu thams
249b6(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi snyems pa'o// de bzhin du khyod tshul khrims gang dang gang nyid srung ba dang / de bzhin du sbyar te rigs kyi bu khyod
249b7(brgyad stong): bzod pa gang dang gang nyid sgrub pa dang rigs kyi bu khyed brtson 'grus gang dang gang nyid rtsom pa dang rigs kyi bu khyod bsam gtan gang dang gang

250a3(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub la rnam par shes par ma snyems shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi snyems pa'o// rigs kyi

250a8(brgyad stong): lta bu'i ngo bo'i brtson 'grus dang de lta bu'i ngo bo'i bsam gtan dang / de lta bu'i ngo bo'i shes rab la brten nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la
250b1(brgyad stong): rang dbang du gyur pa lags kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mi 'tshal gyi/ 'on kyang sems cad kyi khams shin tu sdug bsngal ba mthong nas bla na
250b2(brgyad stong): med pa med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal te/ 'khor bar skrag par mi bgyid pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa

252b7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid ma lags sam/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/

253a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na 'bab chu 'am rgya mtsho dag gi nang na phyogs gang chus yongs su bskor bar gyur pa ni gling zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i
253a8(brgyad stong): mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// de bzhin rlo ba dang 'du shes dang 'ad byed rnams dang rab 'byor de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ra'i mtha' yongs su chad pa ste/ rab 'byor yongs su

253b2(brgyad stong): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o// 'di ni ci lta ba bzhin no// 'di ni phyin ci ma log pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med yang dag par

253b4(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi snang bar 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
253b5(brgyad stong): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas dus ring por ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dang ling tog gis yongs su khebs pa'i sems can mun pas zil gyis non pa rnams shes rab kyis snang bar
253b6(brgyad stong): byed cing mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag thams cad sel bar byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa
253b7(brgyad stong): rdzogs par sang rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
253b8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren par 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
254a1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas nas gzugs rang bzhin gyis skye ba med dang 'gag pa med par chos ston to// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes
254a2(brgyad stong): pa rang bzhin gyis skye ba med dang 'gag pa med par sa ston to// so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par chos ston to// nyen thos kyi chos rnams kyang rwa
254a3(brgyad stong): bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med chos ston to// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par chos ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i chos
254a4(brgyad stong): rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par chos ston to// chos thams
254a5(brgyad stong): cad kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba med dang 'gag pa med par chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
254a6(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ro// rab 'byer ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
254a7(brgyad stong): ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi rten du 'gyur zhe na// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
254a8(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten la gzugs ni nam mkha'i rten can no zhes chos ston par 'gyur/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams
254b1(brgyad stong): dang rnam par shes pa yang nam mkha'i rten can no zhes chos ston par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang nam ga ba'i rten can 'gro ba med pa/ 'ong ba med pa nam
254b2(brgyad stong): mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/ ci ltar nam mkha' 'ong ba med pa 'gro ba med pa ma byas pa rnam par mi 'gyur ba mngon par 'dus ma byas pa mi gnas pa yang dag par mi gnas pa rnam par mi
254b3(brgyad stong): gnas pa ma skyes pa ma 'gag pa de bzhin du rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang 'ong ba med pa 'gro ba med pa ma byas pa rnam par mi 'gyur ba mngon par 'dus ma byas pa mi gnas pa yang dag
254b4(brgyad stong): par mi gnas pa rnam par mi gnas ma skyes pa ma 'gag pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin
254b5(brgyad stong): pa de ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de rab
254b6(brgyad stong): 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi rten can te de dag rten de las mi
254b7(brgyad stong): 'da' 'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i rten te de dag rten de las mi 'da' 'a rab 'byor chos thams cad smon pa med pa'i rteg can te de dag rten de las mi
254b8(brgyad stong): 'da' ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i rten can te de dag rten de las mi 'da'a'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'byung ba med pa'i rten can te de
255a1(brgyad stong): dag rten de las mi 'da'a'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa'i rten can te de dag rten de las mi 'da' 'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dngos
255a2(brgyad stong): po med rten can te de dag rten de las mi 'da' 'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rmi lam gyi rten can te de dag rten de las mi 'da' 'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag gi rten
255a3(brgyad stong): can te de dag rten de las mi 'da' 'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mu med pa'i rten can te de dag rten de las mi 'da' 'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni zhi ba'i rten can te de dag
255a4(brgyad stong): rten de las mi 'da' 'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i rten can te de dag rten de las mi 'da' 'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dbyung du med pa'i rten can
255a5(brgyad stong): te de dag rten de las mi 'da' 'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa'i rten can te de dag rten de las mi 'da' 'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'gro ba med pa'i rten
255a6(brgyad stong): can te de dag rten de las mi 'da' 'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi g.yo ba'i rten can te de dag rten de las mi 'da' 'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi rten can
255a7(brgyad stong): te de dag rten de las mi 'da' 'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i rten can te de dag rten de las mi 'da'o//
255a8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas nyid dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da' 'o
255b1(brgyad stong): de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i rten rlo
255b2(brgyad stong): zhes chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
255b3(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi rten du 'gyur ba yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di su dag gi 'tshal bar 'gyur//
255b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
255b5(brgyad stong): rgyas rnams kyi drung du sprad par gyur pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa gang yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dog gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
255b6(brgyad stong): 'di shes par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
255b7(brgyad stong): byin pa zab mo 'di 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag gi ngo bo nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
255b8(brgyad stong): po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di shes par 'gyur ba de dag ni 'dul ba las byung ba dben pa'i rang bzhin can no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
256a1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ci de lta bu'i rten can kho nar 'gyur ba dang rten de dag nyid mngon par rdzogs par
256a2(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas nas sems can dag la yang dag 'di nyid stong par 'gyur zhing de dag de ltar sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ba lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
256a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
256a4(brgyad stong): po de dag ni 'di lta bu'i rten can du 'gyur ba de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can dag la rten 'di dag ston par 'gyur zhing / de dag de ltar sems can
256a5(brgyad stong): rnams kyi rten du 'gyur te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems
256a6(brgyad stong): can gzhal tu med pa grangs med pa dag gi rten du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gzhal du ma mchis pa de dag yongs su mya ngan
256a7(brgyad stong): las bzla'o zhes go cha 'di bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na bka' bgyid pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
256a8(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin de/ sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o
256b1(brgyad stong): zhes gang gis cha 'di bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bka' ba byed pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/
256b2(brgyad stong): go cha chen po bgos pa'i go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa yang ma yin gzugs kyi don du 'brel pa yang ma yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par
256b3(brgyad stong): se pa dang 'brel pa yang ma yin par shes pa'i dri 'brel pa yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi sa dang 'brel pa yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi sa'i don du 'brel pa yang ma yin/ rang sangs
256b4(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi sa dang 'brel pa yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du 'brel pa yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi sa dang 'brel pa yang yin sangs rgyas kyi sa dang 'brel pa yang ma
256b5(brgyad stong): yin sangs rgyas sa'i don du 'brel pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha 'di ni chos thams cad nang ma
256b6(brgyad stong): 'brel ba'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang
256b7(brgyad stong): mo la de ltar spyod pa des gnas gsum la re bar mi bgyi ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nyan thos kyis sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am sangs rgyas sgra'o// de skad
256b8(brgyad stong): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyi 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor khyod don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na 'di skad du 'di
257a1(brgyad stong): ltang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la de ltar spyod pa des gnas gnas sa su
257a2(brgyad stong): la re bar mi bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas sa 'am sangs rgyas kyi sa'o zhes zer rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
257a3(brgyad stong): chen po go cha chen po bgos pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la de ltar spyod pa de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la re ba 'di ni gnas med cing ga
257a4(brgyad stong): skabs med do// 'on kyang gang gis sems can thams cad ni don du go cha chen po bgos pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sa nyid la re bar bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol
257a5(brgyad stong): pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab ste/ de ni sus kyang sgom par bgyi ba ma lags de ni gang gis kyang bsgoms par ma gyur gang gis kyang sgom par mi
257a6(brgyad stong): byed gang gis kyang bsgom par mi 'gyur bsgom par mi bgyi ba yang cung zad ma mchis gang du bsgom par bgyi ba yang mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes
257a7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos gang yang yongs su grub pa mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' sgom pa
257a8(brgyad stong): lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni chos thams cad ri sgom lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu
257b1(brgyad stong): byin pa sgom pa 'di ni ma chags pa sgom pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa sgom pa lags so// bcom ldan
257b2(brgyad stong): 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni dngos po ma mchis pa sgom pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'i
257b3(brgyad stong): ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa sgom pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
257b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor de lta bas na shes rab 'pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gnas pas gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
257b5(brgyad stong): po ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
257b6(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par chags par mi byed pa dang 'di ltar gzhan gyis smras pa dang gzhan gyis bgros pa dag la mngon par chags par mi byed pa dang /
257b7(brgyad stong): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol gyis dad pa'i phyir mi 'breng ba dang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
257b8(brgyad stong): ba zab mo 'di la bshad pa la mi 'gong kun mi zhum mi dngang kun du mi skrag kun du skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur/ nem nur mi byed the tsom mi za rmongs par mi
258a1(brgyad stong): 'gyur zhing rtogs par byed mos par byed de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba dang thos par dga' bas na rab 'byor 'di sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab
258a2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dris par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la mi dngang kun tu mi
258a3(brgyad stong): skrag kun du skrag pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
258a4(brgyad stong): bi 'di bshad pa la mi dngang kun du mi skrag kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gis nges shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed brag tu brtags pa
258a5(brgyad stong): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i rgyud kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
258a6(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa bye brag tu brtags pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i rgyud bye brag tu brtags pa lags
258a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i rgyud dang rab 'byor nam mkha' la 'bab pa dang rab 'byor nam mkha' la phyogs pa'i rgyud kyi
258a8(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i rgyud bye brag tu brtags pa yin no// rab 'byor yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i rgyud kyis bye brag tu brtags pa
258b1(brgyad stong): gang yin pa de ri bye brag tu brtags pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyed pa nyid ni gzhal du med pa'o/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/
258b2(brgyad stong): tshad ma med pa'o// rab 'byor gzhal du med pa dang tshad ma med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin tsher ba ma yin 'du shes ma yin 'du byed rnams ma yin rnam par shes pa
258b3(brgyad stong): ma yin/ thob pa ma yin mngon par rtogs pa ma yin khong du chud pa ma yin lam ma yin lam gyi 'bras bu ma yin ye shes ma yin rnam par shes pa ma yin skye ba ma yin
258b4(brgyad stong): 'jig pa ma yin 'byung ba ma yin/ 'grib pa ma yin 'gag pa ma yin sgom pa ma yin rnam par sgom pa ma yin te/ sus kyang ma byas gang nas kyang ma 'ongs gang du yang mi 'gro
258b5(brgyad stong): gang du yang mi gnas phyogs gang du yang mi gnas te/ gzhan du na gzhal du med pa tshad med pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i grangs su 'gro'o// nam mkha' gzhal du med pa'i
258b6(brgyad stong): phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzhal du med pa ste/ gzhal du med gang yin pa de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te gzugs kyis ma yin/
258b7(brgyad stong): tshor bas ma yin 'du shes kyis ma yin 'du byed rnams kyis ma yin rnam par shes pas ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma
258b8(brgyad stong): yin bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
259a1(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de bzhin du
259a2(brgyad stong): tshor ba nyid dang 'du shes nyid dang 'du byed nyid rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid ni
259a3(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen nyid do// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang /
259a4(brgyad stong): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'dod pa na
259a5(brgyad stong): sprod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pa dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang gzugs na sprod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags
259a6(brgyad stong): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de// phyogs gcig
259a7(brgyad stong): tu 'khod pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pa dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams
259a8(brgyad stong): dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa'o bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
259b1(brgyad stong): ni gting dpag bka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lta bar dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ni rtogs
259b2(brgyad stong): par dka' ste/ don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs bI
259b3(brgyad stong): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa na/ brtson pa chung ba la thugs gzhol bar mdzad de chos bstan pa la gzhol bar
259b4(brgyad stong): ma mdzad do// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang mi mjed kyi
259b5(brgyad stong): bdag po tshangs pa dang gzugs na smod pa'i lha'i rnams 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu dag de de bzhin te de de bzhin no// lha'i ngag kye ma shes
259b6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab po'o// lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dri ni gting dpag bka' ba'o// lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/
259b7(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni blta bar bka' ba'o// lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rtogs par dka' ste/ don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs
259b8(brgyad stong): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag tu byang chub kyi snying por bzhugs pa na kye ma chos zab mo 'di ngas mngon
260a1(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so snyam pas brtson pa chung ba la thugs gzhol bar mdzad de chos bstan pa la gzhol bar ma mdzad do// /
260a2(brgyad stong): gang du sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas su yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya par mi 'gyur su yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'di ni chos kyi
260a3(brgyad stong): zab pa yin no// nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir 'di zab bo// bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// chos thams cad 'ong ba med pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po//
260a4(brgyad stong): chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos 'di zab pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal dang bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams
260a5(brgyad stong): kyi dbang po brgya byin dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i dag dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
260a6(brgyad stong): ngo mtshar to bde bar gshegs pa rmad du 'byung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun par bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad
260a7(brgyad stong): mi bzung ba'i slad du chos 'di bstan pa lags na 'jig rten dag ni 'dzin pa la spyod do// / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las lha'i
260a8(brgyad stong): le'u zhes bya ste/ bco lnga pa'o// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyang stong pa/ bam po bco lnga pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
260b1(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kye mchos bstan pa 'di ni chos thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di
260b2(brgyad stong): ni gang la yang thogs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kye ma nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas gnas thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du chos 'di ni thogs pa
260b3(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kye ma gnyis su ma mchis pa'i slad du chos 'di ni mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyi
260b4(brgyad stong): pa rgol ba ma mchis pa'i slad du chos 'di ni do zla ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kye ma mngon pa grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du chos 'di ni gnas
260b5(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi sa skye ba thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa'i chos 'di ni 'byung ba ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kye ma lam thams
260b6(brgyad stong): cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du chos 'di ni lam ma mchis pa'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang 'dod pa na spyod pa dang
260b7(brgyad stong): gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'phags pa gnas brtan
260b8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di ni rjes su mthun par skyes pa lags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni 'di ltar chos gang gang kho nar ston pa
261a1(brgyad stong): chos de dang de nyid stong pa nyid las brtsams te/ ston pa'i slad du'o de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
261a2(brgyad stong): dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na smod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag gang 'di skad du gnas
261a3(brgyad stong): brtan rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su mthun par skyes so zhes smras pa ni ma skyes pa'i phyir gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su
261a4(brgyad stong): mthun par skyes te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba'o// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'ong ba
261a5(brgyad stong): yang med song ba myed de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid 'ong ba yang med song ba yang med de/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs
261a6(brgyad stong): pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba'o// gnas brtan rab 'byor ni dang po nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rjes su song ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
261a7(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// chos thams cad kyi bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de
261a8(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid do//
261b1(brgyad stong): gnas btan rab 'byor ni de bzhin nyid de'i rjes su song ba ste/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid pa yin te/
261b2(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid de'i rjes su song ba'o// de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gnas
261b3(brgyad stong): pa'i gang yin pa'i gnas pa de na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs rjes su skyes pa'o// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med pa dang
261b4(brgyad stong): rnam par 'gyur ba med dang rtog pa med pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med pa dang rnam par 'gyur ba
261b5(brgyad stong): med pa dang rtog pa med pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa'o// de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor yang de bzhin nyid des 'gyur ba med pa rnam par 'gyur med pa rtog pa med pa
261b6(brgyad stong): rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med rnam par 'gyur med rtog pa med rnam par rtog
261b7(brgyad stong): pa med de gang la yang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med rnam par 'gyur ba med rtog pa med rnam par rtog med de gang la yang thogs pa med do// /
261b8(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di ni gcig ste gnyis su med de gnyisu
262a1(brgyad stong): byar med do// gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gang du yang bzhin nyid ma yin gang las kyang de bzhin nyid ma yin gang gi yang de
262a2(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid ma yin te/ gang gi phyir de ni gang gi yang de bzhin nyid ma yin den de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med pa se gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gnyis su byar byed do//
262a3(brgyad stong): de ltar na gnas brtan 'byor ni ma byas pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes te/ ma byas pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni nam yang de bzhin
262a4(brgyad stong): nyid pa yin par mi 'gyur ro// gang gi phyir de nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni
262a5(brgyad stong): gnyis su byar med do// de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshesas pa'i rjes su skyes so// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid rnam pa thams
262a6(brgyad stong): cad du chos thams cad la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad du chos thams cad la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ de bzhin
262a7(brgyad stong): du de ba zhig gshegs pa dang rab 'byor ni de bzhin nyid kyis mngon par sprul ste/ 'di nyid ka yang bskal pa ma yin zhing tha mi dad pa ste/ tha dad par byed pa mi dmi
262a8(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir ro// de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni chos thams cad
262b1(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid las gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du rab 'byor kyi de bzhin nyid kyang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan ma yin la chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las
262b2(brgyad stong): gzhan ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni gang gi yang de bzhin nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin nyid de nyid ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin de la
262b3(brgyad stong): gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song bar khas blangs te/ 'dir 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig tu rjes su song bar khas blang ba ying med
262b4(brgyad stong): do// de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'das pa yang ma yin ma 'ongs pa
262b5(brgyad stong): ma yin da ltar byang ba ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin ma 'ongs pa ma yin da ltar byang ba ma yin te/ de ltar na gnas brtan
262b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de bzhin nyid de'i rjes su song bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang de bzhin nyid kyi
262b7(brgyad stong): rjes su song ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ngo // 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs
262b8(brgyad stong): pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rjes su song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ngo // ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin
263a1(brgyad stong): nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis da ltar byung
263a2(brgyad stong): ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ngo // da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de
263a3(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis rjes su song ngo // 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin
263a4(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rjes su song ste/ de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid dang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byang ba'i de bzhin dang de bzhin
263a5(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid 'di ni gnyis su
263a6(brgyad stong): med de gnyis su byar med do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid ni bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
263a7(brgyad stong): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
263a8(brgyad stong): par sangs rgyas par gyur pa na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ming 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni de bzhin nyid 'di yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di bstan pa
263b1(brgyad stong): de'i tshe na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba bzhin dus chen po 'di rnam par 'gyur ba drug
263b2(brgyad stong): dang ltas chen po bcwo brgyad du 'gul rab tu 'gul kun rab tu 'gul/ g.yos rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg
263b3(brgyad stong): 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ tshemache ma rab tu chem chem kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro//
263b4(brgyad stong): gzhan yang gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag la smras pa lha'i bu de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// gzhan
263b5(brgyad stong): yang gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes te tshor ba'i ma yin 'du shes kyi ma yin 'du byed rnams kyi ma yin rnam par shes pa'i rjes su ma
263b6(brgyad stong): skyes so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes te/ lan cig phyir 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu'i ma yin phyir mi 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin dgra bcom
263b7(brgyad stong): po'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes so// rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes sangs rgyas nyid kyi ma skyes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang gis
263b8(brgyad stong): rjes su skye ba dang gang rje su skye ba'i chos de dag ni yang dag par yod ma yin zhing nye bar mi dmigs so// de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes
264a1(brgyad stong): su skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
264a2(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste de bzhin nyid 'di ni spyod pa zab mo lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
264a3(brgyad stong): shI ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ sha ri'i bu 'di lta ste de bzhin nyid 'di ni spyod pa zab mo yin no// de bzhin nyid bstan pa 'di bshad pa na yang dge slong
264a4(brgyad stong): sum brgya len pa med pa zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma lnga brgya chos rnams la chos mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/
264a5(brgyad stong): lha'i bu lnga stong sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' drug cu len pa med par zag pa las sem
264a6(brgyad stong): rnam par grol lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' de rnams len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar shes nas
264a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams len pa med par zab pa rnams las sems rnam par grol
264a8(brgyad stong): ba'i rgyan gang lags rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis ni sangs rgyas lnga brgya la
264b1(brgyad stong): bsnyen bkur byas shing thams cad du yang sbyin pa byin tshul khrims bsrungs bzod pa bsgrubs brtson 'grus brtsams bsam gtan dag skyed de de dag kyang shes rab
264b2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing thabs mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur to// shA ri'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi lam stong
264b3(brgyad stong): pa nyid dam mtshan ma med pa la spyod pa'am smon pa med pa yin mod kyi/ de ltar na yang de dag thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon
264b4(brgyad stong): du byas nas nyan thos kyi sar nges par byung gi sangs rgyas kyi sar ma yin no// shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na 'dab chags bya zhig gi lus dpag tshad brgya pa 'am
264b5(brgyad stong): dpag tshad nyis brgya pa 'am dpag tshad sum brgya pa 'am dpag tshad bzhi brgya'am dpag tshad lnga brgya pa tsam du gyur pa zhig yod de/ de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i
264b6(brgyad stong): nang du 'dug pa las 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'gro'o snyam du sems shing shA ri'i bu 'dab chags bya de 'dab ma ma skyes pa 'am 'dab ma byi bar gyur pa 'am 'dab ma bcad
264b7(brgyad stong): par gyur la/ des 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir gnas par bya'o snyam du bsams te sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i rigs nas bdag nyid mchongs te 'dab chags bya te de nas
264b8(brgyad stong): lhung ba dang / nam mkha'i bar snang la gnas pa'i brda der 'di snyam du kye ma 'o bdag phyir sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du gnas par bya'o snyam du sems na shA
265a1(brgyad stong): ri'i bu de ci snyam du sems ci 'dab chags bya des phyir sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na gnas par nus sam/ tshe dang ldan pa
265a2(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gal te yang 'di snyam du kye ma bdag ni
265a3(brgyad stong): ma smas ma snad par 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas par bya'o snyam du shA ri'i bu de ci snyam du sems ci 'dab chags bya des ma sras me snad par 'dzam bu gling du gnas par 'gyur ram
265a4(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni lags so// bcom ldan 'das de 'dzam bu'i gling du lhung nas sbas shing snad par 'gyur te/ de 'gum pa
265a5(brgyad stong): 'am 'gum pa la thug pa tsam gyi sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar lags te/ gang gi lus kyang chen por gyur pa
265a6(brgyad stong): dang 'dab ma yang ma mchis par gyur pa dang mthon po zhig nas kyang ltung bar gyur pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
265a7(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa
265a8(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas shing sbyin pa byin tshul khrims bzod pa bsgrubs brtson 'grus
265b1(brgyad stong): brtsams bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag ste/ de rgya cher yang dag par zhugs par gyur cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog
265b2(brgyad stong): par 'tshang rgya bar de'i sems cher bskyed par gyur kyang gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis yongs su ma zin cing thabs mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur na/
265b3(brgyad stong): 'di ltar nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo // shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs
265b4(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims de dang ting nge 'dzin de dang shes rab de dang rnam par grol ba de dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa de la mtshan ma'i
265b5(brgyad stong): tshul gyis sems shing 'dzin par byed pa des ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshu lIm+bi shes mi mthong ste/
265b6(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin ma yin shes rab ma yin rnam par grol ba yin de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye
265b7(brgyad stong): shes gzigs pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // des ma shes ma mthong bas stong pa nyid kyi sgra nyan cing des sgra de la mtshan mar byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
265b8(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar 'dod pa de'i phyir 'di ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas sa la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
266a1(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing thabs mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur pa de ni
266a2(brgyad stong): 'di ltar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar bshad pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na byang chub gang bsod nams kyi tshogs shin
266a3(brgyad stong): tu mang po dang ldan du 'gyur lags kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zung la thams mkhas pa dang bral zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma ldan par
266a4(brgyad stong): gyur na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob pa la the tsom du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems
266a5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bgyi zhing
266a6(brgyad stong): thabs mkhas pa la yang brtson par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
266a7(brgyad stong): shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing
266a8(brgyad stong): thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba ni bsod nams kyi tshegs mang po ldan na yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bar gyur na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
266b1(brgyad stong): 'thob pa ni the tsom tu 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
266b2(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom par bya zhing thabs mkhas pa dang yang ldan par bya'o// de nas lha rnams
266b3(brgyad stong): kyi dbang po brgya byin 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang bcas pa dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pas bcom
266b4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

266b6(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang mi mjed kyi bdag tshangs pa la sogs pa gzug
