394a7(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur te sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis chung ngu na se
394a8(brgyad stong): gol gtogs pa gcig tsam du yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub cing sems skyed pa 'di skyed par byed pa'i yon tan 'di dag dang phan yon 'di dag
394b1(brgyad stong): yin nam/ gang zhig sems bskyed pa 'di nyin thog thag rjes su 'jug par byed pa lta ci smos/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba
394b2(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa'i drung na da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po zhes bya ba tshangs par spyad pa spyod
394b3(brgyad stong): pa bzhin no// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las me tog bkram pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//
394b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'di ltar rjes su rig par bya te/ chos thams cad chags pa
394b5(brgyad stong): med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o//
394b6(brgyad stong): chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
394b7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad bdag med pa dang rnam par rig pa med par shes rab kyi rjes su rtogs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
394b8(brgyad stong): par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad ming tsam dang tha snyad gdags pa tsam gyis brjod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o//
395a1(brgyad stong): tha snyad gdags pa yang gang la yang ma yin gang gis kyang ma yin gang yang tha snyad gdags pa med do// chos thams cad tha snyad med parjod du med pa
395a2(brgyad stong): slar med pa tshig med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad tshad ma med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig
395a3(brgyad stong): par bya'o// gzugs tshad ma med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba tshad ma med pa dang 'du shes tshad ma med pa
395a4(brgyad stong): dang 'du byed rnams tshad ma med pa dang / rnam par shes pa tshad ma med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i
395a5(brgyad stong): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad
395a6(brgyad stong): rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad tshig med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes
395a7(brgyad stong): su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad 'gog pa med pas spang bar bya ba mnyam pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad mya
395a8(brgyad stong): ngan las 'das pa thob cing de bzhin nyid dang mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad mi 'ong mi 'gro mi shes mi skye shin tu
395b1(brgyad stong): mi skye ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// bdag dang gzhan du mi lta ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos
395b2(brgyad stong): thams cad 'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad khur bor zhing
395b3(brgyad stong): khur mi khyer ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad yul med cing phyogs med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes
395b4(brgyad stong): su rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis ngo bo nyid kyis yul dang phyogs med pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du
395b5(brgyad stong): shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis ngo bo nyid kyis yul dang phyogs med pa'o// chos thams cad 'gog par rab tu sim par byed pa'i
395b6(brgyad stong): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// dga' ba med cing dga' ba dang bral ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par
395b7(brgyad stong): bya'o// 'dod chags pa med cing 'dod chags dang bral ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjesu rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
395b8(brgyad stong): gzugs ni de kho na dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid kyisen 'dod chags par mi byed 'dod chags dang bral bar mi byed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'dus shes
396a1(brgyad stong): dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni de kho na dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na 'dod chags par mi byed 'dod chags dang bral bar mi byed do//
396a2(brgyad stong): rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad chags pa dang ma chags pa'i zhen pa dang bral ba'i
396a3(brgyad stong): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes khong du chud pas chos thams cad byang chub bo zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par
396a4(brgyad stong): rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// byams
396a5(brgyad stong): pa chen po sngon du 'gro bas chos thams cad sman lta bu'o zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad byams pa la gnas pa dang snying
396a6(brgyad stong): rje la gnas pa dang dga' ba la gnas pa dang btang snyoms la gnas pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad tshangs par gyur
396a7(brgyad stong): pas zhe sdang mi skyed cing zhe sdang thams cad mi len pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad smon pa med pa'i phyir dang khong khrob
396a8(brgyad stong): med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// rgya mtsho mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// nam
396b1(brgyad stong): mkha' mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa/
396b2(brgyad stong): rjes su rig par bya'o// gzugs mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed
396b3(brgyad stong): rnams dang rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor mu med pa snang ba'i
396b4(brgyad stong): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// sgra thams cad mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o//
396b5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// sems can gyi khams
396b6(brgyad stong): thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// sa'i khams mu med pa'i
396b7(brgyad stong): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang na mkha'i khams dang rnam
396b8(brgyad stong): par shes pa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos bsags pa tshad med pa'i
397a1(brgyad stong): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad bsags pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
397a2(brgyad stong): phyin pa tshad med par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mu med pa thob pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par
397a3(brgyad stong): bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad mu med pa'i
397a4(brgyad stong): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjesu rig par bya'o// stong pa nyid mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o//
397a5(brgyad stong): sems dang sems las byung ba mu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// sems kyi spyod pa mu med pa'i phyir/ shes rab
397a6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshod med par rjes su rig par bya'o//
397a7(brgyad stong): seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad 'khrug pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'khrug
397a8(brgyad stong): pa med par rjes su rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs ni rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du rab 'byor tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed
397b1(brgyad stong): rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang
397b2(brgyad stong): par shes pa ni na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni ri rab sna tshogs dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par
397b3(brgyad stong): shes pa ni ri rab sna tshogs dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes
397b4(brgyad stong): pa ni mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer 'byung ba dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnam
397b5(brgyad stong): dang rnam par shes pa ni nyi ma'i 'od zer 'byung ba dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni sgra thams cad mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang
397b6(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni sgra thams cad mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa mu med pa dang mtshung
397b7(brgyad stong): pa'o// / gzugs ni sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du
397b8(brgyad stong): byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni sa dang mchu/
397b9(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang ma byed rnams dang rnam pa shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrubs su med papa
398a1(brgyad stong): pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni sa dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni chu dang mtshungs pa'o//
398a2(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni chu dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni me dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du
398a3(brgyad stong): shes dang 'du byed rnam par shes pa ni mi dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni rlung dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par
398a4(brgyad stong): shes pa ni rlung dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha'
398a5(brgyad stong): mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa
398a6(brgyad stong): dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos bsags pa dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes
398a7(brgyad stong): pa ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos bsags pa dang bral ba'o// gzugs ni chos thams cad bsags pa dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang
398a8(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni chos thams cad bsags pa dang bral ba'o// gzugs ni chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// de
398b1(brgyad stong): bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni bral ba ste gzugs
398b2(brgyad stong): kyi ngo bo nyid dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni bral ba ste/ rnam
398b3(brgyad stong): par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so// gzugs ni chos thams cad mu med pa'i chos nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba
398b4(brgyad stong): dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni chos thams cad mu med pa'i chos nyid do// gzugs ni stong pa mu med pa'i chos nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba
398b5(brgyad stong): dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnam par shes pa ni stong pa mu med pa'i chos nyid do// gzugs ni sems dang sems las byung ba mu med pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba
398b6(brgyad stong): dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba mu med pa'o/ gzugs ni sems kyi spyod pa las byung ba'o// de bzhin du
398b7(brgyad stong): tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni sems kyi spyod pa las byung ba'o// gzugs ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang mi dmigs pa'i bar du'o/
398b8(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang mi dmigs pa'i bar du'o// gzugs ni seng ge'i sgra dang mtshu
399a1(brgyad stong): pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni seng ge'i sgra dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni 'khrug pa/
399a2(brgyad stong): med pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
399a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha
399a4(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin par de ltar rjes su rig par byed pa dang rnam par spyod pa dang 'jug pa dang rtogs par byed pa dang sems pa dang 'jal ba dang nye bar rtog pa dang sgyu dang g.yo/
399a5(brgyad stong): thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang le lo thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang rlom sems thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa
399a6(brgyad stong): dang / bdag bstod pa yid la byed pa dang / gzhan la smod pa'i rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang bdag tu 'du shes pa rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang /
399a7(brgyad stong): sems can du 'du shes pa rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang sgrib pa lnga rnam
399a8(brgyad stong): par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang phrag dog dang ser sna rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang skye bo thams cad spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis sgom par 'gyur
399b1(brgyad stong): ba de'i tshe/ de la yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par rnyed dka' bar
399b2(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las rjes su rig pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//
399b3(brgyad stong): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po nyi shu gsum pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab
399b4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
399b5(brgyad stong): sgra dbyangs mi zad par sgrogs pa'i drung na tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa des yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du yongs su btsal bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa
399b6(brgyad stong): dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus
399b7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshol ba na ci ltar yongs su btsal lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di
399b8(brgyad stong): skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol ba na lus la che
400a1(brgyad stong): che bar mi byed srog la mi lta rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa dag la mi gnas par yongs su btsal bas yongasu btsal to// des shes
400a2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol zhing 'brog dgon pa zhig tu phyin pa na bar snang las/ rigs kyi bu khyod shar phyogs su song zhig dang shes rab kyi pha rol
400a3(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur gyis/ ci ltar lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang gnyid dang rmugs pa yid byed pa mi skyed pa dang bza' ba yid la byed pa mi
400a4(brgyad stong): skyed pa dang btung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / nyin mo yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang grang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed
400a5(brgyad stong): pa dang / tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa de ltar song zhig/ nang ngam phyi rol gang la yang sems smon par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu g.yon du ma lta bar song
400a6(brgyad stong): zhig/ g.yas su ma yin shar du ma yin/ lho ru ma yin nub tu ma yin byang du ma yin steng du ma yin 'og tu ma yin phyogs mtsham su yang ma lta bar song zhig
400a7(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu ci ltar bdag las ma g.yos shing 'jigs tshogs las kyang ma yin pa dang / ci ltar gzugs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang ci ltar tshor ba dang 'du
400a8(brgyad stong): shes dang 'du byed rnams dang ci ltar rnam par shes pa las kyang ma g.yos pa de ltar song zhig/ gang 'di las g.yos pa 'di ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro//
400b1(brgyad stong): ci las nyams par 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ba de ni 'khor/
400b2(brgyad stong): ba la spyod do// gang 'khor ba la spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod de/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su mi 'thob bo zhes bya ba'i sgra
400b3(brgyad stong): thos par gyur to// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de la 'di skad de bzhin du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
400b4(brgyad stong): nga ni sems can thams cad la snang bar byed 'dod pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro// zhes smras so// de skad ces smras pa dang sgra
400b5(brgyad stong): des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngu legs so leg so zhes smra so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sem
400b6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu dus yang sgra de thos te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med par chos thams cad la mos pa bskyed
400b7(brgyad stong): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o// khyod kyis mtshan ma yongasu spang ba dang dngos po yongs su spang ba dang / sems can du lta ba yongs
400b8(brgyad stong): spang bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi sdig pa'i grogs po dag yongasu spang bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma/
401a1(brgyad stong): med pa dang smon pa med pa dang ma byung ba dang ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa dang dngos po med par chos rnams ston pa dag la khyod kyis bsnyen par bya
401a2(brgyad stong): gus par bya bsnyen bkur bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar bsgrub na ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du chud pa 'am dge slong chos sgra
401a3(brgyad stong): ba'i lus la yod pa thos par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa de la khyod kyis ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing khyod
401a4(brgyad stong): kyis byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa tsher bya ste/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa 'di ni bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyin yin te/ 'di bdag gis
401a5(brgyad stong): thos pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
401a6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// mi khom pa rnams spong
401a7(brgyad stong): bar 'gyuraro// dal ba phun sum tshogs pa spyod pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu phan yon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongasu rtogs la dge slong chos smra ba la
401a8(brgyad stong): ston pa yin par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang
401b1(brgyad stong): bar mi bya'i/ khyod kyis dge slong smra ba la chos don du gnyer ba dang chos la gus par bya bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o// khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams kyang
401b2(brgyad stong): rtogs par bya ste rigs kyi bu bdud sdig can ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dag bsnyen pa dang
401b3(brgyad stong): bsten pa dang spyad par bya ba'i phyir nye bar bsgrub ste/ de dag chos smra ba des zil gyis mnan nas thabs mkhas pas 'grogs shing bstan par byed pa dang bsnyen
401b4(brgyad stong): par byed pa yang yod de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba de la ma dad pa bskyed par mi bya'o// gzhan du na sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/
401b5(brgyad stong): bdag ni thabs mkhas pa de mi shes kyi 'di ni thabs mkhas pa rab tu shes so// 'di ni sems can gdul ba'i tshul gyis sems can rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa
401b6(brgyad stong): ba yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos 'di dag la brten cing 'grogs te bsnyen par byed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gang la yang chags
401b7(brgyad stong): pa'ang sgrib pa med kyi skad cig de nyid la rigs kyi bu khyod nyid kyis chos rnams kyis yang dag pa'i tshul so sor brtag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi
401b8(brgyad stong): dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo
402a1(brgyad stong): nyid kyis stod pa lto/ chos ca ni sems can med pa srog med pa gas pa med pa/ skyes bu med pagang bag med pa sgyums bu mi lam sa sa/
402a2(brgyad stong): brnyan lta bu mig yor lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing chos smra ba'i rjes su 'brang na ring por mi thogs
402a3(brgyad stong): par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang khyod kyis bdud kyi las la soms shig/ rigs kyi bu gal
402a4(brgyad stong): te chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu la brnyas par byed cing mi sems na de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir bsngo bar mi bya ste/
402a5(brgyad stong): gzhan du na chos don du gnyer ba nyid dang chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang yid mi skyo bas dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o zhes de skad kyang thos so// /
402a6(brgyad stong): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs nas shar phyogs ga la ba der song ba dang ring por ma phyin par de 'di
402a7(brgyad stong): snyam du sems te bdag gis sgra de la ci srid du 'gro bar bya ba ma dris so snyam du bsams nas de sa phyogs de nyid du ngu zhing tshong nges 'debs te mya ngan byed la sme zhing
402a8(brgyad stong): 'dug ste/ de 'di snyam du sa phyogs 'di nyid du nyin zhag gcig gi bar du nyin mtshan 'da' bar bya'o// nyin mtshan gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi'am lnga 'am
402b1(brgyad stong): drug gam nyin mtshan bdun yang 'da' bar bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa ma gyur gyi bar du lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi skyed rmugs pa dang gnyid
402b2(brgyad stong): yid la byed pa mi skyed bza' ba yid la byed pa mi skyed btung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi skyed nyin mo yid la byed pa mi skyed grang ba yid la byed
402b3(brgyad stong): pa mi skyed tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed do snyam du bsams so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu la la zhig bu gcig pa 'chi ba'i dus byas na sdug bsngal ba dang
402b4(brgyad stong): yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de mya ngan gyi bu gcig pu yid la byed pa nyid ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ste/ rab
402b5(brgyad stong): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus yang de'i tshe bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur snyam pa ma
402b6(brgyad stong): gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang ma byung ngo // rab 'byor de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de ltar gdung zhing 'dug pa'i
402b7(brgyad stong): mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig bzhugs nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis tshig de skad smra ba legs so legs so//
402b8(brgyad stong): ci ltar khyod kyis da ltar yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang
403a1(brgyad stong): sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal to// rigs bu de'i phyir khyod kyi brtson 'grus
403a2(brgyad stong): 'di nyid dang spo ba 'di nyid dang don du gnyer ba 'di nyid dang 'dod pa 'di lta bu nyid kyis rjes su 'brang zhing shar phyogs nyid du song zhig dang rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad
403a3(brgyad stong): lnga brgya na spos dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyis ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba 'obs rim pa bdun dang shing tA la'i phreng ba rim
403a4(brgyad stong): pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa 'byor pa rgyas pa bde ba lo legs pa skye bo mang po dang mis gang
403a5(brgyad stong): ba/ bar gyi tshong khang gi ri mo sna tshogs su bris pa lta bur lta na sdug pa phigs par gyur pa mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/ skye bo dang khyogs kyi bzhon pa dang rkang gi sa
403a6(brgyad stong): 'gro ba'i gnas 'dzer dog med par gnas pa lnga brgya dag gis legs par bsgrubs pa/ grong khyer de'i 'khor yug tu zhol gyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi rang
403a7(brgyad stong): bzhin gyis bskor la rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi ra ba de dag gi 'da' yab rnams ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ mtho zhing tshad dang ldan pa mnga'
403a8(brgyad stong): yab thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi shing skyes te/ rin po che sna tshogs bkra ba'i shing thog gi 'bras bu chags pa/ mda' yab
403b1(brgyad stong): las shing skyes pa thams cad las kyang rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi thag gu byung bas mda' yab gnyis pa'i shing gzhan dang 'brel ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i grong khyer
403b2(brgyad stong): de gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas khebs te/ gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag la rlung gis btab na sgra 'dzam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba
403b3(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste/ dper na yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo sna tshogs pa/ rol mo mkhan mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung
403b4(brgyad stong): ba de bzhin du/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag la nu gis btab na sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/ sgra des sems can de dag rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur
403b5(brgyad stong): spyod do// grong khyer de kho ra yug tu 'obs chu rjes su mthun par 'bab pa'i chu yongasu gang zhing / chu ha cang yang mi grang ba ha cang yang mi dro bas gang ba dag yod do// chu de
403b6(brgyad stong): dag nyid la sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa/ rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa'i gru dag yod de/ der sems can dag
403b7(brgyad stong): zhugs nas rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// chu de dag thams cad kyang ut+pal dang ku mu da dang pad+ma dkar po dag gis khebs pa/ me tog gi rigs che zhing bzang
403b8(brgyad stong): dri zhim po'i ngad ldang ba gzhan dag gis kyang khebs te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i me tog gi rigs la de na med pa gang yang med do//
404a1(brgyad stong): @grong khyer de'i nang na skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa sha stag ste/ skyed
404a2(brgyad stong): mos tshal de dag re re na yang rdzing bu khor yug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga rgya yod de/ rdzing bu de dag thams cad nas rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi me tog
404a3(brgyad stong): ut+pa la dang ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de dag gis khebs shing / ut+pal dang ku mud dang pad+ma
404a4(brgyad stong): dkar po bzang po de dag thams cad kyang chu zheng du shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam ste/ dri bzang ba sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon por ston pa/ sngon por snang ba/ ser po kha

404b2(brgyad stong): pa rin po che sna bdun las byas khor yug tu dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam rnam par bkra zhing blta na sdug pa ra ba rim pa bdun dang ta la'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis yongasu
404b3(brgyad stong): bskor ba zhig yod de/ khang pa de na khang pa'i longs spyad pa dang nye bar longs spyad pa dang yongs su longs spyad pa dag rtag tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang /

407a1(brgyad stong): cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par

407a8(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

407b2(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi rdul sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir
407b3(brgyad stong): mi ldog pI ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
407b4(brgyad stong): 'dzin dang / dbugs 'byin pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge mngon par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad zil
407b5(brgyad stong): gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang rnam par bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
407b6(brgyad stong): pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
407b7(brgyad stong): chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
407b8(brgyad stong): chos thams cad la nges par 'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi
408a1(brgyad stong): @'byor pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos bams thams cad bye brag med par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lta bar gyur pa'i
408a2(brgyad stong): thibs po thams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma dang bral ba zhes
408a3(brgyad stong): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / le lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
408a4(brgyad stong): chos zab mo'i 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud kyi dkyil
408a5(brgyad stong): 'khor rnam par sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten gsum la mngon par ma chags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer sgrub pa zhes bya
408a6(brgyad stong): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
408a7(brgyad stong): nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhal du med grangs med pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
408a8(brgyad stong): chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid rab tu ston pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis leg so zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs dbyung ba mdzad
408b1(brgyad stong): de/ tshig 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu nged kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du yongs su btsal te/ longs
408b2(brgyad stong): su tshol ba na yang gang 'dir khyod kyi thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu nyid dag thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtogs par khong
408b3(brgyad stong): du chud par gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur to// nged kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin la bltas na/ gang mnyam
408b4(brgyad stong): par gzhag pa bya ba 'am/ ldang bar bya ba 'am/ gang byang chub tu spyad par bya ba 'am gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
408b5(brgyad stong): rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yin te/ chos gang gis kyang rlom sems sam/
408b6(brgyad stong): rlom sems med par mi byed pa la gnas nas/ nged kyis 'di 'dra ba'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu thob ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad
408b7(brgyad stong): bzang po brgyad cu dang 'od 'dom gang ba dang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bla na med pa dang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla
408b8(brgyad stong): na med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob ste/ yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la re shig de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi/
409a1(brgyad stong): kyang tshad gzung ba 'am/ mtha' bstan par mi nus na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis chos 'di dag
409a2(brgyad stong): nyid la rab du don du gnyer ba dang 'dod pas gus pa mchog tu bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu don du gnyer ba dang 'dod pa la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
409a3(brgyad stong): byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shin tu gus pa bskyed par bya'o// phangs par bya'o// rab tu dang bar bya'o//
409a4(brgyad stong): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
409a5(brgyad stong): par 'tshang rgya'o// zhes kyang gsungs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces bdag gi
409a6(brgyad stong): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags zhes gsol to// de dag gis de la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
409a7(brgyad stong): chos 'phags kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas shing yongs su bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs
409a8(brgyad stong): mkhas pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bslabs so// rigs kyi bu de ni khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su 'dzin pa yin te/ byas pa shes pa dang byas pa
409b1(brgyad stong): tshor bas de bsgo ba dang des byas pa bzhin du zungs shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bskal pa
409b2(brgyad stong): gcig gam bskal pa gnyis sam bskal pa gsum mam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang mgo la
409b3(brgyad stong): thod bzhin du thogs shing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang
409b4(brgyad stong): reg pa ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad phul yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyi rigs kyi bu de'i byas pa de nyid la lan lon pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu de'i
409b5(brgyad stong): mthus khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnams rnyed par gyur to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa thos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par
409b6(brgyad stong): gyur to// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dbugs phyung nas mi snang bar gyur te/
409b7(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu de yang ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te langs nas kyang 'di snyam du sems so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
409b8(brgyad stong): gang du bzhud snyam ste/ de de bzhin gshegs de dag ma mthong bas rab tu gdung zhing mi dga' bar gyur to// yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa byang chub
410a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni gzungs thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba
410a2(brgyad stong): byas pa ste/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag par yongs su 'dzin pa/ yun ring po nas des bdag gi don byas pa yin gyis/ bdag byang chub sems
410a3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mngon par song ste nye bar phyin nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
410a4(brgyad stong): gang du bzhud ces don 'di nyid dri'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
410a5(brgyad stong): 'phags la dga' ba dang dad pa dang ri mo dang gus par bya ba nye bar bzhag nas 'di snyam du sems so// bdag gis ci lta bu'i bkur stir bya bas byang chub sems
410a6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du 'gro bar bya/ bdag ni dbul te gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bdag
410a7(brgyad stong): gis bkur stir bya ba'i gos sam rin po che'am/ gser ram nor bu'am mu tig gam bai DUr+ya 'am dung ngam man shel lam byi ru'am dngul lam me tog gam bdug
410a8(brgyad stong): pa 'am dri 'am phreng ba 'am byug pa 'am phye ma 'am chos gos sam/ gdugs sam rgyal mtshan nam/ dril bu 'am ba dan de lta bu yang bdag la med na/ bdag 'di
410b1(brgyad stong): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du song na ni bdag gis mi rigs pa byas par 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba 'am rangs pa yang mi
410b2(brgyad stong): skye'o snyam du bsams so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de lta bu'i yon tan dag dang bla ma la gus pa yid la byed pa dag dang ldan pas song
410b3(brgyad stong): nas mthar gyis grong khyer gzhan zhig tu phyin par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du grong bar gyi srang ga la ba der song ste de'i grong bar
410b4(brgyad stong): gyi dbus su phyin nas de 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag gi lus bcong la/ de'i rin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir bya'o// yun
410b5(brgyad stong): ring po nas bdag gi lus stong zhig cing zad de/ 'gags par btsongs so// 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i gzhis yang dang yang sems
410b6(brgyad stong): can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa dag myong yang 'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram 'di lta bu'i sems can chen po la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir ma yin no snyam du bsams
410b7(brgyad stong): so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus grong bar gyi tshong 'dus kyi dbus su 'dug ste mi su 'dod mi su 'dod mi su nyo bar 'dod ces sgra
410b8(brgyad stong): sgrags shing skad kyis bos so// de nas bdud sdig can gyis 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'di ni bdag
411a1(brgyad stong): nyid btsongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir byed cing / ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
411a2(brgyad stong): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thab
411a3(brgyad stong): la mkhas pa yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te/ des thos pa rgya mtsho rjes su thob par 'gyur/ bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis mi thub par 'gyur/ yon tan
411a4(brgyad stong): thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// der sems can mang po dag gi don byed par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
411a5(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de dag gzhan dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis 'di'i bar chad bya'o snyam du bsam so// de nas
411a6(brgyad stong): bdud sdig can gyis ci nas bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus mi su 'dod mi su 'dod mi su nyo bar 'dod ces
411a7(brgyad stong): zer ba'i sgra ci ltar mi thos par 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsgribs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du gang gi tshe bdag nyo ba ma rnyed pa de'i
411a8(brgyad stong): tshe/ phyogs gcig tu song nas dungus te mchi ma phyung nas 'di skad du bdag gi lus btsongs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya
411b1(brgyad stong): snyam na/ lus nyo ba yang bdag gis ma rnyed de/ kye ma bdag ni thob pa ngan pa thob bo zhes smras so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di snyam du 'di ltar
411b2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di lta ste chos 'dod pa'i phyir/ bdag gi lus yongs su btang bar lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no
411b3(brgyad stong): ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu bdag gis sad par bya'o snyam du bsams so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i
411b4(brgyad stong): cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du ga la ba der song ste 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
411b5(brgyad stong): du la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar khyod yid mi dga' zhing gdong la mchi ma byung zhing gnas pa ci nyes de la rtag tu dus 'di skad ces smras so// tham
411b6(brgyad stong): ze'i khye'u nga'i gus btsongs par 'dod na lus 'di nyo ba yang ma rnyed do// brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs can gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag nyid
411b7(brgyad stong): 'tshong bar 'dod/ rtag tu ngus de la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u nga ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs te/ chos la mchod par bya bar 'dod cing 'phags pa bya
411b8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya bar 'dod na/ lus nyo ba de ngas ma rnyed nas de la nga 'di snyam du sems so// kye ma nga ni bsod
412a1(brgyad stong): nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
412a2(brgyad stong): chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya snyam na/ bdag gi lus nyo ba yang ma rnyed do snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
412a3(brgyad stong): po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so/ rigs kyi bu ngal mis ni bya ba med kyi 'on kyang nga mchod sbyin zhig byed de/ der mi'i snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang /
412a4(brgyad stong): rkang dag nga la dgos na de'i rin gyis nyor byin cig ces byas pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ gang
412a5(brgyad stong): bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u 'di bdag gi snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang rkang nyo ba rnyed pa 'di ni bdag gis rnyed pa'i mchog legs par rnyed do// bdag gis lus ni
412a6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de sems dga' ba dang sems bde ba
412a7(brgyad stong): dang sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas bram ze'i khye'u de la 'di skad ces smras so/ bram ze'i khye'u nga'i lus 'di las khyod gang dang gang 'dod pa sbyin no// des de
412a8(brgyad stong): la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod rin du ci 'dod pa sbyin no// zhes byas pa rtag tu du des de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze khye'u khyod kyis gang
412b1(brgyad stong): yongs su btang ba deng la byin cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thogs nas lag pa g.yas pa phug ste khrag gzags so// brla g.yas pa sha
412b2(brgyad stong): med par gtogs nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems
412b3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu du khrag mang po 'dzag pa dang / brla sha med par gtogs nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ba mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te//
412b4(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i phyir bdag nyid la bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i na tsha byed pa bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste dri'o snyam mo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub
412b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so//
412b6(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed/ khrag dang rus pa dang rkang 'dis ci zhig bya/ rtag tu dus de la smras pa/ bu mo bram ze'i khye'u
412b7(brgyad stong): 'di la lus gtsengs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o// 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang
412b8(brgyad stong): bkur sti bya'o// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar bdag
413a1(brgyad stong): gi snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang rkang yang btsongs te/ rigs kyi bu de la bkur sti bya bar 'dod pa khyod la yon tan gyi rigs yon tan gyi khyad par ci
413a2(brgyad stong): zhig 'grub par 'gyur/ des bu mo de la 'di skad ces bu me rigs kyi bu de ni gang langs bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dag
413a3(brgyad stong): ston par 'gyur te/ de la ngas bslabs na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur
413a4(brgyad stong): lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu yang thob par 'gyur/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang 'od 'dos gang ba dang / 'od
413a5(brgyad stong): zer mtha' yas pa dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang dga' ba chen po dang btang snyoms chen po dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi rab tu thob par 'gyur/ so so yang
413a6(brgyad stong): dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang rab tu thob par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
413a7(brgyad stong): dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis
413a8(brgyad stong): mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rab tu thob par 'gyur/ bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/
413b1(brgyad stong): gang gis sems can thams cad la kun tu mgo sha bya ba'i bla na med pa'i chos rin po che yang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des
413b2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di ltar chos rgya chen po phul du byung ba 'di dag yongs su brjod pa ni ngo
413b3(brgyad stong): mtshar te/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi don 'di lta bu re re'i phyir yang bskal pa gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed du lus yongs su btang bar bya ba yin na mang po'i phyir lta ci smos
413b4(brgyad stong): te/ de tsam du khyod kyis chos 'di dag rgya che zhing phul du byung ba yongs su brjod pa ci lta bar bdag kyang 'dod cing bzod do// de lta na yang rigs kyi bu khyod gang dang
413b5(brgyad stong): gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i gser ram nor bu 'am mu tig gam bai DUr+ya 'am/ dngul lam mu sa la gardza
413b6(brgyad stong): 'am lo hi ta ra ga 'am shel lam me tog gam gdug pa 'am dri 'am phreng ba 'am byug pa 'am phye ma 'am gos sam gdugs sam rgyal mtshan nam/ dril bu 'am ba dan na
413b7(brgyad stong): mar me khyod la ci dgos pa de dang de khyod la byin gyis bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig/ bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs te 'phags pa byang chub sems
413b8(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong la bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ de lta bu'i chos de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba
414a1(brgyad stong): bskyed par bya'o zhes smras so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad mi snang bar byas nas bdag nyid kyi lus su byang
414a2(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu khyod de lta bu'i yi dam la brtan pa dang / de lta bu'i chos don du
414a3(brgyad stong): gnyer ba 'di ni legs so leg so// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
414a4(brgyad stong): spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa yongs su zhus pas chos rin po che shin tu thob nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
414a5(brgyad stong): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rigs kyi bu nga la snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang rkang gis bya ba med kyi nga khyod sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyis

414a8(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyis/ mchog gzhan slongs shig/ rtag tu ngus smras pa/ bdag gis lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i
414b1(brgyad stong): gnas 'di la ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin khyod brtson pa chung bar gyis shig/ lha rnams kyi dbang po nga'i lus 'di la bdag nyid kyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs bya'o//

414b3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan cing bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo med pa mkhyen na bden pa de dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus sngon gyi ji lta

420a7(brgyad stong): rgyal mtshan dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang tsan dan gyi phye ma dang gser dang dngul las byas pa'i me tog dag gis gtor mngon par rab tu gtor to// lha'i sil

420b1(brgyad stong): pa zhig gyur to// gser dang dngul las byas pa'i me tog dang kha dog sna tshogs pa'i me tog de dag na mkha' la gzhal med khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to// des chos
420b2(brgyad stong): go sa dang gos rin po che de dag kyang bar snang la rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
420b3(brgyad stong): po rtag tu ngu dang tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'bru'ade lta bu'i
420b4(brgyad stong): mthong ste/ mthong nas de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te ngo mtshar to// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di
420b5(brgyad stong): ltar mthu che la 'di ltar gzi brjid che ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nyid na yang rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra na bla na med pa yang
420b6(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag
420b7(brgyad stong): gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba bskyed nas tshogs pa de dag thams cad dang lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag
420b8(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
421a1(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phag
421a2(brgyad stong): kyi chos gang thob par gyur pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur cig/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu
421a3(brgyad stong): phyin pa la bkur stir byed pa dang tha mar byed pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur stir byed pa dang bla mar byed par shog cig/ byang chub sems
421a4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ci ltar yang dag par ston pa bzhin du bdag cag kyang skye bo mang po la yang dag par ston par gyur cig/ ci ltar byang chub
421a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs pa de bzhin du bdag cag
421a6(brgyad stong): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par shog cig ces smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
421a7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas/ byang chub sems dpa'
421a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rkang pa la mgo bo rnams kyis
421b1(brgyad stong): mngon du phyag 'tshal nas zhes byed cing thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
421b2(brgyad stong): chos 'phags la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di na bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshol
421b3(brgyad stong): zhing 'brog dgon par phyin pa na/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song zhig dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes sgra thos te/ bdag gis sgra
421b4(brgyad stong): de las yang dag par bston pa de thos nas shar phyogs ga la ba de logs su phyin nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis sgra de la ci srid gcig tu mchi bar
421b5(brgyad stong): bgyi su'i drung du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan cing rnyed par 'gyur ba yang dag par 'gro ba sgra thos pa la bdag gis ma dris so snyam ste des bdag yid mi
421b6(brgyad stong): bde zhing shin tu gdung bar gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te de ltar shin tu gdung bas zas la sems pa ni ma byung gi/ gzhan du na shes
421b7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te ci srid gcig tu mchi bar bar bgyi ba dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di su las mnyan pa rnyed par 'gyur ba
421b8(brgyad stong): sgra de la ma dris so snyam pa dang / de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i skra zhig byung ste de 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar rim
422a1(brgyad stong): gyis song dang grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing
422a2(brgyad stong): 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te de nas bdag dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba rgya
422a3(brgyad stong): chen po de nyid kyis khyab par gyur nas sa phyogs de nas ma bskyod par khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa thos so// de bdag gis thos pa na ting nge 'dzin

422b8(brgyad stong): pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las rtag tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu pa'o//
423a1(brgyad stong): @de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rtag tu ngul

427a4(brgyad stong): pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mi byin mi bzhud pa bstan pa 'di khyod kyis dris te/ bdag gis bstan pas srog chags stong phrag brgyad
427a5(brgyad stong): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / srog
427a6(brgyad stong): tshogs drug khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma med pa rnam par dag par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du
427a7(brgyad stong): dga' ba dang rangs pa mchog tu rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ gang bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang bzhud/
427a8(brgyad stong): pa med pa'i bstan pa 'di dris pas sems can 'di snyed gcig gi don byas par gyur pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa mchog tu legs par rnyed do// 'di nyid kyis bdag
427b1(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog thob par gyur pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
427b2(brgyad stong): la bdag slar yang the tshom mi 'jug go// bdag ni the tshom med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur re
427b3(brgyad stong): snyam pa dang / de dga' ba dang rangs pa de dang ldan pas ta la bdun tsam du na mkha' la 'phags nas tA la bdun tsam na 'dug ste/ 'di ltar bdag na mkha' la
427b4(brgyad stong): 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o snyam du sems so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub
427b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mngon par 'phags pa mthong ste de'i sems sems kyis shes nas de la lha'i me tog man da ra ba dag byin te/ 'di
427b6(brgyad stong): skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis lha'i me tog 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed pas bkur stir gyis shig
427b7(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'di ni ngas khyod yongs su bzung ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng srog chags stong phrag mang pos don byas te rigs kyi bu gang sems
427b8(brgyad stong): can thams cad kyi phyir ci ltar khyod spro bar byed pa de ltar bskal pa gzhal du med grangs med par spro bar byed cing khur chen por khyer bar byed pa'i sems can de
428a1(brgyad stong): dag ni rnyed par dka'o zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha rnams kyi dbang po
428a2(brgyad stong): brgya byin gyi drung nas me tog man da ra ba de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor mngon par gtor mngon par rab
428a3(brgyad stong): tu gtor nas bdag gis lus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bkab ste/ nga tshig 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu
428a4(brgyad stong): deng slan chad khyod kyi rim gro dang zhabs 'bring bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis lus khyod 'bul lo zhes smras te/ des bdag gis lus phul nas byang chub
428a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sem
428a6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu bdag cag kyang khyod la lus 'bul gyis bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag
428a7(brgyad stong): thob par gyur cig/ khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu yang dang yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bkur stir
428a8(brgyad stong): bgyi bla mar bgyi de dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi'o zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba rtag tu dus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs
428b1(brgyad stong): pa bu mo lnga brgya 'ang 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo dag gal te khyod nga la lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas par byed na nga la lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig
428b2(brgyad stong): dang de ltar na bu mo khyed ngas blang ngo // bu mo de dag gis smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas khyod kyi rjes su mthun par 'jug go khyod lhag
428b3(brgyad stong): pa'i bsam pas ci dang ci 'dod par bya bar bdag nyid 'bul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs
428b4(brgyad stong): pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan te shing rta lnga brgya yang brgyan nas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la rim gro
428b5(brgyad stong): dang zhabs 'bring bya ba'i phyir phul te/ rigs kyi bu bdag ni g.yog mo 'di dag 'bul zhing shing rta lnga brgya 'di dag kyang yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir khyod
428b6(brgyad stong): la 'bul lo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis rigs kyi bu de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legaso// rigs kyi
428b7(brgyad stong): bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag gis 'byor pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o// yongs su gtong ba'i sems de lta bu'i
428b8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de ltar na chos smra ba
429a1(brgyad stong): dag la mchod pa byas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa nyan nus te rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
429a2(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'di lta bu'i tshul dang 'di lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas
429a3(brgyad stong): nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa yongs su dris so// de nas
429a4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang shing rta lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems
429a5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir blangs te blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngul slar byin no// de nas byang chub seMs dpa
429a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags stan las langs te bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang nyi ma nub par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
429a7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems par gyur te 'di ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la 'dug pa 'am nyal bar byed pa ni bdag gi mi cha la 'di ni ma
429a8(brgyad stong): legs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags bdag gzung ba'i phyir 'di lta ste chos ston du phyir mi byung gi bar du bdag 'greng ba dang /
429b1(brgyad stong): 'chags pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar bya'o zhes sems par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo
429b2(brgyad stong): bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stong phrag gzhal du med grangs med pa dag dang
429b3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang lo bdun
429b4(brgyad stong): gyi bar du gnyid dang rmugs pa med par spyod lam rnam pa gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed de lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung gnod sems kyi rtog pa
429b5(brgyad stong): ma byung rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma byung // ro la rkam pa ma yin sems kyi rnam par rtog pa ma byung ste/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
429b6(brgyad stong): po chos paphags ting nge 'dzin las nam ldang bar 'gyur/ bdag cag gis kyang khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba byang chub sems
429b7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis chos kyis khri bshams nas/ bdag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag ma btab kyis/ sa phyogs gang du byang chub
429b8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der legs par byug par bya me tog
430a1(brgyad stong): sna tshogs mngon par dgram mo snyam mo// tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems
430a2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob cing / spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed de bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go/ de nas byang chub sem
430a3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i sgra dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de ste zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin 'di las ldang
430a4(brgyad stong): ste langs nas grong khyer gyi dbus su 'dug ste chos ston par 'gyuro zhes thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i sgra de
430a5(brgyad stong): thos pa dang dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu dga' mgu zhing bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu sa phyog
430a6(brgyad stong): de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin bshams so// de nas bu mo de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos lus las phud de bla gos lnga brgya pa de dag
430a7(brgyad stong): stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo // de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
430a8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan bshams pa la bu mo de dag thams cad dga' mgu yi rang rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur to//
430b1(brgyad stong): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus phyogs der chag chag gdab par 'dod na ci nas kyang bdud sdig can gyis byang chub sems dpa'
430b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de chu ma rnyed nas sems mi dga' zhing sdug bsngal te/ yid mi bde bar gyur cing sems gzhan du 'gyur dang gang gis de'i dge
430b3(brgyad stong): ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba mchod pa de yang mi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir gang gis sa phyogs chag chag 'debs pa'i chu de dag thams cad kyang mi snang ba nyid du byas
430b4(brgyad stong): pas kun tu chu btsal nas chu ma rnyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du ma la bdag gi lus phug la khrag gis sa
430b5(brgyad stong): phyogs 'di chag chag gdab po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di rdul che ste/ sa phyogs 'di nas rdul gyi khams byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
430b6(brgyad stong): chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung gis bdag gis lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa'i chos can 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig
430b7(brgyad stong): pa ni sla'i nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i gzhis yang dang yang du 'khor bar 'khor zhing / bdag gi lus stong phrag mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni 'di
430b8(brgyad stong): lta bu'i gnas sam chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ni ma yin te/ 'dod pa de lta bu'i chos can la zhig pa yin no snyam du bsam so/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
431a1(brgyad stong): @sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus de ltar bsam nas tshon rnon po blangs te bdag gi lus kun phug nas rang gis sa phyogs de thams cad chag chag btab
431a2(brgyad stong): po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus rjes su slob pa tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis kyang mtshon rnon
431a3(brgyad stong): po blangs te rang rang gi lus phug nas rang rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de dag thams cad du chag chag btab ste/ gang de dag la bdud sdig can des dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar
431a4(brgyad stong): chad bya ba'i glags gang du rnyed par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang bu mo de dag thams cad gzhan du gyur pa med do// de nas lha rnams
431a5(brgyad stong): kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di tsam du chos 'dod pa dang ci tsam du yi dam la brtan pa dang ci
431a6(brgyad stong): du go cha chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang srog dang longs spyod rnams la mi lta ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'di
431a7(brgyad stong): lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yongs su dpag tu med pa las sems can tham
431a8(brgyad stong): cad thar bar bya'o snyam du lhag pa'i bsams pa la yang dag par zhugs pa ni ngo mtshar to snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de dag thams cad
431b1(brgyad stong): lha'i tsan dan gyis chur byin gyis brlabs te/ lha'i tsan dan gyi chu des dri dam pa rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa de'i dris sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu dpag
431b2(brgyad stong): tshad lnga brgya tshang bar dris yongs su khyab po/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces rigs
431b3(brgyad stong): kyi bu legs so leg so/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab pa legaso legs so// khyod kyis chos 'dod pa dang chos yongs su tshol ba yang
431b4(brgyad stong): legs te/ rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang
431b5(brgyad stong): brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang chos 'dod pa 'di lta bu'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrub so zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems
431b6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan ni bting / sa
431b7(brgyad stong): phyogs 'di phyag dar ni legs par byas chag chag ni legs par btab na bdag gis me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs 'dir legs par gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub
431b8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad cing chos kyi stan la 'dug pa la gtor bar bya ba'i me tog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam mo/ de nas lha rnams kyi
432a1(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu rdul 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu lha'i me tog man dA rab 'di dag long la khyod
432a2(brgyad stong): kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog bkram par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos ston cing chos kyi khri la 'dug pa la yang gto
432a3(brgyad stong): cig ces smras nas des de la lha'i me tog man dar ba lha'i khal steng byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus me tog de dag blangs te me
432a4(brgyad stong): tog kha cig gis ni sa phyogs der me tog bkram par byas so// me tog kha cig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor to// de nas
432a5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te chos kyi stan gang na yod pa der 'ong nas stan bting ba
432a6(brgyad stong): le 'dug ste/ 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
432a7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu dus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags mthong ma thag tu 'di lta ste dper na bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i
432a8(brgyad stong): dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob po/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
432b1(brgyad stong): ba ston pa ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas shes
432b2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do// chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do/ chos thams cad rno
432b3(brgyad stong): sems med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyid do/ chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa
432b4(brgyad stong): med pa nyid do/ chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do/ chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
432b5(brgyad stong): phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas
432b6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do// na mkha' mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shes rab
432b7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid do// nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi
432b8(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do/ gzugs med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams/
433a1(brgyad stong): @/ dang rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chu
433a2(brgyad stong): med pa nyid do// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// namakha'i khams mu med
433a3(brgyad stong): pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su med pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i khams su med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rdo rje lta bu'i
433a4(brgyad stong): chos mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do// chos
433a5(brgyad stong): thams cad dmig su med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do// chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol
433a6(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad bsam gyis
433a7(brgyad stong): mi khyab pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
433a8(brgyad stong): du de ltar 'dug bzhin du de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po skyes par gyur to// chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
433b1(brgyad stong): chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rlom sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya
433b2(brgyad stong): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa
433b3(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang rgya mtsho mu med pa zhes bya
433b4(brgyad stong): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
433b5(brgyad stong): nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i
433b6(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / na mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
433b7(brgyad stong): 'dzin dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting

434a1(brgyad stong): cad byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
